Review: Pésimo banco, te cobran de más, los que te atienden por teléfono nunca te dan una solución, mes tras mes hacen cobros más altos de lo que utilizas. Por nada saquen está tarjeta y la anualidad carísima.para el.pwaimo servicio. Arrepentidisisma de haberla sacado.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible bank, they charge you more, those who answer you on the phone never give you a solution, month after month they charge higher amounts than what you use. For nothing, get this card and the very expensive annuity for the pwaimo service. Regret having taken it out.

Review: El peor banco, no les aconsejo sacar tarjeta con ellos, me están cobrando interés de un pago que según no realice, mandé mis comprobantes pero nunca responden los correos, y los "ejecutivos" no te solucionan nada, son las personas más nefastas, te tratan súper mal, y te gritan, te cuelgan y te dejan hablando sola.... al parecer no están capacitados
traduccion_nueva: The worst bank, I do not advise you to take out a card with them, they are charging me interest on a payment that they say I did not make, I sent my receipts but they never respond to the emails, and the "executives" do not solve anything for you, they are the most disastrous people, you They treat you very badly, and they yell at you, hang up on you and leave you talking to yourself... apparently they are not trained

Review: Pésimo banco cobran intereses altísimos quiero cancelar y jamás contestan no hay ninguna sucursal oficina o algún lugar donde te atiendan !!! Tratas con desconocidos que nunca les vez la cara !!! Por experiencia propia no contraten ninguna de sus tarjetas !!!
traduccion_nueva: Terrible bank, they charge very high interest, I want to cancel and they never answer, there is no branch, office or any place where they will assist you!!! You deal with strangers who you never see their face!!! From my own experience, do not contract any of their cards!!!

Review: No saquen la tarjeta , te dejan caer una anualidad de casi $4500 , te meten un acelerador de puntos que ni contrataste,  no hay donde contactarlos , los intereses te comen  de verdad nooo la saquen , yo por falta de trabajo he estado pagando el mínimo que es de casi $1200 , mismos que se van a intereses y la cuenta no baja
traduccion_nueva: Don't take out the card, they drop you an annuity of almost $4,500, they give you an accelerator of points that you didn't even contract, there is nowhere to contact them, the interest really eats you up, don't take it out, due to lack of work I have been paying the minimum that It is almost $1,200, which goes to interest and the account does not go down.

Review: Pésimo servicio no te dejan cancelar la tarjeta y te cobran mucho por algo que ni usas
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they don't let you cancel the card and they charge you a lot for something you don't even use.

Review: Horrible servicio! Tardo más de una hora para que me atiendan. Cuando trato de cancelar la tarjeta me dan largas hasta que vuelva a pagar la anualidad, la cuál, se supone no debería pagar por qué fue lo que prometieron.
traduccion_nueva: Horrible service! It takes more than an hour for them to attend to me. When I try to cancel the card, they delay me until I pay the annuity again, which is not supposed to pay because that was what they promised.

Review: Hacen llamadas de cobranza anticipadas todavía no es fecha de pago y recibo por lo menos 5 llamadas al día cuando mi cuenta está en orden y no le debo. Constante hostigamiento
traduccion_nueva: They make early collection calls before the payment date is due and I receive at least 5 calls a day when my account is in order and I don't owe them. Constant harassment

Review: Es un pésimo servicio al cliente, cada q llamas te dicen q su plataforma se está actualizando, todos los días y cada minuto la plataforma se actualiza, no contraten con éste banco nada!!!!
traduccion_nueva: It is terrible customer service, every time you call they tell you that their platform is being updated, every day and every minute the platform is updated, do not contract anything with this bank!!!!

Review: PÉSIMO PÉSIMO SERVICIO NOOOO CONTRATEN. 1000 veces mejor BBVA o Santander. Groseros, déspotas molestos y totalmente desagradable.
traduccion_nueva: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE SERVICE NOOOO HIRE. 1000 times better than BBVA or Santander. Rude, annoying despots and totally unpleasant.

Review: Pésimo servicio. Fui para iniciar un tramite de credito y la señora que me atendió estaba poniéndole más atención a su celular qué a mi. Lleve todos mis documentos y ni tuvo el interés de hacerme el papeleo. Mejor me fui.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. I went to start a credit process and the lady who helped me was paying more attention to her cell phone than to me. I brought all my documents and he didn't even have the interest to do the paperwork for me. I better left.

Review: Te cargan "asistencias" (seguros) sin avisarte y no te dejan cancelarlos. La atención del servicio al cliente es pésima. He tenido que esperar 1 hora y media para que me contesten
traduccion_nueva: They charge you "assistances" (insurance) without notifying you and they don't let you cancel them. Customer service is terrible. I had to wait 1 hour and a half for them to answer me

Review: te llaman a ofrecerte el servicio lo rechazas y proceden a hacer llamadas con el fin de acosarte y decirte groserías por teléfono, fíjense a quien contratan, porque si eso hacen sin ser su cliente no me imagino como tratan a los que si son.
traduccion_nueva: They call you to offer you the service, you reject it and they proceed to make calls in order to harass you and say rude things to you on the phone, look at who they hire, because if they do that without being their client, I can't imagine how they treat those who are.

Review: Me uno a los comentarios negativos. Yo solicité un crédito, ya liquidé y por más que quiero cancelarlo no puedo. Ya tuve que pagar una mensualidad sin haberlo utilizado. Al queré cancelar lo hacen los más tedioso y cansado posible. Hasta este momento no he podido cancelar. Maldita la hora en que usé sus servicios. Dejen el crédito porque no les voy a pagar un centavo más.
traduccion_nueva: I join the negative comments. I requested a loan, I already paid it and no matter how much I want to cancel it, I can't. I already had to pay a monthly payment without having used it. When I want to cancel, they make it as tedious and tiring as possible. Until now I have not been able to cancel. Damn the time I used your services. Leave the credit because I'm not going to pay you a cent more.

Review: Llevo una semana tratando de comunicarme con alguien, al terminar de meter los datos que te piden en las opciones de sus líneas telefónicas, simplemente aparece un mensaje en inglés diciendo que el sistema está experimentando dificultades, pero esto pasa a toda hora y durante varios días ha sido lo mismo, me hicieron un cargo del que no puedo obtener explicación, es de verdad insólito y desesperante, no saquen una tarjeta con ese banco, se van a arrepentir,  una verdadera basura de servicio y cargos inexplicables.
traduccion_nueva: I have been trying to communicate with someone for a week, when I finish entering the information they ask for in the options of their telephone lines, a message simply appears in English saying that the system is experiencing difficulties, but this happens at all hours and for several days It's been the same, they made me a charge that I can't get an explanation for, it's really unusual and exasperating, don't get a card with that bank, you're going to regret it, a real garbage service and inexplicable charges.

Review: Porqueria de banco , pesimo servicio al cliente evitense dolores de cabeza,!!!!!!! Nunca contestan el telefono!!!!!!!
traduccion_nueva: Crappy bank, terrible customer service, avoid headaches,!!!!!!! They never answer the phone!!!!!!!

Review:
Si alguna firma de abogados quiere hacer una demanda colectiva, cuenten con mi testimonio.

Esta tarjeta puede ser el robo más grande y descarado de mexico en la actualidad. Solo se puede pagar a través de una aplicación que no funciona. Cuando llamas a cancelar, te hacen esperar horas y luego te trancan. No hay forma de pagarla ni de cancelarla y se van acumulando comisiones fantasmas. Es muy MUY serio lo que está pasando. Necesito acudir a in organismo a denunciarlos, alguien sabe cuál?
traduccion_nueva: If any law firm wants to file a class action lawsuit, count on my testimony. This card may be the largest and most brazen theft in Mexico today. You can only pay through an application that does not work. When you call to cancel, they make you wait for hours and then they lock you out. There is no way to pay it or cancel it and phantom commissions accumulate. What is happening is very VERY serious. I need to go to an agency to report them, does anyone know which one?

Review: Ojalá pronto dejen de operar, es el peor operador financiero en México, publicidad invasiva, engañosa, se pasan la ley por el arco del triunfo
traduccion_nueva: I hope they stop operating soon, it is the worst financial operator in Mexico, invasive, misleading advertising, they pass the law through the triumphal arch

Review: CARGOS QUE NI SIQUIERA APARECEN EN LOS ESTADOS DE CUENTA NO CONTRATEN NINGUNA TARJETA, NO RESUELVEN NADA
traduccion_nueva: CHARGES THAT DO NOT EVEN APPEAR IN THE ACCOUNT STATEMENTS DO NOT CONTRACT ANY CARD, THEY DO NOT RESOLVE ANYTHING

Review: A mí me hicieron cargo de un seguro que no solicité , llamo a los números de atención y nadie sabe dar información. Creo que es un buen candidato para generar reportes en CNBV y Profeco
traduccion_nueva: They took care of me for insurance that I did not request, I called the service numbers and no one knows how to give information. I think he is a good candidate to generate reports in CNBV and Profeco

Review: MUCHO CUIDADO, EN COMPRAS A MESES SIN INTERESES, TE LOS COBRAN POR ADELANTADO, EJEMPLO : SI COMPRASTE ALGO A 6 MESES SIN INTERESES, EN TU PAGO 3 TE COBRAN TODO EL REMANENTE , NO RESPETAN LOS MESES RESTANTES.
traduccion_nueva: BE VERY CAREFUL, IN PURCHASES IN MONTHS WITHOUT INTEREST, THEY CHARGE YOU IN ADVANCE, EXAMPLE: IF YOU PURCHASED SOMETHING IN 6 MONTHS WITHOUT INTEREST, IN YOUR PAYMENT 3 THEY CHARGE YOU FOR THE ENTIRE REMAINDER, THEY DO NOT RESPECT THE REMAINING MONTHS.

Review: No me atiende ningún ejecutivo para realizar la cancelación de esta tarjeta , pésimo servicio me urge cancelarla !!
traduccion_nueva: No executive is assisting me to cancel this card, terrible service, I urgently need to cancel it!!

Review: Personal amable, cuenta con seguridad, tienen baños e instalaciones limpias
traduccion_nueva: Friendly staff, security, clean bathrooms and facilities

Review: Nefasto servicio NO LO RECOMIENDO
traduccion_nueva: Disastrous service I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT

Review: No se les ocurra aceptar un disposición en efectivo atravez de la app, nunca te la transfieren a tu cuenta y si llamas te la vives de folios en folios y si quieres cancelar ese movimiento te dicen que no se puede, aunque por ley si se puede. Pero te tienes que ir a pelear a codusef y pos ya saben...
traduccion_nueva: Don't even think about accepting a cash payment through the app, they never transfer it to your account and if you call you live from page to page and if you want to cancel that transaction they tell you that it cannot be done, although by law it is possible . But you have to go fight at codusef and well you know...

Review: Pésimo servicio llamas y no contestan yo a la fecha no he utilizado mi tarjeta y ya tengo cargos de quién sabe que hablas para pedir información y no resuelven nada
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, you call and they don't answer, to date I haven't used my card and I already have charges from who knows that you call to ask for information and they don't resolve anything

Review:
Son fraude, múltiples cargos no reconocidos a mi tarjeta, te cambian el plástico y continua el problema. Después de 1 mes consigo que devuelvan el dinero, mi saldo es 0 y ahora no puedo cancelarla porque los ejecutivos no contestan o te cuelgan a mitad de la llamada.
Estoy en proceso de reportar a CONDUSEF
traduccion_nueva: They are fraud, multiple unacknowledged charges on my card, they change the plastic and the problem continues. After 1 month I get the money back, my balance is 0 and now I can't cancel it because the executives don't answer or hang up on you mid-call. I am in the process of reporting to CONDUSEF

Review: Cuales son los numeros de atención???, ya he marcado a 4 distintos y en ninguno me contestan, ya parque todas las opciones posibles, PESIMO SERVICIO
traduccion_nueva: What are the service numbers???, I have already dialed 4 different ones and none of them answer me, I have already tried all the possible options, TERRIBLE SERVICE

Review: Pésimo servicio al cliente, tengo un mes esperando que me autoricen la tarjeta y nadie me resuelve, si pueden evitar contratarla háganlo, son mas problemas que soluciones
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, I have been waiting a month for my card to be authorized and no one can help me, if you can avoid contracting it, do it, there are more problems than solutions

Review: Mismo tema me cobraron la anualidad un mes antes de cumplir el primer año he intentado cancelar la tarjeta por más de 2 meses y no paso del ivr, levanté la queja con ellos y con su departamento de unidad de atención a usuarios tardaron 2 horas en decir que no aplica la cancelación ni retiro de cargo porque "Siempre ellos así son y que no aplica aún que pague la nueva anualidad y cancele el reembolso de la misma aún que no la vaya a utilizar, si alguién le pasó esto y si le devolvieron el dinero después de pagar la anualidad favor de comentar cual fue el proceso
traduccion_nueva: Same issue, they charged me the annuity a month before completing the first year, I have tried to cancel the card for more than 2 months and it did not pass the ivr, I filed the complaint with them and with their user service unit department it took them 2 hours to say that cancellation or withdrawal of charge does not apply because "They are always like that and that it does not yet apply to pay the new annuity and cancel the refund of it even if you are not going to use it, if someone this happened to you and if they returned the money after paying the annuity, please comment on what the process was

Review: Pésimo servicio, no responden llamadas, anualidades carisimas
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they don't answer calls, very expensive annuities

Review: Es un asco de banco. Durante un año he tenido que hablar 6 veces a atencion a cliente para que me quiten programas que me agregan a lo buey y cargos que no son mios. Detestabe servicio donde te cuelgan y en un llamada taardas mas de 20 mins
traduccion_nueva: It's a disgusting bank. During a year I have had to call customer service 6 times to have them remove programs that add to my expenses and charges that are not mine. I hate service where they hang up on you and it takes more than 20 minutes on a call

Review: Pésimo servicio, anualidad exorbitante conforme a los beneficios que ofrece, no lo vale, sin contar su servicio al cliente donde te tienen esperando mas de 1hr de un menu al otro y no es broma que ya hasta reconozco la voz del morrillo de cuentas, no arregla nada, te da solución de si lo cancelo como quiera te lo voy a cobrar mejor págalo y aprovechalo, me están cobrando un servició que no solicite, tuve que elaborar una demanda con la condusef les recomiendo investiguen y le den seguimiento. Cuando me dan un folio marcan y cuelgan pero cuando ofrecen la tarjeta están chingue y chingue, e tratado de cancelarla desde hace 1 año, me cobraron la anualidad y nunca me dieron servicio para cancelación si tienen la oportunidad de sacar una tarjeta invex por favor desaprovéchenla
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, exorbitant annuity according to the benefits it offers, it is not worth it, not to mention their customer service where they have you waiting more than 1 hour from one menu to the other and it is no joke that I even recognize the voice of the account manager, no fixes nothing, it gives you a solution if I cancel it however I want, I will charge you better pay it and take advantage of it, they are charging me for a service that I did not request, I had to file a claim with the condusef I recommend that you investigate and follow up. When they give me a folio they dial and hang up but when they offer the card they are crazy and crazy, and I have been trying to cancel it for 1 year, they charged me the annual fee and they never gave me a cancellation service if you have the opportunity to get an invex card please don't take advantage of it

Review: Pésimo servicio, ni queria la tarjeta, te dicen que es sin anualidad pero si no la usas cobran 185 o sea la anualidad o más, llevo mas de 100 llamadas , 3 meses para CANCELAR, imposible
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, I didn't even want the card, they tell you that it is without annuity but if you don't use it they charge 185 or the annuity or more, I have made more than 100 calls, 3 months to CANCEL, impossible

Review: Pésima atención al cliente, no contestan nunca, y cuando llegan a contestar te cuelgan.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, they never answer, and when they do answer they hang up on you.

Review: Hostigar todo el día es el método que usan para conseguir clientes. Y por las denuncias de tarjetahabientes están al mismo nivel de banco azteca.
traduccion_nueva: Harassing all day is the method they use to get clients. And based on the complaints from cardholders, they are at the same level as Banco Azteca.

Review: Atención malísima, estoy intentando cancelar una tarjeta de crédito, me dijeron que espere la linea y tengo 30 min esperando a que me atiendan
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, I'm trying to cancel a credit card, they told me to wait for the line and I have 30 minutes waiting for them to attend to me

Review: Esta institución es malísima para la tencion al cliente siempre te dan largas y nunca te resuelven y si pides una compra a meses sin intereses siempre te la cobran de contado y tienes que llamar para ponerla a meses pero jamás te contestan y cuando por fin contestan dicen que “no hay sistema” o que llames mañana.
traduccion_nueva: This institution is very bad for customer service, they always drag you out and never resolve it and if you ask for a purchase in months without interest, they always charge you in cash and you have to call to put it in months but they never answer you and when they finally answer they say that “there is no system” or that you call tomorrow.

Review: No he podido actualizar mis datos en que cambie de residencia y no puedo utilizar la tarjeta desde hace un mes llamo y que no sirve su sistema, pésimo servicio
traduccion_nueva: I have not been able to update my information when I change residence and I cannot use the card. I have been calling for a month and their system does not work, terrible service

Review: Es un dolor de cabeza tener un folio o reclamación con ellos, llevo 3 meses sin respuesta, solo dan largas y largas, he hablado más de 20 veces, te transfieren y nunca atiende el supervisor, nadie se hace responsable y tampoco responden los correos
traduccion_nueva: It is a headache to have a file or complaint with them, I have had no response for 3 months, they only go on and on, I have spoken more than 20 times, they transfer you and the supervisor never answers, no one takes responsibility and they do not respond to emails either

Review:
Pésimo banco, te cobran intereses exagerados y sin sentido, el estado de cuenta me llegó con una cantidad y en la aplicación decía otra cantidad, pago mediante la aplicación y me cobraron mil pesos de interes, no dan respuesta mediante atención telefónica, te cobran comisión si depositas directamente el dinero a la tarjeta, cuando se te devuelve un pago, no te devuelven el dinero simplemente "te lo rebajan" pero al fin de cuentas de todas maneras terminas pagando el costo de esa compra.
La aplicación falla y no puedes acceder a la información de tus pagos y movimientos, los ejecutivos tampoco tienen sistema y al final no te resuelven nada y se excusan que no hay sistema.
Me demore dos semanas llamando todos los días (literal) y sin sistema o que estaba en actualización y no pudo proceder mi reclamo y terminé pagando compras no reconocidas.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible bank, they charge you exaggerated and meaningless interest, the account statement came to me with an amount and the application said another amount, I paid through the application and they charged me a thousand pesos of interest, they do not respond by telephone, they charge you a commission If you deposit the money directly to the card, when a payment is returned, they don't give you the money back, they simply "reduce it" but in the end you end up paying the cost of that purchase anyway. The application fails and you cannot access the information about your payments and movements, the executives do not have a system either and in the end they do not solve anything for you and they excuse themselves that there is no system. It took me two weeks calling every day (literally) and without a system or it was being updated and my claim could not proceed and I ended up paying for unrecognized purchases.

Review: La anualidad es carísima y su publicidad engañosa. Cuando me la otorgaron "me obsequiaron" un monedero electrónico por $150. La persona que me entregó la tarjeta hizo mucho hincapié en que  cuanto más rápido usara el monedero, mejor; debía usarlo en una sola exhibición y con una compra  mínima de $300 (el resto del costo se cargaría a la tarjeta de crédito). Me dio la indicación que una vez usado debía romper el monedero ya que era desechable. Al momento de llegar mi corte, me estaban cobrando el total de la compra. Me comuniqué para preguntar porque no habían aplicado los $150 pesos del monedero y me dijeron que el monedero tenía un costo de $150 pero podía hacer con él compras de hasta $300, esta vez,  me dijeron que no era necesario agotar el saldo en una sola compra y podía usarlo varias veces hasta agotarlo. El monedero venía en un sobre donde igual se mencionaba su saldo era de $150 y como mencioné, la indicación de la persona que me lo entregó fue deshacerme de él prácticamente después de usarlo. Liquidé mi saldo y me comuniqué para cancelar la tarjeta. Después de aproximadamente 20 minutos de escuchar por parte de uno de sus ejecutivos los grandes beneficios de la tarjeta y por qué no debía cancelar, me entregaron el folio de cancelación.
traduccion_nueva: The annuity is very expensive and its advertising is misleading. When they granted it to me they "gave me" an electronic wallet for $150. The person who gave me the card made a big point that the faster I used the wallet, the better; It had to be used in a single display and with a minimum purchase of $300 (the rest of the cost would be charged to the credit card). He told me that once used I should break the purse since it was disposable. At the time my cut arrived, they were charging me for the entire purchase. I called to ask why they had not applied the $150 pesos of the wallet and they told me that the wallet had a cost of $150 but I could make purchases with it of up to $300, this time, they told me that it was not necessary to use up the balance in a single purchase and I could use it several times until I used it up. The wallet came in an envelope where it was mentioned that its balance was $150 and as I mentioned, the instruction of the person who gave it to me was to get rid of it practically after using it. I settled my balance and contacted them to cancel the card. After approximately 20 minutes of listening to one of their executives about the great benefits of the card and why I shouldn't cancel, they handed me the cancellation sheet.

Review: Son unos rateros cínicos!! Te va den la tarjeta con engaños, te cobran anualidades sumamente caras que no te mencionan cuando te la ofrecen, no quiere. Cancelarte la tarjeta cuando la terminas de pagar y cobran intereses excesivos, sin duda la peor atención al cliente por parte de estos estafadores!!!
traduccion_nueva: They are cynical thieves!! They are going to give you the card with deception, they charge you extremely expensive annuities that they do not mention when they offer it to you, they do not want to. Cancel your card when you finish paying it and charge excessive interest, without a doubt the worst customer service from these scammers!!!

Review: No quieren cancelarme la tarjeta me dan largas no me conectan a la llamada con ningún ejecutivo, pedí reposición de mi tarjeta y me la siguen enviando a mi antigua dirección apresar de que ya más de 2 veces les mande la dirección nueva en tiempo y forma como me la han pedido, y no son resolutivos me la siguen enviando al domicilio anterior, y además no me la quieren cancelar por que ya estoy cansada del pésimo servicio que dan, ineficiente y cansado además de que son acosadores cuando por fin usas la tarjeta a un nivel de cansancio. Jamás había tenido tan mala experiencia con una tarjeta que sólo una vez en mi vida usé, y ahora ni cancelarla quieren
traduccion_nueva: They don't want to cancel my card, they drag me out, they don't connect me to the call with any executive, I asked for a replacement of my card and they keep sending it to my old address, expecting that more than 2 times I sent them the new address in a timely manner. They have asked me for it, and they are not decisive, they keep sending it to my previous address, and they also do not want to cancel it because I am already tired of the terrible service they give, inefficient and tired, plus they are harassers when you finally use the card a level of tiredness. I have never had such a bad experience with a card that I only used once in my life, and now they don't even want to cancel it

Review: Pésimo servicio. Cuando accedí a que me dieran la tarjeta me comentaron que no había cargo por no uso y comenzaron a cobrarme por lo mismo. No pude iniciar sesión en la aplicación por fallas técnicas y no me solucionaron. Me dijeron que tenia un saldo en la tarjeta el cual cubrí en ese momento en su totalidad y después me cobraron intereses por ese mismo monto que ya había saldado.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. When I agreed to get the card they told me that there was no charge for non-use and they started charging me for the same. I couldn't log in to the app due to technical issues and they didn't fix it for me. They told me that I had a balance on the card which I paid in full at that time and then they charged me interest on that same amount that I had already paid off.

Review:
De lo más deplorable en servicio al cliente. Son ineficientes a niveles exagerados. Su atención a cliente es hasta vil en la forma en la que buscan dar soluciones. Completamente la calificaría como la peor experiencia que he tenido en un servicio en México.

Si pueden no contratar o cancelar sus servicios les daría bastante paz mental.
traduccion_nueva: The most deplorable in customer service. They are inefficient to an exaggerated level. Their customer service is even vile in the way they seek to provide solutions. I would completely describe it as the worst experience I have had in a service in Mexico. If they can not hire or cancel their services it would give them a lot of peace of mind.

Review:
Si pudiera poner 0 estrellas, lo haría.

Te venden servicios con engaños. Me vendieron un crédito personal diciendo que podría pagarlo entero en cualquier momento simplemente pagando el monto que quedaba pendiente. A los pocos meses quise hacer justo lo que me había dicho el agente y al marcar para preguntar los pasos, resultó ser que NO puedes pagar un crédito directamente, sino que la cantidad que pagues se aplica siempre en un orden específico a los diferentes conceptos en tu tarjeta.

En ese momento les pedí mi monto total a liquidar para pagar la tarjeta y cancelarla, hice el pago a los minutos y días después resultó que me hicieron un cobro extra y por lo mismo mi tarjeta no se canceló y dicen que no pueden reembolsarme dicha cantidad porque la tarjeta ya está bloqueada y en proceso de precancelación.

Esta empresa gana dinero con engaños y cobros fantasmas.
traduccion_nueva: If I could give 0 stars, I would. They sell you services with deception. They sold me a personal loan saying that I could pay it in full at any time simply by paying the amount that was outstanding. A few months later I wanted to do exactly what the agent had told me and when I dialed to ask the steps, it turned out that you CANNOT pay a loan directly, but rather the amount you pay is always applied in a specific order to the different concepts in your card. At that moment I asked them for my total amount to be settled to pay the card and cancel it, I made the payment within minutes and days later it turned out that they charged me extra and for the same reason my card was not canceled and they say that they cannot refund me said amount because the card is already blocked and in the pre-cancellation process. This company makes money through deception and phantom charges.

Review:
En mi experiencia el peor banco que existe
Tengo dos meses que reporte una falla en el saldo de monedero volaris , ya he mandado correo y no dan seguimiento .
Además de que ofrecen promociones que no hacen válidas.

Las líneas de teléfono no funcionan
traduccion_nueva: In my experience, the worst bank that exists. I have been reporting a failure in the Volaris wallet balance for two months, I have already sent an email and they do not follow up. In addition, they offer promotions that are not valid. Phone lines are not working

Review: Son unas personas prepotentes que solo quieren hablar ellos y hacerte que te quedes con su tarjeta que te cobran comisión sobre comisión, El día de ahora 12 de junio 2024 hablé con una de sus trabajadores en atención de cancelación y no deja hablar la persona se llama VIRIDIANA BAUTISTA y no me esconde de que si le gripe  por qué ellos solo quieren hablar y (le grite por su nombre) para que pudiera escuchar y lo que ella hizo fue colgar la llamada y por tal cual ya no le dio seguimiento a mi cancelación.
traduccion_nueva: They are arrogant people who only want to talk to themselves and make you keep their card who charge you commission upon commission. Today, June 12, 2024, I spoke with one of their workers in cancellation service and she won't let us talk, the person's name is VIRIDIANA BAUTISTA and she doesn't hide from me that if she had the flu, why did they just want to talk and (I yelled at her name) so she could listen and what she did was hang up the call and for that reason she no longer followed up on my cancellation .

Review: Me estafaron por medio de este banco, una florería de nombre "Golden Rose", para que también no compren a esa florería, que a final de cuentas no responde ni se hace responsable de no haber emitido el pedido. Ahora, retomando lo de INVEX , llevo 3 horas marcando para hacer aclaración del pago y que lo puedan desconocer, para así tener mi dinero de vuelta, a decir verdad, he tenido malas experiencias emitiendo quejas, pero ninguna cómo está, que pésimo servicio y atención!.
traduccion_nueva: They scammed me through this bank, a flower shop named "Golden Rose", so that they also do not buy from that flower shop, which in the end does not respond nor is responsible for not having issued the order. Now, returning to the INVEX thing, I have been dialing for 3 hours to clarify the payment so that they may not know it, in order to have my money back, to tell the truth, I have had bad experiences issuing complaints, but none how is it, what a terrible service and attention!.

Review:
Buen día.

¿Me podría proporcionar un número, una dirección y un nombre de a quien debo comunicarme para un error en los datos de su banco?

Un tal Alberto Amador puso el número de mi negocio  como referencia para que le marcaran y que le cobraran. Nuestro número NO ES EL DE ALBERTO AMADOR.

Tenemos alrededor de 50 correos con nuestro número de teléfono y recibo que demuestra que NO SOMOS ALBERTO AMADOR. Sus llamadas son cada 1-2 minutos y sus cobradores no nos quieren decir ni su nombre ni con quién comunicarnos.
traduccion_nueva: Good day. Could you provide me with a number, address and name of who I should contact regarding an error in your bank details? A certain Alberto Amador gave my business number as a reference so they could call him and get paid. Our number IS NOT ALBERTO AMADOR'S. We have around 50 emails with our phone number and receipt that shows that WE ARE NOT ALBERTO AMADOR. Their calls are every 1-2 minutes and their collectors do not want to tell us their name or who to contact.

Review: De la vrg su servicio, te mencionan que el primer año no pagas anualidad y al final te meten un programa de que si quieres diferir a meses debes pagar $2250 si compras en otras tiendas, cuando las únicas compras que haces son de volaris y se supone la tarjeta ya trae meses sin intereses, debes marcar para que te den de baja de esa mmd, luego no te dan de alta de manera correcta para la sala key más de una semana en que te llegue la liga cuando vuelves a marcar te dicen que el registro no lo hicieron bien y que ahora si dentro de 3 días te llega la liga cosa que no pasa y de nuevo marcas y así te traen de su pndj, la neta ahórrense los corajes y no contraten esta mmda
traduccion_nueva: Regarding their service, they mention that the first year you do not pay an annuity and at the end they put in a program that if you want to defer for months you must pay $2250 if you buy in other stores, when the only purchases you make are from Volaris and it is supposed The card already has months without interest, you must dial to be unsubscribed from that mmd, then they do not register you correctly for the key room more than a week after the league arrives, when you dial again they tell you that They didn't do the registration well and now if you get the league within 3 days, which doesn't happen and you score again and so they bring you from their pndj, the bottom line is to save your courage and don't hire this mmda

Review: Malísima atención al cliente, hablan mucho y no solucionan nada. Pésimo servicio. No me han querido cancelar la tarjeta y me cobran por seguros que no comprado
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, they talk a lot and don't solve anything. Terrible service. They have not wanted to cancel my card and they charge me for insurance that I did not purchase

Review: Nunca me he atrevido a hacer un comentario o calificar un lugar con una mala reseña por que tengo negocio y somos humanos y cometemos errores pero definitivamente nunca contestan.. 😔
traduccion_nueva: I have never dared to make a comment or rate a place with a bad review because I have a business and we are human and we make mistakes but they definitely never answer.. 😔

Review: Acabo de sacar la tarjeta las primeras veces me contestaron llevo varios días llamando y nunca contestan pésimo Servicio al público
traduccion_nueva: I just got the card the first time they answered me, I've been calling for several days and they never answer, terrible customer service

Review:
Está tarjeta no me ha dado más dólares de cabeza que beneficios.
Atención a los clientes es pésima,  no la  recomiendo.
traduccion_nueva: This card has not given me more dollars in money than benefits. Customer service is terrible, I do not recommend it.

Review: Hijole la verdad es que ni a la sucursal iré… tengo 4 días intentando llamar por teléfono me contestaron como 3 veces y se escucha mucho relajo en la oficina u no podía escuchar bien así que me colgaron el teléfono pésima atención ni a qué voy es imposible comunicarte con alguien en toda la red de INVEX
traduccion_nueva: Son, the truth is that I won't even go to the branch... I've been trying to call for 4 days, they answered me like 3 times and it sounds very relaxed in the office and I couldn't hear well so they hung up the phone on me. Terrible attention and what I'm going for is impossible. communicate with someone across the INVEX network

Review: nunca compro nada con la basura de tarjeta y el dia que se me ocurre genera fallo en el pago y si se marca la compra pero no en el sitio
traduccion_nueva: I never buy anything with a junk card and the day it occurs to me it generates a failure in the payment and the purchase is marked but not on the site

Review:
Pésimo servicio
No puedo ingresar ala plataforma
No quiero esa tarjeta necesito cancelar.
No la recomiendo
No responden el teléfono
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service I can't enter the platform I don't want that card I need to cancel. I do not recommend it They do not answer the phone

Review:
Es lo peor que he tenido, no se les ocurra caer en su estafa, comienzan a hacerte cargos que no reconoces por gestiones administrativas mas comisiones, ivas etc… Aunque pagues tu tarjeta a tiempo y les demuestres te dicen que te atrasaste y que por eso te cobran y aunque tú demuestres tu pago te la voltean y te dicen que es por otra cosa y te traen así para hacerte perder el tiempo y que te canses para no reclamar el dinero que te estan cobrando.

Abusivos, en servicio al cliente el ejecutivo se burló de mi literalmente y tengo pruebas porque grabe la llamada. Y correos.

No caigan! Es desgastante estar aclarando los cobros que te hacen y no lo resuelven!

Es una completa estafa y caes porque al principio la atencion es muy buena, ya que la tienes empiezas a ver la pesadilla
traduccion_nueva: It's the worst thing I've ever had, don't even think about falling for their scam, they start making charges that you don't recognize for administrative procedures plus commissions, VAT, etc... Even if you pay your card on time and prove it to them, they tell you that you were late and that's why They charge you and even if you prove your payment, they turn it around and tell you that it is for something else and they bring you in like this to make you waste your time and make you tired so as not to claim the money they are charging you. Abusive, in customer service the executive literally made fun of me and I have proof because I recorded the call. And emails. Don't fall! It's exhausting to clarify the charges they make to you and they don't resolve it! It is a complete scam and you fall because at first the attention is very good, once you have it you begin to see the nightmare

Review: Pésimo servicio, no dan respuestas ni soluciones, te hacen cargos no reconocidos y no te dan respuesta, quiero cancelar
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they do not give answers or solutions, they charge you unrecognized charges and they do not give you an answer, I want to cancel

Review: Me marcan desde una semana antes de mi fecha de pago para cobrarme, como si fuera moroso, por lo menos 6 llamadas al día desde temprano y mensajes de texto. Me tratan como si les robara. Pésimo servicio.
traduccion_nueva: They call me a week before my payment date to charge me, as if I were delinquent, at least 6 calls a day from early in the morning and text messages. They treat me like I stole from them. Terrible service.

Review:
Nunca había experimentado un servicio tan malo como el de este "banco'. 1a semana sin poder entrar a su sitio web o aplicación de movil.
Hablar con alguien para asistencia por teléfono es todo un reto.
Apenas tengo 2 meses con ellos, y creo que nuestra relación ya termino.
traduccion_nueva: I have never experienced service as bad as this 'bank'. 1st week without being able to access their website or mobile app. Talking to someone for assistance over the phone is a challenge. I have only been with them for 2 months, and I think that our relationship is over.

Review:
Pésimo servicio al cliente, casi nunca contestan, y cuando lo hacen o no hay servicio o están actualizando el sistema.

Los beneficios que ofrecen no cumplen.

Lo mejor es no adquirir la tarjeta o cancelar si es que la tienen.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, they almost never answer, and when they do there is either no service or they are updating the system. The benefits they offer do not comply. It is best not to purchase the card or cancel it if they have it.

Review: Es el peor banco que hay, tengo un mes cancelando la tarjeta, te hacen cargos que no reconoces, te dan largas con el proceso de cancelación, que a la fecha mi tarjeta sigue activa, lo peor del caso es que la apague desde mi app y se siguen generando cargos que ellos mismos hacen, tengan mucho cuidado con este banco.
traduccion_nueva: It is the worst bank there is, I have been canceling the card for a month, they charge you charges that you do not recognize, they drag you out with the cancellation process, to date my card is still active, the worst thing is that I turned it off from my app and charges continue to be generated that they themselves make, be very careful with this bank.

Review: Pésimo servicio de verdad horrible! No saquen su tarjeta con ellos
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, truly horrible! Don't take your card out with them.

Review: Pésimo servicio a clientes, nada recomendable para usar fuera del extranjero, muy mal seguimiento a reportes. He tenido muy mala experiencia en el uso de varias de sus tarjetas y mejor las cancelé.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, not recommended for use abroad, very poor follow-up on reports. I have had a very bad experience using several of their cards and it was better to cancel them.

Review: La peor tarjeta del mundo , pésimo servicio  telefónico, te hacen cargos no reconocidos a tu cuenta,  aun cuando la tarjeta esta apagada, la app no funciona a cada rato.
traduccion_nueva: The worst card in the world, terrible phone service, they make unrecognized charges to your account, even when the card is turned off, the app doesn't work all the time.

Review: Pésimo servicio al cliente, no tramiten tarjetas con ellos solo te llaman para cobrar pero si quieres hablar para resolver algo nunca contestan
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, they do not process cards with them, they only call you to collect but if you want to talk to resolve something they never answer

Review: INVEX ESTAFA, mi unica experiencia con este Invex es una estafa, fraude resulte en buro de credito por que alguien de Invex no se como y sin mi autorizacion uso mis datos para contratar y activar una tarjeta de credito a mi nombre, genero deuda la cual ni solicite ni reconosco ni mucho menos acepto, busque solucion con esta gente y no me quieren resolver y cancelar este adeudo y esta tal tarjeta de credito INVEX me perjudico mi historial crediticio (para cuando te das cuenta de su fraude ya pasaron meses y estas en buro de credito), si alguien puede ayudarme con este problema le agradezco me contacte
traduccion_nueva: INVEX SCAM, my only experience with this Invex is a scam, fraud resulted in the credit bureau because someone from Invex did not know how and without my authorization he used my data to contract and activate a credit card in my name, generating debt which I neither requested nor recognized, much less accepted, I sought a solution with these people and they do not want to resolve and cancel this debt and this INVEX credit card damaged my credit history (by the time you realize their fraud, months have already passed and you are in credit bureau), if anyone can help me with this problem, please contact me

Review: Pesimo servicio al cliente, te clonan la tarjeta y, no te dejan cancelar
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, they clone your card and won't let you cancel

Review: Nunca tienen sistema para alcaracion de cargos no reconocidos, pesisma actitud de los operadores.
traduccion_nueva: They never have a system for reporting unacknowledged charges, terrible attitude of the operators.

Review: Tenia otro concepto de INVEX, Todo iba bien hasta que hace más de 3 semanas me marca error de acceso a mi tarjeta digital, al cual no me han solucionado ni por llamada ni ningún medio :(
traduccion_nueva: I had a different concept about INVEX, everything was going well until more than 3 weeks ago when I got an error accessing my digital card, which they have not solved by call or any means :(

Review: Pésimo servicio. No puedo activar una tarjeta adicional y no hay quien me apoye a encontrar una solución
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. I cannot activate an additional card and there is no one to help me find a solution

Review: A mí madre le metieron antes la fecha de cobro cuando no era así lo que le dijeron.
traduccion_nueva: They gave my mother the payment date earlier when what they told her was not like that.

Review:
NADIE SAQUE ESTA TARJETA, COMO SERVICIO ES UNA PORQUERÍA, ES EL BANCO MAS FRAUDULENTO DE TODOS, MIS PAGOS AL DIA DE HOY $23,000 EN 7 MESES, MI SALDO CAPITAL PASO DE $32000, A $30,500
SOLO BAJO $1500, DESPUÉS DE DAR $23,000 DURANTE LOS PAGOS DE 7 MESES 🐀

HAY MEJORES OPCIÓNES, TARJETAS QUE NO PAGAS ANUALIDAD, Y NO MANEJAN ESTE TIPO DE FRAUDES CON ESTAS CANTIDADES DE INTERESES.
traduccion_nueva: NO ONE TAKES OUT THIS CARD, AS A SERVICE IT IS CRAP, IT IS THE MOST FRAUDULENT BANK OF ALL, MY PAYMENTS TODAY $23,000 IN 7 MONTHS, MY CAPITAL BALANCE WENT FROM $32,000, TO $30,500 ONLY DOWN $1500, AFTER GIVING $23,000 DURING THE PAYMENTS FOR 7 MONTHS 🐀 THERE ARE BETTER OPTIONS, CARDS THAT DO NOT PAY ANNUITY, AND THEY DO NOT HANDLE THIS TYPE OF FRAUD WITH THESE AMOUNTS OF INTEREST.

Review: Pésima atención, por atención telefónica piden enviar correo para realizar trámites de cancelación, disposición los cuales no responden. Registran a planes no solicitados que tienen cargo y cobran anualidad cuando en sus políticas especifican que el primer año se exenta.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, by telephone they ask to send an email to carry out cancellation procedures, a provision which they do not respond to. They register unsolicited plans that have a fee and charge an annual fee when their policies specify that the first year is exempt.

Review:
Tengan cuidado cuando adquieran esta tarjeta de crédito, te hacen la vida imposible para poder cancelarla, aunque nunca la hayas usado, la anualidad es carísima, desde Febrero me dedique a querer cancelarla y es imposible, al grado de que llega el momento que ya no te contestan.
Agradezco mucho a INVEX MESSENGER, fue con los únicos que pude cancelarla sin ningún problema.
traduccion_nueva: Be careful when you buy this credit card, they make your life impossible to cancel it, even if you have never used it, the annuity is very expensive, since February I have been wanting to cancel it and it is impossible, to the point that the time comes when I no longer They answer you. I am very grateful to INVEX MESSENGER, they were the only ones I was able to cancel it with without any problem.

Review: El agente que me entregó mi tarjeta me puso un programa llamado cero sin mi autorización, lo hizo según diciendo que era para activar mi tarjeta y me dio de alta este programa, no se puede cancelar porque lo acepte desde mi celular con un código de verificación que me llegó, uso mi firma como parte del contrato sin mi consentimiento, unas verdaderas ratas, para que tengan cuidado al recibir la tarjeta, ahora tengo que pagar $2700.
traduccion_nueva: The agent who gave me my card gave me a program called zero without my authorization, he did so saying it was to activate my card and he signed me up for this program, it cannot be canceled because I accept it from my cell phone with a verification code that arrived, they used my signature as part of the contract without my consent, real rats, so be careful when receiving the card, now I have to pay $2700.

Review: 16/4/24 Pésimo servicio, cero inclusión ni consideración a personas con discapacidad, acudí para reposición de tarjeta de nómina por vencimiento, en el tiempo que estuve solo atendía un ejecutivo, que sólo le interesa aperturar cuentas, yo ya 15 años con esa tarjeta de nomina ya es tiempo de llevarla a otro Banco. Se inventó que ocupaba un folio para hacerme esperar, atendió a personas que llegaron después que yo, estuve de 12:20 a 2:20pm y me ponía a esperar tuve que retirarme sin la reposición. De ahí fui a otra sucursal que NI siquiera mencionaron el folio y en 30 minutos, hice fila, y el tramite y salí con la reposición.
traduccion_nueva: 4/16/24 Terrible service, zero inclusion or consideration for people with disabilities, I went to replace my payroll card due to expiration, during the time I was alone there was an executive who was only interested in opening accounts, I have had that for 15 years payroll card it is time to take it to another Bank. He invented that he took up a piece of paper to make me wait, he attended to people who arrived after me, I was there from 12:20 to 2:20 pm and I started waiting I had to leave without the replacement. From there I went to another branch that didn't even mention the folio and in 30 minutes, I stood in line, completed the process and left with the replacement.

Review:
November 4, 2023, I entered to ask if there was anyone working that day that could process my IRA contribution as the last time the banker hand to make a call to tbe walked through the steps.  The greeter/teller (Jocelyn) told me to wait.  I replied that nust wanted a yes or no answer, so she went to find a banker.  The courteous female banker told me yes.  so Iff I went for a cashier's check.
Upon my return, Jocelyn did not say anything.  I did notice, however, that the female banker I had talked to was busy.  So I sat down to wait.  After a t least ten minutes, the branch manager, Gerardo (I think), sent Jocely on a break and covered for her.  After another five or six minutes, I rose and told him that I was there to make an IRA contribution.  He replied raising his voice that I would have to keep waiting because his bankers were busy.  He then asked (still in a raised voice) if I signed in.  I told him that the greeter didn't say anything to me even though she knkew why I was there and that I had been waiting over fifteen minutes.  (I was the only customer waiting ata a cushioned bench-like piede of furniture that was actually facing the wall! )  He snapped back defending his employee instead of whoeing any interest whatsoever in what I had to say.  After a moment, he went to acubicle.  With a smirk, he muttered something to banker Salvador who galcned at me and chuckled before calling me over.  These three demonstrated immuture, unprofessional behavior.  I wrote their Executive Office in Columbus, OH, but only received two letters acknowledging having received my complaint.

Upon my return, Jocelyn did not say anything. I did notice, however, that the female banker I had talked to was busy. So I sat down to wait. After at least ten minutes, the branch manager, Gerardo (I think), sent Jocely on a break and covered for her. After another five or six minutes, I rose and told him that I was there to make an IRA contribution. He replied raising his voice that I would have to keep waiting because his banks were busy. He then asked (still in a raised voice) if I signed in. I told him that the greeter didn't say anything to me even though she knew why I was there and that I had been waiting over fifteen minutes. (I was the only customer waiting ata a cushioned bench-like foot of furniture that was actually facing the wall! ) He snapped back defending his employee instead of whoeing any interest whatsoever in what I had to say. After a moment, he went to acubicle. With a smirk, he muttered something to banker Salvador who galled at me and chuckled before calling me over. These three demonstrated immuture, unprofessional behavior. I wrote their Executive Office in Columbus, OH, but only received two letters acknowledging having received my complaint.

Review: I’ve tried getting on the phone with them for 3 days now and they do not answer the phone calls. The AI machine is programmed to terminate the call as well if no one picks up. At least other banks can answer my question on why it is taking 2 weeks to process 1 simple check.

Review: I had the incredible opportunity to experience the vibrant culture and traditional dances of Tijuana International Airport during their Independence Day celebration. It was truly amazing to witness the rich cultural heritage of Mexico right at the airport. The colorful performances and festive atmosphere added a unique touch to my travel experience. Tijuana International Airport is not just a gateway to a destination; it’s a window into the heart and soul of Mexico. Highly recommended! 🇲🇽✨

Review:
every time my family and I want to go to mexico, we always go to CBX because it’s cheaper. going through is good. no complaints, but coming back and retrieving your luggage is a nightmare. the workers don’t seem to be in any rush to have your belongings back.

we’ve waited 30 minutes to almost a full hour just to get our stuff, same with others and it’s beyond infuriating. as i’m typing this, we are waiting for just one luggage. it’s absolutely ridiculous how long they take.

Review: Getting through CBX is great and pretty easy. But once on the other side, volaris will literally measure your bag 💼 the linear dimensions. Mine was just 5 inches over the limit $50 American dollars extra. I had already paid for two bags. My sister had a tiny massage ball and at the security they took it. Then for me they wanted to take my kitchen tongs and a small heat pressed for plastic baggies. Seriously 😐. So I said I’ll go back and check my stuff. Then I thought I should take my sisters ball and we asked the lady for it. To find out she set it aside under a table 😡. Not where everyone(employees) were  “throwing “ everything taken from passengers. She felt so embarrassed. Seriously all that for a tiny ball that she considered “ a threat “. Gosh they need to teach there security staff what really is and isn’t dangerous. To all this I had taken a plane from USA and had gone through 2 different TSA security check points. The items I had weren’t dangerous. Never flying Volaris ever again!!! By the time you pay all the extras that that charge , you’re better off with Viva Aerobús or Aeroméxico.

The items I had weren't dangerous. Never flying Volaris ever again!!! By the time you pay all the extras that that charge, you're better off with Viva Aerobús or Aeroméxico.

Review: $27 for using the foot bridge. $42 for entering the country unless you have Mexican papers. $45 for one carry-on bag.   I realize these are three separate entities but I'm painting the picture that you feel pecked to death.  The airport is alright but kind of disorganized.  I made one line to print the boarding pass, which is a good idea as I saw plenty of people having trouble scanning cell screens.  Line number 2 to buy a CBX pass.  Line number 3  to complete the tourism form. Line number 4 to scan your CBX pass and get onto the bridge. Line number 5 to declare how long you will be in the country and pay your $42. Line number 6 to show your passport and paid tourism fee receipt. Line number 7 to get your luggage scanned by Aduana officers. Line number 8 to pay for luggage and check it in if you're going to check it. Line number 9 to scan your boarding pass and get into the equivalent of TSA. Line number 10 to place your belongings onto the trays and get through weapons screening. Line number 11 to get on the plane.  The only thing that would be worse would be if there were no lines and it was just mayhem. 🙄 I just think the process could be streamlined. One last whine.  You can't find a cold drink in the airport.  Everything is just under room temp.  Oh well.  First world problems here.

I realize these are three separate entities but I'm painting the picture that you feel stuck to death. The airport is alright but kind of disorganized. I made one line to print the boarding pass, which is a good idea as I saw plenty of people having trouble scanning cell screens. Line number 2 to buy a CBX pass. Line number 3 to complete the tourism form. Line number 4 to scan your CBX pass and get onto the bridge. Line number 5 to declare how long you will be in the country and pay your $42. Line number 6 to show your passport and paid tourism fee receipt. Line number 7 to get your luggage scanned by Customs officers. Line number 8 to pay for luggage and check it in if you're going to check it. Line number 9 to scan your boarding pass and get into the equivalent of TSA. Line number 10 to place your belongings onto the trays and get through weapons screening. Line number 11 to get on the plane. The only thing that would be worse would be if there were no lines and it was just mayhem. 🙄 I just think the process could be streamlined. One last whine. You can't find a cold drink in the airport. Everything is just under room temp. Oh well. First world problems here.

Review:
If I could give this branch and the manager a zero, I would.  I saw the 2.5 Rating and thought, Can it really be that bad? The answer is yes.
I needed financial documentation proving income.  They said I could not get 12 months of statements only 3 months.  I asked for the manager because I had received this info before at the Hillcrest branch.  He stated I would have to go online and said this was a Chase policy. Basically he straight up lied to me, because I went to the Imperial Beach branch not too far away and they were very helpful.  The Chula Vista manager was very insincere and fake with his politeness.  Customer service is not his forte.  Plus maybe learn the Chase policies.
Do yourself a favor and go to the Imperial Beach Branch.  It might be further away, but you will save time by NOT standing in a line goes outside the building.

Customer service is not its strong. Plus maybe learn the Chase policies. Do yourself a favor and go to the Imperial Beach Branch. It might be further away, but you will save time by NOT standing in a line going outside the building.

Review:
I'm  a disabled person,and I  bank with Chase for many many years.  I am very disappointed  that there are No disabled parking spots, Not a single space! Not only that but
There is NO ramp or a lower sidewalk  for a person like myself  to go up.  I am in a wheelchair.  I had to step up with my cane and the help of my sister. I also noticed  that the staff from the bank stood and watched.  Not having a ramp or lowered sidewalk  goes against
Citizens with disabilities  act.  I am considering  not doing business  with Chase any longer. If I could post with Zero stars I would.
traduccion_nueva: I'm a disabled person, and I bank with Chase for many many years. I am very disappointed that there are No disabled parking spots, Not a single space! Not only that but There is NO ramp or a lower sidewalk for a person like myself to go up. I am in a wheelchair. I had to step up with my dog and the help of my sister. I also noticed that the staff from the bank stood and watched. Not having a ramp or lowered sidewalk goes against Citizens with disabilities act. I am considering not doing business with Chase any longer. If I could post with Zero stars I would.

Review: They make a big deal about bringing in quarters. First of all is your job is to deposit it to my account. They were acting like they didn’t had the time to do that. lady said she couldn’t do more than 10? Lmao just tell me how lazy you really are. Please don’t Bank with Chase save yourself from here. They love to take money from your account and take DAYS to return it. Honestly, the worst of all the girl that was apparently helping me even mocked me and laughed at me? She thought i spoke spanish..call that great costumer service you’re in the USA. She even repeated herself multiple times that i had to count it for her which i did and she then proceeded to tell me i had to COUNT them again. MAKING A BIG DEAL FOR QUATERS? Horrible costumer service. She didn’t even want to give me her name that’s how you know you were doing your job wrong. How about you educate me on why i have to do what you’re asking me instead of giving me attitude? This is the first time i walked into a Chase bank after 6 years. I will be changing banks after this experience. They will laugh at you in your face.
