Para mi es mal servicio.
traduccion_nueva: On May 5 I bought a crib, they were due to deliver on May 9, it is May 23 and they have not delivered. For me it is bad service.

Review: Pesima atención tardados en resolver quise comprar un sofá cama y no responden adecuadamente y no brindan la información correcta asi que termine muy decepcionada no pude comprar nada y no dan ninguna solucion ni apoyo muchisimo menos orientación que terrible atención y me,hicieron perder hora y media
traduccion_nueva: Terrible attention, slow to resolve. I wanted to buy a sofa bed and they do not respond adequately and do not provide the correct information, so I ended up very disappointed. I could not buy anything and they did not give any solution or support, much less guidance than terrible attention and they made me waste an hour and a half.

Review: Considero a la tienda que cumple como n las 3 B, bueno bonito y barato, buenas atención del personal
traduccion_nueva: I consider the store to meet the 3 B's, nice and cheap, good service from the staff

Review: Un servicio rápido y eficiente
traduccion_nueva: Fast and efficient service

Review: #TRATOPREPOTENTE, sin valor corporativo ni humano del “” Gte #Davidsilva y “otros”, de #Coppelbahia en #acapulcoguerrero AUNQUE EXISTA por #profeco la #leydeproteccion al #consumidor GRITÁNDOLES a los que ESPERAN afuera hasta por más de 1 hr PARA PAGAR o COMPRAR… este Seudo Gte me dijo: “a ver si-SI” (retando) con una camarita o video puedes cambiarlo y tan solo pedirle respetara el horario expuesto y q abriera puntual en favor de los clientes (nosotros) q estuvimos hasta + de 10 min después del horario de apertura… ya mande a #multimediostv #pocamadre y otros canales locales el contexto para q al mismo personal gerencial le vale 2 puras y tres cn sal estos puntos prefiriendo gritarnos los de #Coppelbahia #Coppel por ello “exigimos personal calificado” como tu el que cumplamos nuestros acuerdos por contrato y una disculpa pública a los q les faltaron (faltan) todos los días al respeto
traduccion_nueva: #PREPOTENT TREATMENT, without corporate or human value of the “” Gte #Davidsilva and “others”, from #Coppelbahia in #acapulcoguerrero EVEN IF THE #consumerprotectionlaw EXISTS by #profeco, YELLING AT THOSE WHO WAIT OUTSIDE FOR MORE THAN 1 HR TO PAY or BUY… this Pseudo Gte told me: “let's see if-YES” (challenging) with a camera or video you can change it and just ask him to respect the stated schedule and to open on time in favor of the clients (us) who were up to + 10 min after opening hours... I already sent #multimediostv #pocamadre and other local channels the context so that the same management staff is worth 2 and three with these points preferring to shout at us from #Coppelbahia #Coppel for this "we demand staff qualified” like you that we fulfill our contractual agreements and a public apology to those who failed (lack) respect every day

Review:
Excelente Ubicación y Servicios
Personal Adecuado para todos los servicios.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent Location and Services Staff Suitable for all services.

Review: Si está bien el lugar limpio y hay de todo lo que quieras comprar lo único malo es que tiene una lentitud el sistema de internet de Coppel tardas demasiado tiempo formado en cajas de servicios al cliente
traduccion_nueva: If the place is clean and there is everything you want to buy, the only bad thing is that Coppel's internet system is slow, it takes too much time waiting for customer service checkouts.

Review: Poner nas empleados denles trabajo hay mucha fila no los exploten así pongan más personal
traduccion_nueva: Put the employees, give them work, there is a lot of queue, don't exploit them, so put more staff.

Review: Servicio rápido y excelente el trato del personal en turno, con una gran variedad de productos y todo bien arreglado y la limpieza muy limpio
traduccion_nueva: Fast and excellent service, the treatment of the staff on duty, with a wide variety of products and everything well arranged and very clean.

Review: Mal servicio por parte de los trabajadores, no hay probadores
traduccion_nueva: Bad service from the workers, there are no fitting rooms

Review: Bien surtido, le falta un poco más de atención al personal pero tiene variedad
traduccion_nueva: Well stocked, needs a little more attention from the staff but has variety

Review: Muy lento su forma de pago depósito y el banco ni se diga con esos turnos q dan tarda uno una eternidad
traduccion_nueva: Their deposit payment method is very slow and the bank doesn't even mention those shifts that take forever

Review: Muy buena atención y encontré lo que buscaba.
traduccion_nueva: Very good service and I found what I was looking for.

Review:
Gran servicio y atención al cliente.
Falta surtido en pantalón de vestir y ropa deportiva; calzado Nike y Umbro.
traduccion_nueva: Great service and customer care. Lack of stock in dress pants and sportswear; Nike and Umbro shoes.

Review: Hay poco personal para atender
traduccion_nueva: There are few staff to serve

Review: Pésimo servicio al cliente en esta sucursal de Plaza Las Americas. Les recomiendo la sucursal de Nichupte el servicio al cliente es excelente.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service at this Plaza Las Americas branch. I recommend the Nichupte branch, the customer service is excellent.

Review: En esta tienda te discriminan por tu color de piel. Acudí con mi esposo a buscar unos pantalones para él y desde que llegamos la señorita del área no dejó de seguirnos y atosigarnos constantemente con que talla buscábamos, que estilo, 3 veces le dimos las gracias y seguía insistiendo, no nos dejaba ver la ropa tranquilos, nos movimos a la ropa deportiva y enseguida llego la señorita con uno de sus compañeros a quitarnos los pantalones que habíamos escogido, diciendo que “por la marca y el precio deben tenerlos en resguardo”. Le pregunté si eran así con todos sus clientes y me dijo que sí, que si tenía algún inconveniente podía hablar con su gerente, pero mientras estuvimos ahí a nadie más vimos que le pidieran hacer eso. Lo que no quieren admitir es que lo hacen por prejuicio y racismo. Que pésima actitud tienen para tratar con sus clientes, de que sirve que paguen servicio de cámaras y seguridad si van a estar molestando a sus clientes de esa manera solo por su apariencia.
traduccion_nueva: In this store they discriminate against you because of your skin color. I went with my husband to look for some pants for him and since we arrived the lady from the area did not stop following us and constantly harassing us about what size we were looking for, what style, we thanked her three times and she kept insisting, she did not let us see the clothes in peace. , we moved to the sports clothing and immediately the young lady arrived with one of her companions to take off the pants we had chosen, saying that "because of the brand and the price, they should be kept safe." I asked him if they were like that with all their clients and he said yes, if I had any problems I could talk to their manager, but while we were there we saw no one else being asked to do that. What they don't want to admit is that they do it out of prejudice and racism. What a terrible attitude they have when dealing with their clients, what's the point of paying for camera and security services if they are going to be bothering their clients like that just because of their appearance.

Review: Bueno para empezar una sola caja cobrando todo lo de la tienda  se ve a los empleados nada más platicando los de seguridad apenas llegas a sus areas no te quitan la vista de encima, y rematas con unos baños super sucios pare que en todo el dia nadie los atiende, pense que el coppel de puerta la victoria era malo pero ahora viendo este el otro es una maravilla, nada más lo misma de siempre de lo que pecan estas tienda nadie te quiere atender
traduccion_nueva: Well, to start with, there is only one cash register charging for everything in the store, you can see the employees just talking, the security people as soon as you get to their areas, they don't take their eyes off you, and it ends with some super dirty bathrooms so that no one can see them all day long. They serve them, I thought the Victoria door coppel was bad but now seeing this one, the other one is wonderful, nothing more than the same old thing that these stores sin, no one wants to serve you

Review: Muy mala atención de parte de los vendedores del en el área de electrónicos,el disque gerente llamado Oscar tiene una pésima actitud y digo disque porque ni siquiera quiso darme su nombre  los que me dieron el nombre fueron algunos de sus compañeros y lástima iba a comprar un enfriador de aire de 4 mil pesos y no me dio solución no los recomiendo
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service from the sellers in the electronics area, the manager named Oscar has a terrible attitude and I say disc because he didn't even want to give me his name, those who gave me the name were some of his colleagues and it's a shame I was going to buy an air cooler for 4 thousand pesos and it didn't give me a solution I don't recommend them

Review:
Muy desorganizado todo, es una tienda bastante grande así que a veces hay productos que en otras sucursales no tienen, pero siempre está todo revuelto y por no culpar a los empleados la gente también hace mucho desastre, falta demasiada atención en ese aspecto y que asignen más personal para apoyar a la clientela.
También los cajeros te atienden de mala gana, me dejaron un sensor en los pantalones por quererme cobrar rápido y tuve que regresar a qué se lo quitaran. En los zapatos nadie te ayuda y en ropa lo mismo, a eso se debe quizás tanto desorden.
traduccion_nueva: Everything is very disorganized, it is a fairly large store so sometimes there are products that other branches do not have, but everything is always mixed up and not to blame the employees, people also make a lot of mess, there is too much attention lacking in that aspect and they assign more staff to support customers. The cashiers also serve you reluctantly, they left a sensor in my pants because they wanted to charge me quickly and I had to go back to have it removed. No one helps you with your shoes and the same with clothes, perhaps that's why so much disorder.

Review: Usualmente está lleno de clientes, pero hay poco o casi nada de personal que se acerque a ayudarlos. En una ocasión, mi familia y yo presenciamos una discusión entre personal para ver quién de las dos señoritas nos atendía en el área de los colchones, fue bastante incómoda la situación.
traduccion_nueva: It is usually full of customers, but there is little or no staff coming to help them. On one occasion, my family and I witnessed an argument between staff to see which of the two ladies would serve us in the mattress area. The situation was quite uncomfortable.

Review:
Acudí a la sucursal hoy con mi familia y tenían problemas con el sistema por lo que se estaban tardando mucho en cobrar y ya eran las 7:00pm, por lo que nos dieron un turno (de muy mala gana) para pagar en las cajas de abono, al llegar nuestro turno la señorita Emilia quien en ese momento estaba en la caja 10 (que no estaba haciendo nada), nos resivio de una forma muy grosera y enfrente de nosotros comenzó a quejarse con sus compañeros de los costados sobre el trabajo, nos comenzó a escanear los productos y hubo un fallo en el sistema por lo que se le borro lo que había escaneado (4 a 5 prendas) y super molesta y prepotente,  casi aventandonos las cosas volvió a pedir que se las pasáramos de 1 en 1 "porque no tenía espacio) mientras volvía a quejarse con sus compañeros, cuando estaba por terminar dijeron en altavoces que ya iban a cerrar la tienda y su reacción fue decir "Por fin", al entregarnos las compras no las cerró de manera correcta y la tarjeta prácticamente no la aventó nada más.
Espero realmente hagan que sus trabajadores mejoren la atención al cliente y dejen de creer que nos están haciendo un favor al ayudarnos o cobrarnos cuando para eso les pagan.
traduccion_nueva: I went to the branch today with my family and they had problems with the system so it was taking a long time to get paid and it was already 7:00pm, so they gave us a turn (very reluctantly) to pay at the cash registers. subscription, when our turn arrived, Miss Emilia, who at that time was in box 10 (who was not doing anything), greeted us in a very rude manner and in front of us began to complain to her colleagues on the sides about the work, He started to scan the products and there was a failure in the system so what he had scanned was deleted (4 to 5 items of clothing) and super annoying and arrogant, almost throwing things at us, he again asked us to pass them to him 1 at a time "because he didn't have space) while he was complaining again to his colleagues, when he was about to finish they said over loudspeakers that they were going to close the store and his reaction was to say "Finally", when he gave us the purchases he didn't close them correctly and the card he practically didn't throw it at all. I really hope they make their workers improve customer service and stop believing that they are doing us a favor by helping us or charging us when that is what they are paid for.

Review:
Felicito a los dueños de las Tiendas Coppel a nivel nacional, en verdad les dan excelente capacitación a sus colaboradores para que brinden un excelente servicio y atención a sus clientes..

Muchas felicidades...
traduccion_nueva: I congratulate the owners of the Coppel Stores nationwide, they really give excellent training to their collaborators so that they provide excellent service and attention to their customers. Congratulations...

Review: Los de atención a clientes algunos andan de mal humor, puede que te toque algún empleado buena honda,pero aveces hay que esperar lo peor.  Buen lugar ,también hay mucha gente casi todos los días,ir con tiempo ya que si puedes demorar algo .
traduccion_nueva: Some of the customer service people are in a bad mood, you may get a good employee, but sometimes you have to expect the worst. Good place, there are also a lot of people almost every day, go early because you can delay something.

Review: El personal necesita ser más amable y revisar si las personas ocupan apoyo.
traduccion_nueva: Staff need to be friendlier and check if people are supported.

Review: De entrada lo ven a uno como que si no hicieran  un favor ir a realizar un servicio en mi caso yo no voy con regularidad solo que hay tienen sus cuentas en este tipo de lavaderos
traduccion_nueva: At first they see it as if they weren't doing a favor to go do a service. In my case, I don't go regularly, it's just that there are people who have their accounts in this type of laundry.

Review: Pésimo servicio vine a comprar una bocina Alexa I nadie me atendió la srta que está en la puerta principal les hablaba por el radio I nadie estube esperando media hora I mejor me retire ya que enfrente hay un Elektra
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, I came to buy an Alexa speaker. No one answered me. The lady at the main door spoke to them on the radio. No one was waiting for half an hour. I better leave since there is an Elektra in front.

Review: Está atascada la entrada por la parada del camión y que todos se ocultan del sol en la puerta, está muy revuelta el área de ropa, pero el personal femenino te ayuda y atiende bien.
traduccion_nueva: The entrance is blocked by the bus stop and everyone hides from the sun at the door, the clothing area is very messy, but the female staff helps you and takes good care of you.

Review: Voy a hacer un pago a las cajas y las personas que estaban atendiendo platicando de temas personales riéndose mientras uno espera a que lo atienda pésimo servicio
traduccion_nueva: I'm going to make a payment to the cashiers and the people who were serving were talking about personal issues laughing while you wait to be attended to, terrible service.

Review: No cuenta con variedad de productos, sin embargo tiene buen servicio de sus trabajadores 👍
traduccion_nueva: It does not have a variety of products, however it has good service from its workers 👍

Review: Subí a la segunda planta y está todo revuelto lo q es el área de tenis y topa q es adónde yo me dirijo no sé cómo estén las demás áreas ya ni ganas me dieron de verlas xq esas dos áreas están desordenadas q ni los q te atienden saben dónde están las cosas le pedí a la señorita unos tenis pues tuvo q preguntarle cómo a tres de ellas porq nadie sabía dónde estaban del num q yo buscaba mejor me desespere y me fui porq aparecían en sistema pero nada más no los encontraban
traduccion_nueva: I went up to the second floor and everything is mixed up, what is the tennis area and that's where I'm going. I don't know how the other areas are. I don't even want to see them anymore because those two areas are in disarray and not even those who serve you You know where things are, I asked the lady for some tennis shoes because she had to ask her how to get three of them because no one knew where the number I was looking for was, I got desperate and left because they appeared in the system but they just couldn't find them.

Review: Buena atención, pero pocos cajeros para el cobro, deberían capacitar más personal para que no se hagan las filas muy grandes
traduccion_nueva: Good service, but few cashiers to collect, they should train more staff so that the lines do not get too long

Review: Se encuentra más ordenado, pero le falta más diversidad de productos.
traduccion_nueva: It is more organized, but it lacks more diversity of products.

Review: Muy mal servicio no te atienden bien
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, they don't take good care of you

Review: Pisos sucios. Personal nada amable y son entrometidos y no ayudan a encontrar lo que uno busca. 1.Una sra que trabaja ahí tenía uniforme y estaba limpiando me dijo que me tarde mucho en la sección de ropa interior que si mi talla de busto era muy grande en burla riéndose y le contesté: - no, pero que no tenían tallas y no hallaba mi talla de sostén. 2. Sección de niños buscaba pantalón de niño azul marino le pregunté a una chica de ropa y me ahí lo buscará no me ayudo (su actitud así como usted busque a mí no me moleste).
traduccion_nueva: Dirty floors. Staff not at all friendly and are nosy and do not help you find what you are looking for. 1. A woman who works there had a uniform and was cleaning. She told me that it took me a long time in the underwear section and that my bust size was too big, laughing and I answered: - No, but they didn't have sizes and they didn't. I found my bra size. 2. Children's section I was looking for navy blue children's pants. I asked a girl about clothes and she looked for them there. She didn't help me (your attitude, as well as your search for me, doesn't bother me).

Review:
Buena atención de la chica que me atendió. Me ayudó a encontrar lo que buscaba.  Hace falta un poco de agilidad en caja (hay varias cajas en piso pero la mayoría no está en función) mejorar  la actitud de servicio pero todo bien. Un punto en encontra es que no había aire acondicionado eso perjudica ya que no estás cómodo buscando lo que necesitas. Considero deberían tomar en cuenta ese punto.
Otro punto desfavorable es que personal de seguridad solo anda detras de las personas eso es desagradable.
traduccion_nueva: Good attention from the girl who helped me. Helped me find what I was looking for. A little agility is needed at the checkout (there are several checkouts on the floor but most are not working) to improve the service attitude but everything is fine. One negative point is that there was no air conditioning, which is detrimental since you are not comfortable looking for what you need. I think they should take that point into account. Another unfavorable point is that security personnel only go after people, which is unpleasant.

Review: Fui a ver un celular y el modo de vender es horrible parecen perros, peor que en plaza de la tecnología no te dejan preguntar ni elegir te ves obligado por el de OPPO y los de Telcel se imponen a que les compres algo que no necesitas te siguen como perros y tal parece que te van a robar de tanto acoso di mi queja y el gerente se parece a Amlo nada más te da el avión y no pude comprar nada . No es recomendable para comprar celulares mejor compré en Coppel Candiles
traduccion_nueva: I went to see a cell phone and the way they sell it is horrible, they look like dogs, worse than that in the technology plaza they don't let you ask or choose, you are forced by OPPO and those from Telcel force you to buy something from them that you don't need. They continue like dogs and it seems like they are going to rob you because of so much harassment I made my complaint and the manager looks like Amlo as soon as he gives you the plane and I couldn't buy anything. It is not recommended to buy cell phones, I better bought it at Coppel Candiles

Review: Estoy en el último mes de mi embarazo fue la primera vez que entro a esta sucursal. Fui a comprar algunas cosas para el nacimiento de mi bebé. La verdad no me había dado cuenta pero ya me estaban vigilando 4 personas lo cual fue demasiado incómodo seguí viendo que es lo que nesesitaba y cuando termine me dirijo a cajas a pagar. Me fui a la salida, me revisaron mi compra, mi mochila y lo que más me disgusto, fue que me dijera la chica de suguridad qué me levantara la blusa. Yo comentando que estaba embarazada. La verdad se me hizo una falta de respeto porque jamás en otra sucursal se me había tratado de esta manera.
traduccion_nueva: I am in the last month of my pregnancy, it was the first time I entered this branch. I went to buy some things for the birth of my baby. The truth is I hadn't realized it but 4 people were already watching me which was too uncomfortable I kept seeing what I needed and when I finished I went to the cash registers to pay. I went to the exit, they checked my purchase, my backpack and what upset me the most was when the security girl told me to lift my blouse. Me commenting that I was pregnant. The truth is that I was disrespected because I had never been treated this way in another branch.

Review: Me gusta hay variedad de cosas,baños limpios,buen servicio 😃
traduccion_nueva: I like there is a variety of things, clean bathrooms, good service 😃

Review:
Muy mal 😡😡el día de hoy quise comprar unas repisas y la cajera aparte que se tardó mucho tiempo en atenderme para que al final me dijera que no me la podía vender ya que no estaba en inventario pero es increíble ya que la repisa la tenía en mis manos nada más era cargarla al sistema y venderla pero y todavía con su carota me dijo que definitivamente no me la iba a vender pésimo personal la señorita es morenita medio llenita fue como a las 4 de la tarde al final ya no quise comprar nada ya que llevaba dos repisas de diferente modelo
Ni vayan a ese lugar por e servicio del personal 😡😡
traduccion_nueva: Very bad 😡😡 today I wanted to buy some shelves and the cashier aside, it took a long time to serve me so that in the end she told me that she couldn't sell it to me since it wasn't in inventory but it's incredible since she had the shelf In my hands, the only thing was to upload it to the system and sell it, but still with his expensive attitude, he told me that he was definitely not going to sell it to me. Terrible staff. The lady is a half-full brunette. It was about 4 in the afternoon. In the end, I didn't want to buy anything. since it had two shelves of different models. Don't even go to that place because of the staff's service 😡😡

Review: Por seguridad de todos , debieran reparar las cerraduras de sus casilleros.
traduccion_nueva: For everyone's safety, they should repair the locks on their lockers.

Review:
Fui a comprar unos tenis para mi hijo y un par para mi mamá, al entrar el guardia de seguridad NO  REVISÓ las bolsas,  los locker estaban llenos y había demasiada gente, el guardia comento que al salir nos revisarían las bolsas ( OJO: ESTO ES IMPORTANTE AL FINAL EXPLICO POR QUE ).
Toda la tienda estaba desordenada, zapatos regados por todos lados, algunos tenis no tenían su par ni estaban en sus cajas NO  HABIA PERSONAL que diera atención, y definitivamente no podia encontrar lo que yo buscaba, tampoco había tallas en existencia de los modelos que yo queria para mí hijo, y ni hablar del área de dama que estaba más desordenada aún. Había un trabajador quien amablemente me atendía a cómo podía mientras trataba de acomodar el desorden, el lugar estaba repleto de gente que sacaba zapatos y no los colocaba dónde debían.
Una señora que también estaba comprando estaba quejándose por qué no encontraba el par del zapato que ella quería; el empleado dijo que tal vez ya se lo Habían ROBADO ya que TODOS LOS DÍAS SE ROBAN artículos esto debido al exceso de gente que hay ahí y la falta de personal, claro.
Había otra trabajadora que estaba barriendo arrasando con las cajas que estaban en el suelo, el gerente se paseaba por los pasillos con cara de desesperación, osea todo fue un caos la final me atendí yo misma salí de ahí como 8 de la noche y entre desde la 2 de la tarde LO PEOR NO ACABA AQUI, al salir del lugar ya no estaba el guardia de seguridad que me dijo que revisaría las bolsas, solo estaba una persona de intedencia sacando la basura del bote de afuera de la salida principal, SALIMOS SIN QUE NOS REVISARAN LAS BOLSAS NI NADA NI TICKET DE COMPRA NI NADA, EN ESE MOMENTO ENTENDI POR QUE ES QUE COMENTO EL EMPLEADO QUE ROBAN!!!!  OJALA EL DUEÑO DEL ESTABLECIMIENTO PUEDA MEJORAR LA ATENCION A CLIENTE Y LA SEGURIDAD PUES SI YO SALI ASI DE LA NADA CUALQUIER MALIANTE LO HARA TAMBIEN. No creo que el lugar sea malo CREO MAS BIEN QUE ES FALTA DE PERSONAL Y DE CAPACITACIÓN A LA GENTE, TAMBIEN HAY QUE REFORZAR temas de inventario y existencia, y sobre todo la SEGURIDAD.
traduccion_nueva: I went to buy some tennis shoes for my son and a pair for my mother, when I entered the security guard DID NOT CHECK the bags, the lockers were full and there were too many people, the guard commented that when we left they would check our bags (NOTE: THIS IS IMPORTANT AT THE END I EXPLAIN WHY). The entire store was disorganized, shoes scattered everywhere, some tennis shoes did not have their pair nor were they in their boxes. THERE WAS NO STAFF to give attention, and I definitely could not find what I was looking for, there were no sizes in stock of the models I wanted. I wanted it for my son, not to mention the lady's area that was even more messy. There was a worker who kindly helped me as best he could while I tried to clean up the mess. The place was full of people taking out shoes and not putting them where they should. A woman who was also shopping was complaining why she couldn't find the pair of shoes she wanted; The employee said that maybe it had already been STOLEN since items are stolen EVERY DAY, this is due to the excess of people there and the lack of staff, of course. There was another worker who was sweeping, destroying the boxes that were on the floor, the manager was walking through the hallways with a desperate look, I mean everything was chaos, in the end I took care of myself, I left there around 8 at night and entered from at 2 in the afternoon THE WORST DOES NOT END HERE, when I left the place the security guard who told me he would check the bags was no longer there, there was only a person from the administration taking the garbage out of the can outside the main exit, WE LEFT WITHOUT THAT THEY WILL CHECK OUR BAGS OR ANYTHING OR PURCHASE TICKET OR ANYTHING, AT THAT MOMENT I UNDERSTAND WHY THE EMPLOYEE COMMENTED THAT THEY STEAL!!!! I HOPEFULLY THE OWNER OF THE ESTABLISHMENT CAN IMPROVE CUSTOMER SERVICE AND SECURITY BECAUSE IF I COME OUT OF NOWHERE LIKE THIS, ANY CRIMINAL WILL DO IT TOO. I don't think the place is bad, I RATHER THINK IT IS LACK OF STAFF AND TRAINING FOR PEOPLE, WE ALSO NEED TO REINFORCE issues of inventory and existence, and above all SECURITY.

Review: El más fácil para llegar en transporte público o caminando desde el centro de Querétaro, surtido en todos los departamentos. Cajeros automáticos de la compañía.
traduccion_nueva: The easiest to get to by public transportation or walking from the center of Querétaro, stocked in all departments. Company ATMs.

Review:
Muy mal servicio de los cajeros lentos que ese ponen a platicar entre ellos en vez de hacer su trabajo.
Sobre todo uno que se llama Jorge pésimo servicio.
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service from the slow cashiers who talk to each other instead of doing their job. Especially one called Jorge, terrible service.

Review: Muuuuy mal servicio tantas cajas y ninguna sirve tarde una hora entre caja y caja el personal muy desagradable a excepción del guardia en la puerta él si es atento no volvería
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, so many boxes and none are served late, an hour between boxes, very unpleasant staff except for the guard at the door, if he is attentive, I would not return

Review: Bien ubicado buen servicio
traduccion_nueva: Well located good service

Review: Falta capacitación en el personal no en conocimiento técnico, si no en la correcta forma de atender a un cliente, buena tienda pero pésima actitud de sus empleados
traduccion_nueva: There is a lack of training in the staff, not in technical knowledge, but in the correct way to serve a customer, good store but terrible attitude of its employees

Review: Excelente precio, el servicio no siempre es el mismo, sin embargo se compensa con los buenos estrenos.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent price, the service is not always the same, however it is compensated by the good premieres.

Review:
Demasiada gente y muy poco personal.
La ropa zapatos están desordenados
traduccion_nueva: Too many people and too few staff. clothes shoes are messy

Review: Excelente servicio y atención del personal. El seguro de protección familiar muy recomendable.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service and attention from the staff. Highly recommended family protection insurance.

Review: Es una tienda que desde la entrada te reciben dando la bienvenida, es algo que en otros lugares no lo hacen , te brindan un servicio muy bueno
traduccion_nueva: It is a store that welcomes you from the entrance, it is something that other places do not do, they provide you with a very good service

Review: Se batalla mucho hacer un pago, te mandan de un lado a otro cada mes que voy.
traduccion_nueva: It's a lot of trouble to make a payment, they send you from one place to another every month I go.

Review: Buen surtido y calidad en sus diferentes artículos,variedad  de precios en todS sus áreas,buena atención por parte del personal,lo único que les falta es darse más a conocer  porque mucha gente no sabe que existe una tienda coppel en paseo Querétaro,esta muy escondido.
traduccion_nueva: Good assortment and quality in their different items, variety of prices in all areas, good attention from the staff, the only thing they need is to make themselves known more because many people do not know that there is a Coppel store on Paseo Querétaro, it is very hidden.

Review: Hay de todo, pero la relación precio calidad es promedio.
traduccion_nueva: There is everything, but the quality-price ratio is average.

Review: Variedad pero sin mucha calidad si buscas precios bajos. El servicio es mejorable.
traduccion_nueva: Variety but not much quality if you are looking for low prices. The service can be improved.

Review: Excelente servicio. Te atienden muy rápido y son muy amables
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service. They serve you very quickly and are very friendly

Review: Rápida atención sin filas
traduccion_nueva: Quick service without lines

Review:
SON UNOS RATEROS!!!
LLEVO UN MES PIDIENDO UNA ACLARACIÓN POR UN COBRO QUE ME HICIERON EN LA SUCURSAL Y NO ME HAN DADO RESPUESTA.
YA MANDE EVIDENCIA DE QUE SI ME HICIERON EL COBRO Y NO SE VE ABONADO EN MI CUENTA!!!
ME PIDIERON ESTADOS DE CUENTA, CAPTURAS DE PANTALLA Y ACLARACIONES, TODO SE LOS HE MANDADO Y MI DINERO SEGUN ELLOS NO ESTÁ EN SUS CUENTAS, CUÁNDO MI BANCO YA NOS DIO LA CUENTA A LA QUE SE DEPODITARON LOS PAGOS Y EN NÚMERO DE AUTORIZACIÓN Y AÚN ASI SIGUEN NEGANDO QUE MI COBRO PASÓ. SON UNOS INEFICIENTES, TRATAMOS DE HACER LOS PAGOS Y CON SU APLICACIÓN HORRIBLE NO SE PUEDE, TENEMOS QUE ACUDIR A SUCURSAL Y AHORA RESULTA QUE YA NI EN SUCURSAL ES SEGURO PAGAR CON TARJETA DE DÉBITO PORQUE PIERDEN EL DINERO!!!
RATEROS!!!
traduccion_nueva: THEY ARE RATTLEERS!!! I HAVE BEEN ASKING FOR A CLARIFICATION FOR A MONTH FOR A CHARGE THAT THEY MADE TO ME AT THE BRANCH AND THEY HAVE NOT GIVEN ME AN RESPONSE. I ALREADY SENT EVIDENCE THAT THEY MADE THE CHARGE TO ME AND IT WAS NOT PAID TO MY ACCOUNT!!! THEY ASKED ME FOR ACCOUNT STATEMENTS, SCREENSHOTS AND CLARIFICATIONS, I HAVE SENT THEM EVERYTHING AND MY MONEY ACCORDING TO THEM IS NOT IN THEIR ACCOUNTS, WHEN MY BANK ALREADY GAVE US THE ACCOUNT TO WHICH THE PAYMENTS WERE DEPOTITED AND THE AUTHORIZATION NUMBER AND STILL SO THEY CONTINUE TO DENY THAT MY COLLECTION HAPPENED. THEY ARE INEFFICIENT, WE TRY TO MAKE PAYMENTS AND WITH THEIR HORRIBLE APP YOU CAN'T, WE HAVE TO GO TO THE BRANCH AND NOW IT TURNS OUT THAT IT IS NO LONGER SAFE TO PAY WITH A DEBIT CARD BECAUSE THEY LOSE THE MONEY!!! RATHERS!!!

Review: Me gusta mucho el servicio de los empleados ,muy atentos
traduccion_nueva: I really like the service of the employees, very attentive

Review: Excelente cervicio. Gracias a la atenvion de uno de sus trabajadores pude resolver un problema de  telcel.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service. Thanks to the attention of one of their workers I was able to solve a phone problem.

Review: Grosera la persona que esta en accesos, entre por donde segun ellos era salida cuando no esta señalizado. Unos cursos de atención al cliente para el personal
traduccion_nueva: The person who is at the entrance is rude, enter through what they say was the exit when it is not marked. Some customer service courses for staff

Review: Buen surtido de cosas para el hogar, te atienden rápido , los pedidos y pagos son rápidos. Y cada vez que una persona es cliente nueva, lo vocean para aplaudirle
traduccion_nueva: Good assortment of things for the home, they serve you quickly, orders and payments are fast. And every time a person is a new customer, they shout out to applaud them.

Review:
Pésimo servicio en atención a clientes. Las cajeras ineptas y en especial la encargada de laptops.
El disque gerente mediocre no resuelve las necesidades.
Cambien a sus empleados ineptos. No son necesarios para una atención deplorable.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service. The inept cashiers and especially the one in charge of laptops. The mediocre manager does not meet the needs. Change your inept employees. They are not necessary for deplorable care.

Review: Esta bien ubicado poca gente realizando pagos atención rápida y todo en la primera planta ya que muchos coppel hay que subir una segunda planta
traduccion_nueva: It is well located, few people make payments, quick service and everything is on the first floor since many coppels have to go up to the second floor.

Review: Parte de su personal deja mucho que desear en cuanto a atención al cliente. 3n cuanto a la tienda, se encuentra en orden 6 con buen surtido.
traduccion_nueva: Some of their staff leaves a lot to be desired in terms of customer service. As for the store, it is in order 6 with a good assortment.

Review: Gran variedad de productos, personal amable, limpio, con estacionamiento.
traduccion_nueva: Great variety of products, friendly staff, clean, with parking.

Review:
Regularmente tienen mucha gente en el bancoppel y el servicio es lento. También me ha tocado igual, servicio muy lento en las cajas.
Tienen algunas marcas de ropa bonita.
traduccion_nueva: They regularly have a lot of people at the bank and the service is slow. I have also had the same experience, very slow service at the checkout. They have some nice clothing brands.

Review: El servicio de los vendedores deja mucho que desear. Falta atención y servicio
traduccion_nueva: The sellers' service leaves a lot to be desired. Lack of attention and service

Review: Muy amables todos y muy buen servicio
traduccion_nueva: Everyone was very friendly and very good service.

Review: Buenos precios , buena atención! Lugar amplio mucha variedad...!
traduccion_nueva: Good prices, good service! Large place, lots of variety...!

Review: Variedad de productos tanto para casa como la familia a precios justos, recomendable. Sigue sorprendiendome la cantidad de cosas que puedes encontrar en la tienda.
traduccion_nueva: Variety of products for both home and family at fair prices, recommended. It continues to amaze me how many things you can find in the store.

Review: Pues es igual que todos, solo que está más lejos y un pésimo servicio.
traduccion_nueva: Well, it's the same as everyone else, only it's further away and has terrible service.

Review: Pues el teléfono es de adorno, creo Coppel debe tener control sobre los números de atención, seguramente está sonando y los empleados pues en otras actividades, y en su sistema de call Center deben tener seguimiento sobre los productos que van a entregar en tienda para evitar tener que andar marcando a la tienda.. así que no queda de otra que ir a la tienda a preguntar... Esta pesimo  esto
traduccion_nueva: Well, the phone is for decoration, I think Coppel must have control over the service numbers, it is surely ringing and the employees are in other activities, and in their call center system they must have follow-up on the products that they are going to deliver to the store to avoid having to go around dialing the store... so there is no choice but to go to the store to ask... This is terrible

Review:
Me sorprende que desde hace un mes cuando fui por última vez  sigan con problemas en su sistema de cobro con tarjeta en las cajas de  la sección de hogar!!!!
Y te dan la misma explicación...que su sistema no sirve y que tienes que subir a la s cajas de ropa. Me preguntó ..y si una persona tiene dificultades físicas para subir por una cantidad considerable de escaleras, no tiene otra opción? Por qué ellos no pueden solucionar su falta de soporte técnico.
Muy mal!!!
Hasta la tiendita de mi la esquina tiene mejor siste ma cobro con tarjeta.
De pena ajena!!!
traduccion_nueva: I am surprised that since a month ago when I last went they still have problems with their card payment system at the checkouts in the home section!!!! And they give you the same explanation...that their system doesn't work and that you have to go up to the boxes of clothes. He asked me...and if a person has physical difficulties climbing a considerable number of stairs, do they have no other option? Why can't they solve their lack of technical support. Very badly!!! Even the little store on the corner has a better card payment system. Of other people's pity!!!

Review: Hace unos días pase de urgencia a comprar 1 celular... Bueno, pues tuve que perder media hora en el Aurrerá retirando dinero porque no tenían sistema para tarjeta. Además me dieron 450 pesos en dinero electrónico y adivinen? Tampoco lo he podido usar gracias a su innovador sistema y me dicen que vaya al coppel de no sé dónde como si tuviera tiempo y carro para ir a dónde si sirva su pinche sistema. Das vergüenza coppel, hasta la tiendita de abarrotes de mi casa le funciona mejor su sistema.
traduccion_nueva: A few days ago I urgently went to buy a cell phone... Well, I had to waste half an hour in the Aurrerá withdrawing money because they didn't have a card system. They also gave me 450 pesos in electronic money and guess what? I haven't been able to use it either thanks to their innovative system and they tell me to go to the coppel from I don't know where as if I had the time and car to go where their fucking system works. You're ashamed, Coppel, even the little grocery store at my house has a better system.

Review: Por ahora el servicio es bueno, está limpio y respetan los precios. Te atienden muy bien.
traduccion_nueva: For now the service is good, it is clean and they respect the prices. They take care of you very well.

Review:
Me encantó la amable actitud de su personal,surtido de todo.
Me encantó el área de Hogar.
Muchas felicidades a su personal.
Me sentí como 👑 Rey con el excelente servicio.
traduccion_nueva: I loved the friendly attitude of their staff, assortment of everything. I loved the Home area. Many congratulations to your staff. I felt like 👑 King with the excellent service.

Review: Me atendieron muy bien el banco sin fila ni espera muy limpia la tienda
traduccion_nueva: The bank treated me very well without lines or waiting, the store was very clean.

Review: Han mejorado mucho en el servicio... hace más de un año que no pasaba y todos muy atentos y amables... da mucho gusto entrar ... solo un detalle, los de telefonia los veo nuevamente platicando entre ellos y había muchos clientes, que no olviden que Forman parte de la tienda.
traduccion_nueva: They have improved a lot in the service... it has not happened for more than a year and everyone is very attentive and friendly... it is a pleasure to enter... just one detail, I see the telephone people again talking to each other and there were many customers Don't forget that they are part of the store.

Review: Es grande la tienda y hay estacionamiento aún gratuito, el personal es muy amable y ordenada la tienda.
traduccion_nueva: The store is large and there is still free parking, the staff is very friendly and the store is tidy.

Review: Esta bien el lugar, espacioso y con variedad de productos, a menudo hay muchas personas y poco personal para atender, tarda uno mucho tiempo para pagar
traduccion_nueva: The place is good, spacious and with a variety of products, there are often many people and few staff to serve, it takes a long time to pay

Review: La atención de los empleados del departamento son muy amables y te ayudan en todo, pero la atención del personal para las tarjetas, es lentiiiiiiisima, solo para tomar mis datos me tuve que esperar más de dos horas y solo había una persona en el escritorio de junto, no volviera hacer algún trámite, si compras de contado no está mal
traduccion_nueva: The attention of the department employees is very friendly and helps you with everything, but the attention of the staff for the cards is very slow, just to take my information I had to wait more than two hours and there was only one person at the desk. together, do not do any paperwork again, if you buy in cash it is not bad

Review: Atención muy amable, gran variedad de productos navideños y regalos. La ropa es de moda y costos accesibles.
traduccion_nueva: Very friendly service, wide variety of Christmas products and gifts. The clothes are fashionable and affordable.

Review: Excelente servicio. Felicidades al personal que labora en Coppel peña flor
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service. Congratulations to the staff who work at Coppel peña flor

Review: Atención rápida!! apenas se dan abasto para la cantidad de gente que va, aún así tienen muy buena atención
traduccion_nueva: Fast attention!! They can barely cope with the amount of people that come, even so they have very good service.

Review: Muy bueno el personal, pero hace 4 días fui a pagar y di 600 y luego 1000 pero la señorita que estaba atendiendo se robo 100 ya que en mi ticket dice 1500 y no 1600 me parece una falta de respeto y la verdad me da mucho coraje
traduccion_nueva: The staff is very good, but 4 days ago I went to pay and gave 600 and then 1000 but the lady who was serving stole 100 since on my ticket it says 1500 and not 1600, it seems disrespectful to me and the truth is it makes me very angry

Review: La atención es buena, la chica de escritorio no sabe mucho de la aplicación, porque no me deja imprimir estados de cuenta su aplicación y no me supo decir porque no me dejaba ver los estados de cuenta, de ahí en fuera es buena sucursal coppel
traduccion_nueva: The service is good, the girl at the desk doesn't know much about the application, because she doesn't let me print account statements from her application and she couldn't tell me why she wouldn't let me see the account statements, from then on it's a good coppel branch

Review: Pésimo servicio para pago en cajas. Aun qué sé compra en línea por la rapidez,cuando se viene a recoger algún pedido no brindan atención.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service for payment at checkouts. Even though I know how to buy online because of the speed, when you come to pick up an order they do not provide attention.

Review: Excelente servicio,atención y me gusta la variedad que tienen .....
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service, attention and I like the variety they have.....

Review: Un sólo cajero para tanta gente que barbaridad 😔 empezando desde el portero que te manda a otro lugar que no es y ahí tienes que andar preguntando, pésima atención 🤦
traduccion_nueva: Only one ATM for so many people, what an outrage 😔 starting from the doorman who sends you to another place that isn't there and you have to keep asking questions, terrible service 🤦

Review: Por lo gral. aquí el personal es  amable, acomedidos menos joyería por lo general está bien
traduccion_nueva: For the most part. The staff here is friendly, accommodating less jewelry is usually fine

Review: Bien... Pequeño pero surtido y buena atención del personal...
traduccion_nueva: Good... Small but well-stocked and good service from the staff...

Review: Muy buen servicio,aunque últimamente tiene poco personal en cuanto al área de cajas
traduccion_nueva: Very good service, although lately there is little staff in the cashier area

Review: Sus muebles son de muy mala calidad dos veces cambie un sofacama y aún así salí defectuosos
traduccion_nueva: Their furniture is of very poor quality. I changed a sofa bed twice and it still came out defective.

Review: No compre pero me di cuenta que al personal le da lo mismo que estés o no estés no se hacercan para nada
traduccion_nueva: I didn't buy but I realized that the staff doesn't care whether you are there or not, they won't do anything

Review: Me parece que en cuanto a seguridad de las cuentas es bastante malo este banco, hace poco me estafaron en un cajero automático y ellos se demoraron varios días y al final no me reintegraron el dinero, es un banco muy poco confiable.
traduccion_nueva: It seems to me that in terms of account security this bank is quite bad, I was recently scammed at an ATM and they delayed several days and in the end they did not refund the money, it is a very unreliable bank.

Review: El personal sumamente grosero , sin educación y no hay nada en la tienda
traduccion_nueva: The staff is extremely rude, uneducated and there is nothing in the store

Review: Excelente servicio muy bonito lugar moderno
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service very nice modern place

Review: Muy buena atencion del personal
traduccion_nueva: Very good staff attention

Review:
Tengan cuidado cuando realicen compras con tarjeta de crédito. Hice una compra con mi tarjeta de crédito y supuestamente se canceló y no pasó. No me dieron ningún ticket de que se canceló la compa y no me pude llevar la mercancía.

Después fui a reclamar por qué si se había reflejado en mi app, y me dijeron que esperara 7 días en lo que se reflejaba en el banco de Coppel, por que supuestamente aparecía en tránsito, y aparte tenia que traer el estado de cuenta impreso de mi tarjeta. Hasta el momento estoy pendiente de ir, con mis movimientos impresos, por qué necesitan pruebas para archivarlas. Qué fastidio, de verdad.

Fui en día sábado y según que era un problema a nivel nacional del fallo de las terminales.

Pareciera que son prácticas de los mismos empleados, o no se, porque cuando estábamos formados una señora reclamaba que le habían cobrado de más y le estaban devolvieron su dinero.
traduccion_nueva: Be careful when making credit card purchases. I made a purchase with my credit card and it was supposedly canceled and didn't go through. They did not give me any receipt that the purchase was canceled and I could not take the merchandise. Then I went to complain about why it had been reflected in my app, and they told me to wait 7 days for what was reflected in the Coppel bank, because it supposedly appeared in transit, and I also had to bring the printed account statement from my card. So far I'm waiting to go, with my printed movements, because they need proof to file them. What a bummer, really. I went on a Saturday and it was said that it was a nationwide problem with the failure of the terminals. It seems that they are practices of the employees themselves, or I don't know, because when we were training a woman complained that they had overcharged her and they were giving her her money back.

Review: Mal servicio no confiar en sus vendedores la persona de Telcel que vendió el teléfono M. Guadalupe Gómez Morales y la vendedora María Josefina Ramones, a una adulta mayor le vendieron un teléfono celular diciendo que estaba en descuento y que tenía 3 meses de garantía y pura mentira, dejo de funcionar, no le hicieron válida la garantía, ni la devolución y ahora tiene que pagar un teléfono que no funciona  Son pésimos sus servicios de la gerente Daniela Devia Cabrera solo se hizo la desentendida diciendo que el cliente había entendido mal, aún habiendo testigos de lo que le habían dicho, diciendo que ni garantía de esa marca tenían y haciéndose tontos todos y echándole la culpa al cliente cuando ellos mismo incumplen y venden con mentiras y dolosamente.
traduccion_nueva: Bad service, do not trust your sellers, the person from Telcel who sold the phone, M. Guadalupe Gómez Morales, and the saleswoman, María Josefina Ramones, sold an older adult a cell phone saying that it was on discount and that it had a 3-month warranty and was pure lie, it stopped working, the warranty or the refund were not valid and now you have to pay for a phone that doesn't work. The manager's services are terrible. Daniela Devia Cabrera just pretended not to understand, saying that the customer had misunderstood, even There were witnesses of what they had told them, saying that they didn't even have a guarantee for that brand and they all made fools of themselves and blamed the client when they themselves failed to comply and sold with lies and fraudulently.

Review: Bueno atención por parte de la cajera surgió un problema y me lo resolvió el gerente personalmente muchas gracias
traduccion_nueva: Good service from the cashier, a problem arose and the manager personally resolved it, thank you very much

Review: Me vendieron una moto que no sirve, la entregaron con una envoltura de galletas en el carburador. Cuando la sacaron de la tienda no arrancó, se la quedaron 1 semana según reparándola pero desde entonces solo ha tenido falla tras falla. Apenas lleva 3 meses y no arranca, ¿Alguien puede asesorarme? porque se niegan a darme una garantía y un buen servicio.
traduccion_nueva: They sold me a motorcycle that is useless, they delivered it with a cookie wrapper on the carburetor. When they took it out of the store it didn't start, they kept it for 1 week to repair it but since then it has only had failure after failure. It's only been on for 3 months and it won't start. Can anyone advise me? because they refuse to give me a guarantee and good service.

Review: En estas tiendas puedes encontrar los productos de vestir y calzado así como productos del hogar y equipos de celular muy excelentes y motos para tu transporte buen servicio
traduccion_nueva: In these stores you can find clothing and footwear products as well as household products and very excellent cell phone equipment and motorcycles for your transportation, good service.

Review: Muy buena atencion del todo el personal, hasta los de seguridad te apoyan, muy bien surtida.
traduccion_nueva: Very good attention from all the staff, even the security supports you, very well stocked.

Review: Un buen servicio para depósitos
traduccion_nueva: A good service for deposits

Review: Buena atención y muy rápido,, y sin tanto rollo
traduccion_nueva: Good service and very fast, and without much fuss

Review: Excelente servicio y muy buena onda sus trabajadores
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service and very good vibes from their workers

Review: Terrible customer service at the remittance desk. I arrived at 7:00 exactly to take out money that had been sent to me and I was greeted by a snarky employee telling me that I was cutting it close because they were closing soon. After bearing that awful attitude I asked to pick up the money and to my surprise he told me that he could not complete the transaction before they closed, there was still 30 minutes till closing, even if that were true which it wasn’t I was still in line with an adequate amount of time regardless of when they close I as a customer should have been attended accordingly.  I’ve gone for money before and takes them about 10 minutes to complete the transaction from start to finish so this was just a case of laziness and incompetence.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service at the remittance desk. I arrived at 7:00 exactly to take out money that had been sent to me and I was greeted by a snarky employee telling me that I was cutting it close because they were closing soon. After bearing that awful attitude I asked to pick up the money and to my surprise he told me that he could not complete the transaction before they closed, there was still 30 minutes until closing, even if that were true which it wasn't I was still in line with an adequate amount of time regardless of when they close I as a customer should have been attended accordingly. I've gone for money before and it takes them about 10 minutes to complete the transaction from start to finish so this was just a case of laziness and incompetence.

Review: Excelente si te quieres endeudar con mercancía de mala calidad o de buena calidad pero a precio de estreno sin rebajas aun que tenga 3años de estar exhibido
traduccion_nueva: Excellent if you want to go into debt with poor quality or good quality merchandise but at a premiere price without discounts even if it has been on display for 3 years

Review: La mayoría de ocasiones he tenido satisfacción total cuando voy. Punto a favor que ya compusieron el elevador
traduccion_nueva: Most of the time I have had total satisfaction when I go. Point in favor that they already composed the elevator

Review: Rápido servicio espero que en mi próximo visita sea igual saludos 🙂
traduccion_nueva: Fast service, I hope it will be the same on my next visit, greetings 🙂

Review: Mal servicio o son nada atentos les preguntas algo y no saben contestar
traduccion_nueva: Bad service or they are not attentive at all, you ask them something and they don't know how to answer

Review: el servicio no suele ser muy destacable, cuando pides ayuda o información te mandan con otras personas y se hacen bolas ellos mismos, aún que aveces puede tocar uno que otro empleado que sea amable y atento para ayudarte.
traduccion_nueva: The service is not usually very remarkable, when you ask for help or information they send you to other people and they make a fuss themselves, even though sometimes one or another employee who is friendly and attentive can help you.

Review:
Pésima atención
Compramos una lavadora el día 12 de mayo
Diciendo que llegaría el día 3 de Junio
No existía ninguna lavadora
Se levantó reporte
Y aún así les valió madres
Nos dieron una que estaba en tienda
De malaanera
Prepotentes todos los colaboradores
Aparte de que nos dieron la lavadora
Sin caja
Nosotros por la desesperación agarramos esa lavadora
Ya que agurmentaron que si queríamos una lavadora nueva
Nueva
Tardaría nuevamente de 15 a 45 días en llegar
PÉSIMO SERVICIO EN TODOS SUS ASPECTOS
DESDE EL CALL CENTER
HASTA EN SUCURSA
ASQUEROSIDAD DE SERVICIO COPPEL LAS AMÉRICAS
SI PUEDEN EVITEN COMPRAR AQUI
traduccion_nueva: Terrible attention We bought a washing machine on May 12 Saying that it would arrive on June 3 There was no washing machine A report was filed And even then it was worth it mothers They gave us one that was in the store All the collaborators were rude Arrogant Apart from the fact that they gave us the washing machine Without box We grabbed that washing machine out of desperation since they said that if we wanted a new washing machine New It would take 15 to 45 days again to arrive TERRIBLE SERVICE IN ALL ITS ASPECTS FROM THE CALL CENTER TO THE BRANCH DISGUSTING COPPEL SERVICE THE AMERICAS IF THEY CAN AVOID BUYING HERE

Review: Tienen variedad de productos pero algunas cosas no son de tan buena calidad, compre unos zapatos ahí y se despego la suela en menos de un mes. Además no prenden el aire acondicionado arriba y hace mucho calor, en especial los vestidores y es muy antihigiénico probarse así la ropa así, no dan ganas de estar ahí solo por el calor que hace.
traduccion_nueva: They have a variety of products but some things are not of such good quality, I bought some shoes there and the sole came off in less than a month. Also, they don't turn on the air conditioning upstairs and it's very hot, especially in the changing rooms, and it's very unhygienic to try on clothes like that, you don't want to be there just because of how hot it is.

Review:
Mi experiencia en Coppel Plaza Las Américas en Cancún fue decepcionante, lo que me lleva a otorgar una estrella en mi reseña. La mala atención y la actitud prepotente de los empleados dejaron mucho que desear.

Desde el momento en que ingresé a la tienda, noté una falta de interés por parte del personal en atender a los clientes. Esperaba recibir asistencia para encontrar lo que necesitaba, pero me encontré con empleados que parecían estar más interesados en charlar entre ellos que en ayudar a los compradores.

Cuando finalmente logré llamar la atención de uno de ellos, su actitud prepotente y su tono condescendiente fueron evidentes. En lugar de responder a mis preguntas de manera amable y educada, me hicieron sentir como si estuviera molestando y mi presencia no fuera bienvenida.

Además, noté una falta de conocimiento sobre los productos que apoyaron. Cuando pedí información adicional sobre un artículo en particular, el empleado no pudo proporcionar detalles básicos y parecía estar improvisando respuestas sin fundamentos.

En resumen, mi visita a Coppel Plaza Las Américas fue una experiencia frustrante y desagradable debido a la mala atención y la prepotencia de los empleados. Esperaba recibir un servicio de calidad, pero me fui sintiéndome ignorado y maltratado. No recomendaría esta tienda a otros debido a esta experiencia negativa.
traduccion_nueva: My experience at Coppel Plaza Las Américas in Cancun was disappointing, which leads me to award one star in my review. The poor service and arrogant attitude of the employees left much to be desired. From the moment I entered the store, I noticed a lack of interest on the part of the staff in serving customers. I expected assistance in finding what I needed, but I encountered employees who seemed more interested in chatting with each other than helping shoppers. When I finally managed to get the attention of one of them, his overbearing attitude and condescending tone were evident. Instead of answering my questions in a friendly and polite manner, they made me feel like I was intruding and my presence was unwelcome. Additionally, I noticed a lack of knowledge about the products they supported. When I asked for additional information about a particular item, the employee was unable to provide basic details and seemed to be improvising unsubstantiated answers. In summary, my visit to Coppel Plaza Las Américas was a frustrating and unpleasant experience due to the poor service and arrogance of the employees. I expected to receive quality service, but left feeling ignored and mistreated. I would not recommend this store to others due to this negative experience.

Review: Desagradable lugar desde ese día que lo visite por lo sucedido , a quien se le ocurre abrir su negocio un día después de a ver sucedido algo trágico , ni por respeto ?

Review: El día de hoy fuí a pagar $99 cuando la cajera vió que pagaría con $500 me dijo no tengo cambio, entonces le pagué con un billete de $100 y me dijo muy grosera que no tengo cambio, cómo ya me estaba hablando muy grosera le dije "pues deberías tener" y me dijo muy enojada "deme un peso para darle 5" y se lo di, en la mano así cómo anteriormente le di el billete en la mano, y ella me aventó los 5 pesos en el mostrador, y le dije "me das tu nombre por favor" y le hablo al gerente (me dijo llamarse Javier Medina" y le gritó "está señora me quiere reportar porque no tengo cambio" y le dije -no, no te voy a reportar por el cambio, te voy a reportar porque eres una grosera- apenas le iba a explicar lo sucedido al gerente, cuando me interrumpió y me dice "yo lo veo con ella" nuevamente intenté explicarle ya que solo escucho la versión de la chica" y me volvió a decir ---yo lo veo con ella-- no es posible que está chica me trate tan mal y para colmo mí siquiera reciba una represalia, y deberían capacitar al gerente para que sepa cómo tratar a clientes molestos, ya que no supo manejar la situación, no es una persona preparada.
traduccion_nueva: Today I went to pay $99 when the cashier saw that I would pay with $500 and she told me I don't have change, so I paid her with a $100 bill and she told me very rudely that I don't have change, since she was already talking to me very rudely I told her " well you should have it" and she told me very angry "give me a peso to give you 5" and I gave it to her, in my hand just as I previously gave her the bill in my hand, and she threw the 5 pesos at me on the counter, and I told her "give me your name please" and I spoke to the manager (he told me his name was Javier Medina) and he yelled at him "this lady wants to report me because I don't have change" and I told him -no, I'm not going to report you for the change, I I'm going to report it because you're rude - I was barely going to explain what happened to the manager, when he interrupted me and told me "I see it with her" again I tried to explain since I only hear the girl's version" and he told me again - --I see it with her-- it is not possible that this girl treats me so badly and to make matters worse I even receive retaliation, and they should train the manager so that he knows how to deal with annoying customers, since he did not know how to handle the situation, He is not a prepared person.

Review: Incompetent banker! First of all, a sale person should know who they’re working with.  First, be honest and ethical .. don’t tell me to open a new account when your promo said new OR “existing”, secondly “I don’t know..” should never be coming out of a service person even if you don’t know.  I made an appointment to add myself to my mother account to help her with her banking needs.  Unfortunately they cannot add me bc they have my Maiden name on their file which was 20+ years ago.  There were NO SOLUTIONS other than I’m sorry you’ll need to bring proof that you changed your name.  I guess MY LEGAL DRIVER LICESE AND MY LEGAL BANK CARDS FROM MAJOR BANKS aren’t enough. Lastly, hope you’re reading this…I called 1800 and he confirmed that NO NEW SAVINGS need to open for the current promotion.  I also OPENED.a joint saving account with my mother under my current legal name with no issue.     Also, I was told deceased father is still on a joint saving account with my mother .  We closed out their joint checking and savings with his death certificate 2 years ago.  SAME BRANCH!!! Unbelievable!!!
traduccion_nueva: Incompetent banker! First of all, a sale person should know who they're working with. First, be honest and ethical .. don't tell me to open a new account when your promo said new OR “existing”, secondly “I don't know..” should never be coming out of a service person even if you don't know. I made an appointment to add myself to my mother account to help her with her banking needs. Unfortunately they cannot add me bc they have my Maiden name on their file which was 20+ years ago. There were NO SOLUTIONS other than I'm sorry you'll need to bring proof that you changed your name. I guess MY LEGAL DRIVER LICESE AND MY LEGAL BANK CARDS FROM MAJOR BANKS aren't enough. Lastly, hope you're reading this…I called 1800 and I have confirmed that NO NEW SAVINGS need to open for the current promotion. I also OPENED.a joint saving account with my mother under my current legal name with no issue. Also, I was told deceased father is still on a joint saving account with my mother. We closed out their joint checking and savings with his death certificate 2 years ago. SAME BRANCH!!! Unbelievable!!!

Review:
Tiene supermercado, el cual ya cuenta con cajas de autopago. Hay locales de ropa, zapatos comida, dulces, maquillaje, electrónicos y almacenes de productos variados. Cuenta con un módulo de pagos y gestiones de gobierno. Prácticamente puedes comprar de todo. En horas muy saturadas, batallas para estacionarte; es una plaza chica, pero cómoda y el estacionamiento de cortesía es muy barato (dos pesos por dos horas con $100.00 de consumo).
Además está muy bien ubicada.
traduccion_nueva: It has a supermarket, which already has self-payment checkouts. There are stores selling clothing, shoes, food, candy, makeup, electronics, and stores selling various products. It has a payment and government management module. You can practically buy everything. During busy hours, battles to park; It is a small space, but comfortable and the courtesy parking is very cheap (two pesos for two hours with $100.00 consumption). It is also very well located.

traduccion_nueva: Fortnight days, peak shopping hours, only 2 cashiers and 1 of them in training, they have self-service checkouts and you can only pay for 20 items and those of us who buy more go on the road, I spent 45 minutes in the row, such inconsideration is not possible.

Review: Recently acoomompanird my elderly Mother to take care of very simple business. I have never met such rude employees BUT only to elderly individuals. Not the actual bankers the tellers and Receptionist. They actually went out of their way to talk down to the elderly people that came in. A older Hispanic man with glasses just took the cake. I have never been so disgusted in my life. I will be closing my accounts with Bank of America. Horribly unprofessional and the Manager should remind the Employees that the Eldery should treating with respect. Shame on all of them. I hope someone treats their Eldetly loved ones like they treated the customers I saw in Lobby. Absolutely shameful.

Review: El servicio y propuesta de Banregio me gusta. Lo que no me encanta es que sólo tiene 3 sucursales en la 5ta ciudad  más grande del país, todas en el sur /sur poniente y para mi me queda a media ciudad de distancia; no tiene practicaja y no acepta pagos en ningún otro lado, por lo que hay que hacer excursión para algún depósito si se necesita que caiga en fir, ya que transferencias de otros bancos tardan 24 horas.
traduccion_nueva: I like Banregio's service and proposal. What I don't love is that it only has 3 branches in the 5th largest city in the country, all in the south/southwest and for me it is half a city away; It has no practice and does not accept payments anywhere else, so you have to make a deposit if you need it to fall into fir, since transfers from other banks take 24 hours.

Review: Buen servicio mas el ejecutivo no supo (o quiso) abrir el producto que buscaba, recomiendo ir a la sucursal de Las Ánimas.
traduccion_nueva: Good service but the executive did not know how (or wanted to) open the product I was looking for, I recommend going to the Las Ánimas branch.

Review: El trato y la capacitación del personal lo peor, todavía se equivocan, uno se molesta y te dicen que sino vengas otro día, sino les gusta su trabajo que no se renten. Desde la recepcionista hasta el que entrega las tarjetas de nomina, pues si es trabajo, parece que van a divertirse
traduccion_nueva: The treatment and training of the staff is the worst, they still make mistakes, you get upset and they tell you not to come another day, if they don't like their job, they shouldn't rent. From the receptionist to the person who delivers the payroll cards, well if it's work, it seems like they're going to have fun

Review: De los peores bancos en cuestión de atención a clientes, no respetan turno de llegada, no hay alguien en recepción y lo pero de todo es que no tiene estacionamiento, esto representa un problema porque está sobre el Blvd y no hay en donde dejar tu auto.

Review: Súper buena atención al cliente y la app muy fácil de usar 👏🏼

Review: Pésimo servicio desde la presentación de el personal de información, todo el cuello de la camisa chueco, y solo habiendo un ejecutivo para atender y con gente esperando su turno, no hay orden y solo pasa el personal de un lado a otro sin decir nada... Mal servicio del personal de esa sucursal, lastima de la empresa a la que representan
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from the presentation of the information staff, the entire collar of the shirt is crooked, and there is only one executive to serve and with people waiting their turn, there is no order and only the staff passes from one side to the other without saying anything. .. Bad service from the staff of that branch, shame on the company they represent

traduccion_nueva: 100% recommended the service of the business executive, Diego is super friendly, he explains very well all the processes of my cards and terminals for my office!

Review: Horrible servicio Fuy a tramitar una tarjeta de nómina y me tardaron 2 horas no lo recomiendo para nada las cajeras solo se la pasan platicando y no hay quein atienda eficazmente, primera y última vez que acuso a esa sucursal ojalá y cambien el personal se nota que no les gusta su trabajo

Review: Lastima que no se puede poner 0 pero su servicio es pésimo para pasar tardas mas de dos horas y los ejecutivos van y salen de la sucursal a hacer sabe que, pasas y el trato es pésimo si tienen la oportunidad de ir a esta sucursal no vayan
traduccion_nueva: It's a shame that you can't put 0 but their service is terrible, it takes more than two hours and the executives go in and out of the branch to make you know that, you go in and the treatment is terrible. If you have the opportunity to go to this branch, don't go.

Review: Ayer 27_03_24 acudí ala sucursal y solo había dos cajeras y había una persona de la tercera edad con una canasta llena de dulces y lo regreso ala fila como 3 veces diciéndole que no lo IVA a atender el señor ya desesperado va y le dice que hasta que hora tiene que esperar total la cajera con una actitud horrible y prepotente,me toca pasar y no me quiere atender que pase a la otra caja la verdad deberían de quitarla no es la primera vez que me toca ella y siempre es la misma historia pésimo servicio
traduccion_nueva: Yesterday, 03/27/24, I went to the branch and there were only two cashiers and there was an elderly person with a basket full of sweets and I returned him to the line about 3 times, telling him that I would not attend to him. The desperate man goes and tells him that until The cashier has to wait for a whole hour with a horrible and arrogant attitude, it's my turn to come in and she doesn't want to help me go to the other cashier. The truth is, they should remove her. It's not the first time she's touched me and it's always the same story. Terrible service.

Review: No atienden bien. Y sus cajeros fallan demasiado. Su personal no se esmera en dar solución a los problemas.
traduccion_nueva: They don't serve you well. And their ATMs fail too much. Their staff does not make an effort to solve problems.

Review: Filas enormes con atención ultra lenta. Personal apático desde la entrada.
traduccion_nueva: Huge lines with ultra-slow service. Apathetic staff from the entrance.

Review: Con su nueva imagen se siente uno mejor solo que es tardado el servicio para pasar con un ejecutivo

Review:
Pésimo servicio.
3 veces fui para abrir una cuenta de nomina y te dan una de ahorro argumentando que es el mismo producto, lo que no te explican es que tienes que tener mínimo 4 mil pesos en la cuenta para que no te generen interés
La verdad no te dan el producto que requieres
Asco de personal
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. 3 times I went to open a payroll account and they gave you a savings account arguing that it is the same product, what they did not explain to you is that you have to have a minimum of 4 thousand pesos in the account so that they do not generate interest. The truth is they do not give you the product you need Personal Disgust

Review: Banco mas poco profecional, sus horarios  estan mal dicen que estan abiertos y llegas y cerrado,su personal d 2 personas en sabado es increible lo poco profecional que son y el cajero te retiene la tqrjeta de debito cada vez que puede que fiasco
traduccion_nueva: Most unprofessional bank, their hours are wrong, they say they are open and you arrive and they close, their staff is 2 people on a Saturday, it is incredible how unprofessional they are and the teller retains your debit card every time it may fiasco

Review: Súper lentooooo el servicio, tan solo acudí para una cuenta nómina y el proceso duró dls horas. QUE INEFICIENCIA.
traduccion_nueva: The service was super slow, I only went for a payroll account and the process took two hours. WHAT INEFFICIENCY.

Review: Pésimo servicio, abrieron cajas a las 8:50 y lo peor que era el gerente
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they opened checkouts at 8:50 and the worst thing was the manager

Review: El peor banco que he visitado en la vida. Llegue a la 1 en sábado, la cajera se salía y entraba cada 5 minutos por lo que la fila no avanzaba NADA, cuando llega mi turno ya eran las 2, había más de 15 personas esperando aparte de mí. La señora dice que ya no nos iba a atender, le comento que llevaba más de una hora esperando y su respuesta fue “yo llevo 8 aquí, imagínate”, que asco de banco y de personal, aparte de que no hacen bien su trabajo te quieren hacer creer que es tu culpa que no te atiendan oportunamente. Si tienen la oportunidad de ser clientes HSBC, desaprovéchenla siempre y por mi cuenta siempre que pueda voy a criticar este banco para que nadie lo utilice. Mil veces mejor bbva, santander, banamex, afirme.🤫
traduccion_nueva: The worst bank I have ever visited in my life. I arrived at 1 on a Saturday, the cashier left and came in every 5 minutes so the line didn't advance AT ALL, when my turn arrived it was already 2, there were more than 15 people waiting besides me. The lady said that she was no longer going to serve us, I told her that she had been waiting for more than an hour and her response was “I've been here for 8, imagine”, what a disgusting bank and staff, apart from the fact that they don't do their job well. They want to make you believe that it is your fault that they do not attend to you in a timely manner. If you have the opportunity to be HSBC customers, always miss it and on my own, whenever I can, I will criticize this bank so that no one uses it. A thousand times better BBVA, Santander, Banamex, affirm.🤫

Review:
El servicio bancario es bueno. La atención por parte del personal suele ser adecuada y amable.

El inconveniente es que tardan mucho en brindar atención a tantas personas, cada visita es considerar mínimo 1 hora.
En general es bueno y el personal te atiende resolviendo tus dudas.
traduccion_nueva: Banking service is good. The attention from the staff is usually adequate and friendly. This branch is open on Saturdays, making it practical for those who cannot attend during the week. The drawback is that they take a long time to provide care to so many people, each visit is considered a minimum of 1 hour. In general it is good and the staff assists you by answering your questions.

Review: Te atienden con rapidez con atención al cliente y en cajas pero ocasionalmente el tiempo de espera es largo

On the two occasions that I have gone to this Bank they have been bad experiences, because in both cases the shifts are not respected and they make people who arrived later go to the window, you ask for an explanation from the person at the entrance and they do not give you an explanation.

Review: Ni una estrella, pésimo servicio, hoy me urgía hacer un cheque de caja y que no pueden hacerlos, quise cambiar mi cuenta a cheques entonces para girar uno propio, pero que hasta las 12 llegaba quien autoriza, no respetan el tiempo de los clientes.

Review: Las prácticajas roban el dinero, el gerente y personal de la sucursal está coludido no se hacen responsables, la denuncia lleva al más de 6 meses y no hay respuesta por parte de la institución bancaria. No es confiable para realizar depósitos.
traduccion_nueva: The practices steal the money, the manager and staff of the branch are in collusion, they are not responsible, the complaint has been going on for more than 6 months and there is no response from the banking institution. It is not reliable for making deposits.

Review: Excelente sucursal, personal amable y servicial muy buenos ejecutivos 👏

Review: hola saludos al gerente del banco. una vez fui de noche y una patrulla que estaba estacionada a la entrada del banco habia un policia orinandose en la reja de CDO negocios (lugar donde laboro), y seria bueno habilitaran un sanitario para ellos  ya que en ese lugar estara nuestro comedor y no va a ser agradable ese olor, espero nos ayuden y tambien cubrir esa necesidad de los vigilantes.
traduccion_nueva: Hello, greetings to the bank manager. Once I went at night and a patrol car that was parked at the entrance to the bank had a police officer urinating on the fence of CDO businesses (where I work), and it would be good if they had a toilet for them since our dining room would be there and not That smell is going to be pleasant, I hope you can help us and also cover the need of the security guards.

Review: Es un buen banco y su personal teatiende de una .manera  muy cordial

Review: Es un desastre total!! Dan pena. traduccion_nueva: It's a total disaster!! They are sad. Review: El empleado de la entrada (chico moreno de cabello rizado y algo panzón) es de lo más grosero. Del resto del banco ni hablar. NO SOLUCIONARON NADA.

Of course, he wants to embarrass you with a thousand things. Not to mention the rest of the bank. THEY DIDN'T SOLVE ANYTHING.

Review: No hay nadie. Saco turno.  Cinco personas para atender y nadie atiende.  Muy mal sevicio

Review: Tiene estacionamiento propio ya es un punto a su favor, tiene cajero pero no "practicaja", está abriendo los sábados, buena atención de ejecutivos y cajeros

Deberían capacitar mejor a la personas que dan servicio al cliente, así ni ganas dan de aperturar una cuenta en este Banco

The girl who helps you request your turn is very rude, apparently she is also an executive but I had to see that she gives very unfortunate responses to people who are not clients of the bank. They should better train the people who provide customer service, so they don't even want to open an account at this bank.

Review: Pésimo servicio, súper lentos y jetones

Review: No vengas si no eres cliente. Horas de espera. Pésimo servicio.

Review: Excelente servicio y atención al cliente. Abren los sábados de 9 am a 2 pm :)
