El lugar de medio pelo, el ambiente en cuanto a la música se refiere es calmado, quizás por la hora a la que fui a las 3:00pm, entonces estaba bien para poder charlar, tal vez mas tarde a la hora de la música en vivo se prenda mas, cosa que se comprende.
El servicio por parte de las meseras es un poco lento, al inicio nos atienden para que pidamos pronto, después tardan en pasar para saber si no te hace falta algo, yo creo que es para que no comas mucho del buffet, puede ser también porque no hay meseras suficientes, había solo tres meseras y no se daban abasto, eso que no había mucha gente pero ya comenzaban a llegar mas clientes.
La comida no es tan buena, la hamburguesa con carne tipo Aurrera, de esa congelada, las alitas regulares con poco aderezo pero bastas, según al principio eran 10 y solo me dieron 7, las siguientes te dan de 5 en 5. Los nachos ni los pidan, muy sosos y con muy poco queso, poco frijol, poca salsa.
Si es para matar un poco el hambre y no importa la calidad, tan solo la cantidad, es el lugar. Las bebidas con un precio regular.
Al pagar te dan la cuenta y te dicen que el servicio es aparte, piden el 15%, yo di un 10% aunque no debe ser obligatorio.
En general si corrigen el servicio al cliente, las meseras se organizan mas y cuidan a sus clientes, las alitas mejor aderezadas, la hamburguesa con mejor carne o mejor sabor, entonces sería un lugar que frecuentaría mas a menudo.
traduccion_nueva: The place is average, the atmosphere in terms of music is calm, perhaps because of the time I went at 3:00 pm, so it was good to be able to chat, maybe later at the time of the music in alive it turns on more, which is understandable. The service from the waitresses is a little slow, at first they serve us so that we order quickly, then they take a while to come by to know if you don't need something, I think it's so that you don't eat too much of the buffet, it could also be because There are not enough waitresses, there were only three waitresses and they couldn't cope, there weren't many people but more customers were beginning to arrive. The food is not that good, the burger with Aurrera type meat, the frozen kind, the regular wings with little dressing but enough, according to the beginning there were 10 and they only gave me 7, the following ones they give you 5 at a time. The nachos are not even They ask for them, very bland and with very little cheese, little beans, little sauce. If it's to kill your hunger a little and the quality doesn't matter, just the quantity, it's the place. Drinks with a regular price. When paying they give you the bill and tell you that the service is separate, they ask for 15%, I gave 10% although it should not be mandatory. In general, if they improve customer service, the waitresses are more organized and take care of their customers, the wings are better seasoned, the burger has better meat or better flavor, then it would be a place that I would frequent more often.

Review: Hoy me decepcione, soy cliente asiduo, pero me decepcione... Pedí una pizza personal hawaiana ,tenia en buen concepto el lugar. Me trajeron una pizza que creo la tenían congelada.. estaba fría cuando llegó a la mesa..el queso nada derretido... Le di la primer mordida. Pedí quee la calentarán cuando regreso ,.llegó oliendo como si se la hubieran metido en los huevos.. me lleve una rebanada para que un amigo que es QBP la analice por si hay algo raro.. jamás vuelvo a pedir nada de comer aquí.
traduccion_nueva: Today I was disappointed, I am a regular customer, but I was disappointed... I ordered a personal Hawaiian pizza, I had a good opinion of the place. They brought me a pizza that I think was frozen... it was cold when it arrived at the table... the cheese was not melted at all... I took my first bite. I asked that they heat it up when I return. It arrived smelling like it had been put in my eggs. I took a slice so that a friend who is a QBP can analyze it in case there is anything strange. I will never order anything to eat here again.

Review:
Muy buen lugar, muy agradable 😌 lo único malo es que casi no hay mesas y debes esperar a que se vayan desocupando. Siempre hay mucha gente, pero no hay suficiente espacio.

El servicio muy bueno y las promos excelentes.
Me gustó mucho 😃
traduccion_nueva: Very good place, very nice 😌 the only bad thing is that there are almost no tables and you have to wait for them to become vacant. There are always a lot of people, but there is not enough space. Very good service and excellent promotions. I liked it a lot 😃

Review: Que feo gastar en comida que no sabe rica. Comida fría, sin sabor, mala atención del personal, en lunes dónde había poca gente. Tuve que ir a solucitar la carta.  Definitivamente no vuelvo. Si me preguntas si lo recomiendo, la verdad es que no.
traduccion_nueva: How ugly to spend on food that doesn't taste good. Cold food, tasteless, poor service from the staff, on a Monday where there were few people. I had to go to solve the letter. I definitely won't be coming back. If you ask me if I recommend it, the truth is no.

Review: La comida es deliciosa. Siempre hay promos para el buffet, conviene cuando van justo a comer (no solo a beber). Ojo que todos los de la mesa deben consumir el buffet. Las hamburguesas y papas con arrachera son buenísimas. Lo único que no me agrada es que llevo años yendo y nunca han tenido pago con tarjeta. La cerveza siempre está bien fría.
traduccion_nueva: Food is delicious. There are always promos for the buffet, it is convenient when you are just going to eat (not just drink). Note that everyone at the table must consume the buffet. The burgers and potatoes with flank steak are delicious. The only thing I don't like is that I have been going for years and they have never had card payment. The beer is always very cold.

Review: El servicio deja mucho que desear. Los meseros no están atentos a las mesas, ni a los pedidos, sin embargo te "sugieren" el 15% de propina, que obvio no vale la pena. Las alitas no son frescas, saben a huevo 🤢. Los boneless no tienen sabor. Las hamburguesas en general son malas. Lo único rescatable son las bebidas: pepinada, naranjada y mangada. No regresaré.
traduccion_nueva: The service leaves a lot to be desired. The waiters are not attentive to the tables, nor to the orders, however they "suggest" a 15% tip, which is obviously not worth it. The wings are not fresh, they taste like eggs 🤢. The boneless ones have no flavor. The burgers in general are bad. The only redeeming feature is the drinks: pepinada, orangeada and mangada. I will not come back.

Review: Lugar muy cómodo,la atención muy atenta,buena,rápida y de la mejor calidad humana posible,el tiempo de espera entre platillo y platillo es de 25 a 40 minutos,no me gusto que tienes un tiempo limite para disfrutar del bufet,sin dudar si volvería,ya sabiendo cómo disfrutar más la experiencia
traduccion_nueva: Very comfortable place, very attentive service, good, fast and of the best human quality possible, the waiting time between dish and dish is 25 to 40 minutes, I didn't like that you have a time limit to enjoy the buffet, without hesitation If I would return, already knowing how to enjoy the experience more

Review: Excelente lugar para ir a comer en pareja o en familia, la calidad de la comida va con la calidad del costo pero lo único malo siempre te dicen que tiene que hacer pago en efectivo y que no aceptan pago en tarjeta, también estaría súper genial que los meseros se presenten con su nombre para poderlos identificar, hay una mesera flaquita chaparrita muy amable que siempre nos agrada que nos toque como mesera, porque las demás meseras y meseros solo van y nos avientan la carta sin decirnos promociones ni nada pero eso sí te piden el 15% de propina
traduccion_nueva: Excellent place to go to eat as a couple or as a family, the quality of the food matches the quality of the cost but the only bad thing is that they always tell you that you have to pay in cash and that they do not accept payment by card, it would also be super great if the waiters introduce themselves with their name so we can identify them, there is a very friendly, short, skinny waitress who always likes us to be the waitress, because the other waitresses and waiters just go and throw us the menu without telling us promotions or anything, but that does tell you. They ask for a 15% tip

Review: Es un lugar muy cómodo, la música tiene el volumen perfecto para poder platicar sin gritar, y el servicio es muy rápido! El único inconveniente es que no aceptan pagos con tarjeta
traduccion_nueva: It is a very comfortable place, the music is at the perfect volume to be able to talk without shouting, and the service is very fast! The only drawback is that they do not accept card payments.

Review: Son varias veces que voy y la verdad la comida no es espectacular, es buena pero lo normal, el servicio es muy lento
traduccion_nueva: I have been there several times and the truth is the food is not spectacular, it is good but normal, the service is very slow

Review:
Muy buen lugar.

La promoción de "Come todo por $89" es excelente y la cumplen al pie de la letra.
La comida es buena y de porciones más que suficientes. Las alitas con habanero están de 10.
El servicio es bueno pero podría mejorar.
El lugar y el ambiente es rockero, así que debes tomarlo en cuenta.
traduccion_nueva: Very good place. The "Eat everything for $89" promotion is excellent and they follow it to the letter. The food is good and more than enough portions. The wings with habanero are 10. The service is good but could improve. The place and the atmosphere is rock, so you should take that into account.

Review: La atención podría ser mejor. Y algo malo que  de propina sugerida querían el 17% siendo que  la atención es lenta y no te permiten pedir dos cosas juntas
traduccion_nueva: The attention could be better. And something bad is that they wanted 17% for the suggested tip since the service is slow and they don't allow you to order two things at the same time.

Review:
Este bar de comida es un desastre total. La comida estaba más seca que el Sahara y sin sabor alguno. Las meseras parecían más interesadas en chismear que en atendernos. Ni un poco de amabilidad

Lo peor vino cuando llegó la cuenta. ¡Increíble! No solo el servicio fue mediocre, sino que se atrevieron a sugerir una propina por encima del 15%. ¿En serio? Después de esa experiencia, ni en mis pesadillas les daría más de lo necesario. En resumen, este lugar no es para nada recomendable si aprecias la buena comida y un servicio decente. ¡Evítalo a toda costa
traduccion_nueva: This food bar is a total disaster. The food was drier than the Sahara and tasteless. The waitresses seemed more interested in gossiping than serving us. Not a bit of kindness The worst came when the bill arrived. Incredible! Not only was the service mediocre, but they dared to suggest a tip above 15%. Oh really? After that experience, not even in my nightmares would I give them more than what was necessary. In short, this place is not recommended at all if you appreciate good food and decent service. Avoid it at all costs

Review:
Pésimo servicio nos trataron mal desde que llegamos, la mesera nos hacía caras y tardo en llegar la comida
Que la comida no lo valía por el precio
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they treated us badly from the moment we arrived, the waitress made faces at us and it took a while for the food to arrive. The food was not worth it for the price

Review: Bueno aunque tardan mucho en servir la comida pero la atención es bue a
traduccion_nueva: Good although it takes a long time to serve the food but the service is good

Review: El servicio fue uno de los peores que me han tocado, fuimos al buffet de $99 llegamos nos dieron la mesa y la mesera nos muestra la carta y nos ofrece el mismo buffet pero más caro me parece que en $119 no lo recuerdo bien, nos dice que para ordenar debemos pedir una bebida de la carta y de pura casualidad no habían nada de cerveza de barril, ni cerveza en botella, casi casi nos obligaron a pedir caguamas o bebidas dela carta, pedimos una caguama que tenían un precio de $100 pesos, ordenados nuestros alimentos primero ordenamos boneless y tardaron 45 min en traerlos y para acabar nos traen alitas cuando a la mesera le repetimos 2 veces nuestra orden, no sé si fue una estrategia para que consumas más bebidas pero deme hizo una barbaridad, después pedimos una hamburguesa y de los ingredientes que decía solo tenía uno, la carne no estaba bien cocida, el queso frío y duro, a la hamburguesa de mi compañero le pusieron las tapas con el rabo de el jitomate y a mi la piña que llevaba se la pusieron directamente del la lata, después queramos sushi y nos dijieron que ya no había, volvimos a pedir boneless y cuando los trajeron no tenían nada de sal estaban incipidos y ya por último la mesera nos exigía el 30% de propina a lo que le dije que le daríamos aparte la propina y le dimos  solo 15% la verdad me quedé con un mal sabor de boca y no regresaría al lugar o almenos no a esta sucursal de dorada.
traduccion_nueva: The service was one of the worst I have ever had, we went to the $99 buffet, we arrived and they gave us the table and the waitress showed us the menu and offered us the same buffet but more expensive, I think it was $119, I don't remember it well, she told us. To order we must order a drink from the menu and by pure chance there was no draft beer or bottled beer, they almost forced us to order loggerheads or drinks from the menu, we ordered a loggerhead that had a price of $100 pesos, After ordering our food, first we ordered boneless and it took them 45 minutes to bring them and finally they brought us wings when we repeated our order twice to the waitress, I don't know if it was a strategy to get you to consume more drinks but she did an awful lot to me, then we ordered a hamburger And of the ingredients that it said it only had one, the meat was not well cooked, the cheese was cold and hard, they put the tapas on my partner's hamburger with the stem of the tomato and they put the pineapple that was on me directly from the the can, then we wanted sushi and they told us there was no more, we asked for boneless again and when they brought them they didn't have any salt, they were incipient and finally the waitress demanded a 30% tip from us to which I told her we would give her Apart from the tip and we only gave 15%, the truth is I was left with a bad taste in my mouth and I would not return to the place or at least not to this branch of sea bream.

Review:
Buen ambiente, y buena comida a excepción del sushi, el arroz crudo.
El servicio deja  que desear.
traduccion_nueva: Good atmosphere, and good food except for the sushi, the raw rice. The service leaves something to be desired.

Review: Me sorprendió la calidad de la comida. Aproveché el viernes de promo de alitas y, a pesar de que el servicio no era el más rápido, las alitas las traían calientitas y muy ricas. La música está a buen volumen y en general el ambiente también. Lo que sí no estuvo chido fue que no aceptaban pagos con tarjeta (quizá solo fue por ese día) pero tuvimos que ir hasta dorada por efectivo. Tampoco tenían cerveza clara y la draft oscura no sabía tan buena. Aún así me lleve una grata sorpresa, muy recomendado
traduccion_nueva: I was surprised by the quality of the food. I took advantage of the Friday wing promo and, even though the service was not the fastest, the wings were brought warm and very delicious. The music is at a good volume and so is the general atmosphere. What wasn't cool was that they didn't accept card payments (maybe it was just for that day) but we had to go to Dorada to get cash. They also didn't have light beer and the dark draft didn't taste as good. Even so, I was pleasantly surprised, highly recommended

Review: Cobran servicio y es obligatorio, si no lo pagas no te dejan ir.
traduccion_nueva: They charge for service and it is mandatory, if you don't pay it they won't let you go.

Review:
Había ido antes y se que el servicio no es excepcional, sin embargo me agrada ir a tomar algo y platicar, acabo de ir y me dijeron que servicio de comida no había pero de barra si, quise ordenar al momento y no me atendieron, luego quisimos llamar la atención del mesero con la mano y paso de largo sin prestar atención, solo iba por un tarro, y no se molestaron ni en voltear aunque nos vieron, que horror, llegue a regresar a pesar de todo pero de ahora en adelante jamás iré
Agrego foto de como estaban metidos en el celular
traduccion_nueva: I had been before and I know that the service is not exceptional, however I like to go to have a drink and talk, I just went and they told me that there was no food service but there was a bar service, I wanted to order immediately and they did not serve me, then We wanted to get the waiter's attention with our hand and he passed by without paying attention, he was only going to get a jar, and they didn't even bother to turn around even though they saw us, what a horror, I came back despite everything but from now on I will never I'll go I add a photo of how they were inside the cell phone

Review: Comida regular, sin embargo la atención al cliente deja mucho que desear. Te atienden como si te estuvieran haciendo un favor, pésima atención en general. Los meseros mas atentos platicando entre ellos en las mesas que en cuanto a la atención de la clientela. Cerveza tibia, pésimo lugar. No lo recomiendo.
traduccion_nueva: Average food, however customer service leaves a lot to be desired. They serve you as if they were doing you a favor, terrible service in general. The waiters are more attentive when talking to each other at the tables than when it comes to customer service. Lukewarm beer, lousy place. I do not recommend it.

Review: El lugar con la música a tope, no puedes platicar ni convivir porque no se escucha más que la música. Se tardan muchísimo en preparar y atender, la comida no es muy buena para el tiempo que tardan. Y todavía al final, el servicio, pésimo, con personal grosero y prepotente, la vdd cero ganas de regresar a ese lugar de porquería. Si ni los meseros te van a tratar bien, no vale la pena ni un poco. Nada recomendado
traduccion_nueva: The place with the music at full blast, you can't talk or coexist because you can't hear anything but the music. They take a long time to prepare and serve, the food is not very good for the time they take. And still in the end, the service, terrible, with rude and arrogant staff, the truth is that I have no desire to return to that filthy place. If not even the waiters are going to treat you well, it's not worth it one bit. Not recommended

Review:
Había ido una ocasión con amigos y no estuvo tan mal, pero la última vez que acudí habiendo mesas desocupadas nos sentaron hasta la esquina más escondida, y cuando llegaron una chica y su pareja notablemente extranjeros los sentaron al centro, lo dejamos pasar pero al llamar a los meseros nadie nos quería atender
Pedimos el buffet y no nos avisaron que no había sushi hasta que ya habíamos pedido las alitas.
Al llevarnos las alitas regresan a los 20 minutos a decirnos que la barra de cocina ya está por cerrar, cuando no eran ni las 8:30
La verdad el servicio dejó demasiado a desear, la comida no está tan rica, sobre todo la pizza es horrible, la masa cruda, y la cerveza estaba horrible, no estaba fría y estaba "quemada".
En verdad ahórrense el enojo y elijan otro restaurante
traduccion_nueva: I had gone once with friends and it wasn't that bad, but the last time I went there, when there were unoccupied tables, they sat us in the most hidden corner, and when a girl and her partner arrived, notably foreigners, they sat them in the center, we let him pass but when he called Nobody wanted to serve us with the waiters. We ordered the buffet and they didn't tell us that there was no sushi until we had already ordered the wings. When they brought us the wings, they came back after 20 minutes to tell us that the kitchen bar was about to close, when it wasn't even 8:30. The truth is, the service left too much to be desired, the food is not that delicious, especially the pizza is horrible, the dough was raw, and the beer was horrible, it was not cold and it was "burned". Seriously save yourselves the anger and choose another restaurant

Review:
El ambiente muy malo, según guía ver a una artista y terminó cantando de otras, que feo.
Las alitas estaban algo crudas y el buffet se terminó a las 21:00 cuando no había nada de gente (en la Juárez esta mejor).
traduccion_nueva: The atmosphere was very bad, according to the guide, seeing one artist ended up singing about others, how ugly. The wings were a little raw and the buffet ended at 9:00 p.m. when there were no people at all (it's better in Juarez).

Review: Pésimo lugar. Tardaron mucho en atender el pedido y nos terminaron dando lo que quisieron. Al final nada estuvo bueno (alitas frias, aderezos, tacos y chela tibia). Cuando le preguntamos a la mesera si ya venía nuestro pedido (ya llevábamos 40 min esperando) nos contestó de forma muy altanera e incluso enojada, por lo que el servicio al cliente está del asco. Al pagar la cuenta, cínicamente pidió que se le diera el 10% correspondiente a la propina la cuál no es obligatorio pagarla. La música no te deja hablar con las personas, tienes que gritar o subir el tono de voz. Sí tienen la oportunidad de ir, desaprovechenla. No lo recomiendo en lo más mínimo.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible place. It took them a long time to fulfill the order and they ended up giving us what they wanted. In the end nothing was good (cold wings, dressings, tacos and warm chela). When we asked the waitress if our order was coming (we had already been waiting for 40 minutes) she answered us in a very haughty and even angry way, which is why the customer service is disgusting. When paying the bill, he cynically asked to be given the 10% corresponding to the tip, which is not obligatory to pay. Music doesn't let you talk to people, you have to shout or raise your voice. If you have the opportunity to go, miss it. I don't recommend it in the slightest.

Review:
Yo he ido nada más por el buffet. Hay valet parking, aunque en si hay pocos espacios para estacionarse cerca, hay varios en la esquina pero es San Manuel.

Te asignarán una mesa, no puedes elegir. Puede que te toque una amplia, chida y cómoda o una alta con bancos altos y mesa pequeña.

El buffet ampliado cuesta 130 por persona MAS una obligatoria bebida de al menos medio litro. En promedio el litro de bebida está en 80-100 pesos (Caguama, mojitos, aguas de sabor SIN alcohol, piñas coladas etc)
De comida hay alitas, hamburguesas, sushi (Makis), pizzas individuales y hotdogs.

Así que calcula alrededor de 230 pesos por persona. (Precios de agosto 2023)

Sobre el lugar, es una temática como bar de Inglaterra digamos, the Beatles, nirvana, the doors, the strokes son bandas que dan el ambiente al lugar.
Muy rockero, pero excelente ambiente para todos, eso sí. Agradable a la vista :)

Sobre el servicio, tardaron 25 minutos en tomar mi orden aunque luego el mesero estuvo atento.
La comida tarda MUCHO en llegar, he ido varias veces y sin exagerar, siempre, siempreeee consideren que van a tardar unos 25 minutos o media hora en traerles la comida. Y unos 15-20 para las bebidas.
Creo que esa es la peor parte, esperar.

Recomiendo pedirte chingo de cosas desde un inicio para que te las traigan "pronto"
Ya que si pides de cosa en cosa, tardará tanto que se te irá el apetito ente comida y comida.
Sobre todo si son varias personas que comen mucho. Ya le sé, y apenas llegó en caliente pido una hamburguesa, dos órdenes de alitas, dos sushis y mi caguama.

La propina la piden diciendo "Si gusta apoyarme con el servicio", me gusta, no me siento obligado a dejarles (Aunque siempre lo hago))

Creo que describí muy bien el lugar.
Lo recomiendo bastante para ir con tu novi@, tus amigos, familia.

Arriba está el bar "la mojiteria", ese está bueno si lo que buscas es tomar antes que comer.

Recomendaciones: La bebida Blue Coconut está buenísima, es muy dulce, cremosa. Todo puede ir con o sin alcohol, cómo gusten solo pidanlo.

Siempre pidan unas alitas BQQ, son dulces y todo mundo las ama. Algunas otras como mango habanero, búfalo y tal pueden sonar tentadoras pero créanme, son más que más cuesta acabarse.

Las hamburguesas tienen demasiado pan, yo les pellizco a la tapa para quitarle el exceso de pan y me entre más comida.

TODO lo que dejen a medias, se les cobra aparte. Así que no se levanta nadie hasta que se acabe toda la comida.
traduccion_nueva: I only went for the buffet. There is valet parking, although there are few spaces to park nearby, there are several on the corner but it is San Manuel. They will assign you a table, you cannot choose. You may get a spacious, cool and comfortable one or a tall one with high benches and a small table. The expanded buffet costs 130 per person PLUS a mandatory drink of at least half a liter. On average, a liter of drink is 80-100 pesos (Caguama, mojitos, NON-alcoholic flavored waters, pina coladas, etc.) For food, there are wings, hamburgers, sushi (Makis), individual pizzas and hotdogs. So calculate around 230 pesos per person. (Prices from August 2023) About the place, it is a theme like a bar from England, let's say, the Beatles, nirvana, the doors, the strokes are bands that give the place the atmosphere. Very rock, but excellent atmosphere for everyone, yes. Nice to look at :) Regarding the service, it took them 25 minutes to take my order although then the waiter was attentive. The food takes a LONG time to arrive, I have been several times and without exaggeration, always, always consider that it will take about 25 minutes or half an hour for the food to be brought to you. And about 15-20 for drinks. I think that's the worst part, waiting. I recommend asking for a lot of things from the beginning so that they bring them to you "soon." Because if you order one thing at a time, it will take so long that your appetite will disappear between meals. Especially if there are several people who eat a lot. I already know, and as soon as it arrived hot I ordered a hamburger, two orders of wings, two sushi and my loggerhead. They ask for the tip saying "If you like to support me with the service", I like it, I don't feel obligated to leave them (Although I always do)) I think I described the place very well. I highly recommend it to go with your boyfriend, your friends, family. Upstairs is the bar "la mojiteria", that is good if you are looking to drink before eating. Recommendations: The Blue Coconut drink is delicious, it is very sweet, creamy. Everything can go with or without alcohol, however you like, just ask for it. Always order some BQQ wings, they are sweet and everyone loves them. Some others like habanero mango, buffalo and such may sound tempting but believe me, they are more difficult to finish. The burgers have too much bread, I pinch the top to remove the excess bread and get more food in. EVERYTHING they leave halfway, they are charged separately. So no one gets up until all the food is gone.

Review: El servicio es lo peor. Los meseros son lentos traen pedidos equivocados y no están al pendiente de uno, la comida la traen fría y al momento de pagar te meten la propina en la cuenta, como si hubieran dado un excelente servicio.  Vine por recomendación pero no volvería.
traduccion_nueva: The service is the worst. The waiters are slow, they bring wrong orders and are not aware of one, the food is brought cold and when you pay they put the tip in your account, as if they had provided excellent service. I came on a recommendation but I wouldn't return.

Review: Calidad en sus alimentos, te los sirven calientitos y acompañados de una buena cerveza, no se puede pedir más y las (os) meseras (os) prestan buena atención.
traduccion_nueva: Quality in their food, they serve it warm and accompanied by a good beer, you couldn't ask for more and the waitresses pay good attention.

Review:
Todo chido la comida sobre todo ya que está a un precio cordial del personal no puedo decir mucho...
El unico punto en contra es que te exigen el 10% de tu cuenta el cual es opcional si decides dejarlo ya que depende demaciado de la atención que te haya brindado el personal!!!
traduccion_nueva: The food is all great, especially since it is at a friendly price from the staff, I can't say much... The only point against it is that they require 10% of your bill, which is optional if you decide to leave it since it depends too much on the attention that the staff has given you!!!

Review: El lugar es bueno tiene bueno alimentos y bebidas pero si servicio es de lo más lento que he visto se equivocan mucho en lo que órdenes y tardan entre alimentos y bebidas más de 30min demasiado lentos en todo es algo que deberían cambiar no existe ni un capitán ni gerente parecen gallinas sin cabeza gracias
traduccion_nueva: The place is good, it has good food and drinks but the service is one of the slowest I have ever seen, they make a lot of mistakes in the orders and it takes more than 30 minutes between food and drinks, too slow in everything, it is something that should be changed, there is not even a captain nor manager they look like headless chickens thank you

Review:
El día de hoy fui y el servicio fue de lo peor
Las chicas y el chico nisiquiera te hacen caso, solo se la pasan platicando, tienes que ir a buscarlos para que te atiendan.
Más de media hora para que te den la cuenta, tuve que ir hasta ellos para que me la dieran y otros 20 min más para que me dieran mi cambio y la mesera todavía te avienta el cambio
Como quieren propina si su servicio está del asco.
La comida fría, la cerveza tibia.
El sabor de la comida no es malo, pero no se pudo disfrutar porque todo me lo sirvieron frío.
traduccion_nueva: Today I went and the service was the worst. The girls and the boy don't even pay attention to you, they just keep talking, you have to go look for them so they can serve you. More than half an hour for them to give you the bill, I had to go to them to give it to me and another 20 minutes for them to give me my change and the waitress still throws the change at you. How do they want a tip if their service is disgusting. Cold food, warm beer. The taste of the food is not bad, but I couldn't enjoy it because everything was served cold.

Review:
Toda la comida muy rica, a excepción de la pizza.
En el servicio, se tardan en entregar las órdenes de comida, pero son amables.  Y la música muy chida.
traduccion_nueva: All the food was very delicious, except for the pizza. In service, they take time to deliver food orders, but they are friendly. And the music is very cool.

Review: Buena comida y ambiente, mal servicio, se olvidan de tu pedido, la comida tarda, y los meseros te exigen propina, y si no les das te persiguen hasta las escaleras, PD: NO PIDAN AROS DE CEBOLLA
traduccion_nueva: Good food and atmosphere, bad service, they forget your order, the food takes a while, and the waiters demand a tip from you, and if you don't give them they chase you up the stairs, PS: DON'T ORDER ONION RINGS

Review:
La comida en general no estaba mal. El Sushi estaba casi congelado y de mal sabor. Lo que me molestó muchisimo fue que la señorita que nos atendió nos "sugirió" dejarle de propina $100 que correspondia al 15% de la cuenta
Nosotros intentamos dejarle lo minimo de 10% pero por cuestiones de cambio, nos faltaron $10 menos de lo que le tocaba. Al final se puso a EXIGIRNOS que le dieramos más, como no teníamos cambio terminamos dejando 12% para un servicio que no lo valía.
NO vale la pena comer ahí por el precio y menos por la actitud de la mesera, que pesimo es exigir propina. No te la incluyen porque sería ilegal pero acabo de leer comentarios donde ya les pasó lo mismo, no vayan.
traduccion_nueva: The food in general was not bad. The Sushi was almost frozen and of bad taste. What bothered me a lot was that the lady who served us "suggested" that we leave her a tip of $100, which corresponded to 15% of the bill. We tried to leave her the minimum of 10%, but due to exchange issues, we were missing $10 less than what she was told. played In the end he started DEMANDING us to give him more, since we didn't have change we ended up leaving 12% for a service that wasn't worth it. It is NOT worth eating there for the price and even less for the attitude of the waitress, how terrible it is to demand a tip. They don't include it because it would be illegal but I just read comments where the same thing happened to them, don't go.

Review:
El ambiente bueno, la comida buena, el servicio pésimo
Llegamos a las 6 y ya van a dar las 8 y seguimos esperando una orden individual d alitas

Cero recomendable 🥺
traduccion_nueva: The atmosphere is good, the food is good, the service is terrible. We arrived at 6 and it's almost 8 and we're still waiting for an individual order of wings. Zero recommendable 🥺

Review: Music is too loud to even hear your own voice, food is very low quality but atleast the drinks are decent.
traduccion_nueva: Music is too loud to even hear your own voice, food is very low quality but at least the drinks are decent.

Review: Very nice place, food is great, and service was really good. No parking which is a shame but other than that it is a really good place.
traduccion_nueva: Very nice place, food is great, and service was really good. No parking which is a shame but other than that it is a really good place.

Review: Only local bier, but nice atmosphere
traduccion_nueva: Only local bier, but nice atmosphere

Review:
Aquí hay que empezar con lo bueno y terminar con lo malo, las hamburguesas muy ricas y llenadoras, las papas de buen tamaño y las cervezas todo bien como cualquier cerveza, creo no fue mucho lo bueno ya que al final es un servicio por el cual uno paga.
Lo malo, el chico que nos atendió como vio que ya estaban medio mal unos de mis amigos entregó la cuenta y estaba cobrando 100 pesos de más, dirán solo son 100 pesos pero ya es un robo y todavía quería su servicio, hasta que se le dijo que estaba cobrando de más y ya se hizo el loco que fue su error pero bueno, así es su método de robar al cliente, al final no le dejamos servicio por el acto de querer robarnos y además la forma en como lo piden como si fuera nuestra obligación, si no les gusta su trabajo sálganse, enserio, yo sé que la situación es difícil pero porque quieren abusar de otros? Porque no piden un buen pago. Mejor den siempre un buen trato sin aprovecharse del cliente, eso hablara bien de ustedes, al final la vida y Dios te recompensa, talvez no con dinero pero sí con más años de vida para la persona que más quieres🙌🏻
Ya no sean abusivos y eso de la propina va para hombres y mujeres de todos los establecimientos de comida.
Comida 10/10
Ambiente 9/10
Atención 4/10
traduccion_nueva: Here you have to start with the good and end with the bad, the hamburgers are very delicious and filling, the fries are a good size and the beers are all good like any beer, I don't think the good was much since in the end it is a service for which one pays The bad thing, the guy who served us, seeing that one of my friends was already half bad, handed over the bill and was charging 100 pesos more, they will say it's only 100 pesos but it's already a robbery and I still wanted their service, until they told him He said that he was charging too much and he acted crazy that it was his mistake but hey, that's his method of stealing from the client, in the end we didn't give him service for the act of trying to steal from us and also the way in which they asked for it as if It was our obligation, if you don't like your job, get out, seriously, I know the situation is difficult but why do you want to abuse others? Because they don't ask for a good payment. Better always give good treatment without taking advantage of the client, that will speak well of you, in the end life and God rewards you, maybe not with money but with more years of life for the person you love the most🙌🏻 Stop being abusive and That tip goes to men and women of all food establishments. Food 10/10 Atmosphere 9/10 Service 4/10

Review: La primera vez que fui, nos hicieron el feo diciendo que ya no habían mesas, cuando en realidad si había mesas, peor servicio. Fuimos una segunda vez, haber que tal, estaba bien, pero les falta sabor y el lugar muy descuidado.
traduccion_nueva: The first time I went, they made a fool of us by saying that there were no more tables, when in reality there were tables, worse service. We went a second time, so it was good, but they lack flavor and the place is very run down.

Review:
Es ideal para ir con amigos, tomar unas cervezas.

El servicio de comida si es algo tardado.
traduccion_nueva: It is ideal to go with friends, have a few beers. The food service is a bit late.

Review:
Es un lugar bien ambientado con muy mal mantenimiento, de entrada, (si es que la hostess está en la puerta), te recibe medio bien y te otorga una mesa sin darte a elegir en donde prefieres sentarte. Los meseros se sientan en la mesa de hasta atrás del lugar (junto a la barra) y el lugar queda sin servicio durante varios minutos, (con reloj en mano, pueden tardar hasta 15 min. en llevarte un refresco), la selección musical está bien (a secas), cuando tocan las bandas, el audio es muy mediocre aunque las bandas hacen un poco de esfuerzo, se escucha mal. La comida es medio buena, el problema es que cuando llega a tu mesa ya está fría.
Lo peor del lugar es que al pedir tu cuenta (que esa si llega rápido), te piden el 20% de propina.
Yo, no volvería a este lugar, ni lo recomiendo, sé que una buena parte del sueldo de los meseros, son las propinas, pero la propina equivale al servicio que se ofrece.
traduccion_nueva: It is a well-appointed place with very poor maintenance, from the outset (if the hostess is at the door), she receives you half well and gives you a table without giving you the choice of where you prefer to sit. The waiters sit at the table at the back of the place (next to the bar) and the place is without service for several minutes, (with a watch in hand, it can take up to 15 minutes to bring you a soft drink), the musical selection is well (just plain), when the bands play, the audio is very mediocre although the bands make a little effort, it sounds bad. The food is halfway good, the problem is that when it arrives at your table it is already cold. The worst thing about the place is that when you ask for your bill (it does arrive quickly), they ask for a 20% tip. I would not return to this place, nor do I recommend it, I know that a good part of the waiters' salary is tips, but the tip is equivalent to the service offered.

Review:
Es un lugar económico, las instalaciones están agradables, el servicio es excelente y rápido aunque esté lleno el lugar, la comida es buena, las bebidas excelentes.
Detalle que tienen que lavar mejor sus trastes en especial los tarros de cerveza que si o si hay que limpiar al menos con una servilleta  para no probar algo de tragos anteriores.
Calidad precio
traduccion_nueva: It is an affordable place, the facilities are nice, the service is excellent and fast even if the place is full, the food is good, the drinks excellent. Detail that they have to wash their dishes better, especially the beer jars, or if they have to clean at least with a napkin so as not to taste something from previous drinks. Price quality

Review: SERVICIO HORRIBLE, la mesera nefasta queria cobrar de propina obligatoria mas del 10%, LOS BONELESS SECOS Y CON POCA SALSA , el smoothie era pura agua, NO REGRESARIA NUNCA, y fue servicio a la carta no de promocion👎👎👎
traduccion_nueva: HORRIBLE SERVICE, the disastrous waitress wanted to charge a mandatory tip of more than 10%, THE BONELESS DRY AND WITH LITTLE SAUCE, the smoothie was pure water, I WOULD NEVER RETURN, and it was à la carte service, not promotional service👎👎👎

Review: Me encantaron las Alitas, superaron mis espectativas, las entregaron rápido cada que pedía así que es muy valorado. Lo único que no me agrado fue que no tenían pago con tarjeta, pero sin duda repetiré ir.
traduccion_nueva: I loved the Wings, they exceeded my expectations, they delivered them quickly every time I ordered so it is highly valued. The only thing I didn't like was that they didn't have card payment, but I will definitely go again.

Review:
Pésimo lugar, atención y servicio.
Te dejan esperando, hay mesas disponibles y te dicen que te esperes, tarda más de 30 tus alimentos. Pésimo, si arreglan el servicio regreso
traduccion_nueva: Terrible place, attention and service. They leave you waiting, there are tables available and they tell you to wait, it takes more than 30 minutes for your food. Terrible, if they fix the service I will return

Review:
Era de mis lugares favoritos pero sin duda ya no volvería, la última vez casi una hora para esperar el pedido, nos mandaron alimentos incompletos, sin bebidas y al comentar del faltante te vuelve a preguntar que habías solicitado.

Para pedir algo más tenías que estarle hablando y se molestaba el personal de servicio.

La pésima atención hace que ni disfrutes tu estancia, y la calidad de los alimentos o bebidas ahora es más simple.
traduccion_nueva: It was one of my favorite places but without a doubt I would not return, the last time almost an hour to wait for the order, they sent us incomplete food, without drinks and when commenting on the shortage they ask you again what you had requested. To order something else you had to be talking to him and the service staff got upset. The terrible service means you don't even enjoy your stay, and the quality of the food or drinks is now simpler.

Review:
Horrible, la pizza estaba pésima y fría. Pedí una copa de naranja y sabía a agua de platos sucios, pedí que la cambiarán por otro sabor y fue peor.
Y luego de pagar la cuenta completa no deje propina porque no considere que debía y el mesero nefasto
traduccion_nueva: Horrible, the pizza was terrible and cold. I ordered a glass of orange and it tasted like water from dirty dishes, I asked to change it for another flavor and it was worse. And after paying the full bill, do not leave a tip because you do not consider that you owe it and the waiter is disastrous.

Review: La comida no es espectacular pero a mí me gusta ese tipo de menú, la cerveza rica, el ambiente tranquilo, lo único es que los meseros te piden el 15 de servicio, pero como no estuvo mal, pues los pagué sin reclamar.
traduccion_nueva: The food is not spectacular but I like that type of menu, the delicious beer, the calm atmosphere, the only thing is that the waiters ask you for 15 for service, but since it was not bad, I paid them without complaining.

Review:
-Mal servicio de personal
-Mucho tiempo de espera por platillo (50 min), tomando en cuenta que únicamente se puede pedir 1 platillo a la vez.
-Mala presentación de carta, mal organizada y pésima atención cuando quieres aclarar los puntos con el personal.
traduccion_nueva: -Poor staff service -Long waiting time per dish (50 min), taking into account that you can only order 1 dish at a time. -Poor letter presentation, poorly organized and poor attention when you want to clarify points with the staff.

Review:
Pésimo servicio. Te atienden horrible.
Hasta que no se hizo mención del trato culero la chica medio nos trato.
La propina no es opcional. Te cobran cierto porcentaje Pero el trato nefasto
La comida está chida.
Pero por el trato NO RECOMENDADO.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. They serve you horribly. Until mention was made of the asshole treatment, the girl half treated us. Tipping is not optional. They charge you a certain percentage But the terrible treatment The food is cool. But because of the treatment NOT RECOMMENDED.

Review:
Antes era mejor el servicio, no nos hacían esperar y traían más rapido los pedidos, aumentaron el precio y bajaron calidad, las bebidas se sentían rebajadas.
No nos hicieron válido el Buffett
Y nos amenazaron que si no dejábamos el 20% de propina no esperáramos un buen servicio para la próxima.
traduccion_nueva: Before the service was better, they didn't make us wait and they brought orders faster, they increased the price and lowered the quality, the drinks felt discounted. They didn't make the Buffett valid and they threatened us that if we didn't leave a 20% tip we wouldn't expect good service next time.

Review: Buen servicio, la comida tiene buenas porciones y sabor, un buen lugar disfrutar un rato de relax. Solo recomiendo que pongan más rock, ponían puro pop🤢pero es cuestión de gustos. En general muy bien.
traduccion_nueva: Good service, the food has good portions and flavor, a good place to enjoy a relaxing time. I only recommend that they play more rock, they played pure pop🤢but it's a matter of taste. Overall very good.

Review: Lo único bueno son los precios, la calidad de la comida fría y mal hecha,  los meseros groseros se ofenden si les pides que te limpien la mesa, el pasillo que lleva a los baños y a la cocina literal huele a quI0 y a 83r6a. Jamás regresaré hoy sábado 26 de mayo 2024
traduccion_nueva: The only good thing is the prices, the quality of the cold and poorly cooked food, the rude waiters get offended if you ask them to clean your table, the hallway that leads to the bathrooms and the literal kitchen smells like quI0 and 83r6a. I will never return today Saturday May 26, 2024

Review:
Buen servicio considerando el precio del buffet. Los boneless muy buenos, la primera vez que fuimos entre semana llegaban muy muy rápido pero en fin de semana si tardan más. Algunas veces te “sugieren” el 20% de propina.
El boleto de estacionamiento lo validan y te sale gratis.
Los baños podrían estar más limpios.
traduccion_nueva: Good service considering the price of the buffet. The boneless ones are very good, the first time we went during the week they arrived very very quickly but on the weekend they do take longer. Sometimes they “suggest” a 20% tip. The parking ticket is validated and is free. The bathrooms could be cleaner.

Review: la comida es rica, pero los precios son excesivamente caros, se que la propina es algo que se debe de considerar pero se anotan sin preguntar el 15% de propina y aún así se cobran de más. Las ordenes las toman mal y si pides algo de medio litro te cobran la de litro completo, se que hay estrés por parte del personal pero se me hace bastante encajoso hacia los clientes. No volvería sinceramente
traduccion_nueva: The food is delicious, but the prices are excessively expensive, I know that tipping is something that should be considered but they write down the 15% tip without asking and still charge more. They take orders poorly and if you order something for half a liter they charge you for a full liter. I know there is stress on the part of the staff but I find it quite harsh towards the customers. I honestly wouldn't go back

Review: Pésimo servicio, anuncian promo en 39 la hamburguesa pero en su publicidad no ponen que se debe consumir sus bebidas a un precio elevado y sólo consumo en restaurante para dejar una propina de un pésimo servicio por la actitud del personal. Al final no se consumió.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they advertise a promo on 39 the hamburger but in their advertising they do not say that their drinks should be consumed at a high price and only consumption in a restaurant to leave a tip for terrible service due to the attitude of the staff. In the end it was not consumed.

Review: La atención es buena, depende de la persona que te atendió pero en general todos hacen su trabajo, los lunes hay promo de buffet y terminas full 👌 la música está a buen volumen para poder platicar en general es uno de mis lugares concurridos dónde la pasas bien.
traduccion_nueva: The service is good, it depends on the person who served you but in general everyone does their job, on Mondays there is a buffet promo and you end up full 👌 the music is at a good volume so you can talk in general it is one of my busy places where you spend time good.

Review:
Me gustó el lugar y el precio del buffet es accesible,las bebidas son buenas. Sin embargo no me gustó el trato de las hostess y el servicio es súper lento , otro punto negativo son los baños sucios.
Pero de 1:00 PM  a 9:00 PM es ambiente familiar. Y muy buenas las alitas y los boneeles. También hay estacionamiento.
traduccion_nueva: I liked the place and the price of the buffet is affordable, the drinks are good. However, I did not like the treatment of the hosts and the service is super slow. Another negative point is the dirty bathrooms. But from 1:00 PM to 9:00 PM it is a family atmosphere. And the wings and boneeles are very good. There is also parking.

Review:
La atención de los meseros
No siempre es la mejor a veces te atienen personas agradables y otra a veces todo lo contrario, en cuestión a las bebidas no hay problema, en cuestión a la comida ha bajado mucho la calidad de cuando empezaron
traduccion_nueva: The attention of the waiters is not always the best. Sometimes you are served by pleasant people and sometimes the opposite, in terms of the drinks there is no problem, in terms of the food the quality has dropped a lot from when they started

Review: Simplemente como consejo eviten ir. Llegamos y nos tomaron la orden después de 15 minutos, no nos importó debido a que vimos que estaban ocupados. Pedimos litros de bebidas y las ordenes. Aquí empezó todo. Tardaron más de 30 minutos en llevarnos las bebidas. Y entonces preguntamos a la mesera por la comida y dijo que se encargaría y la traería enseguida, entonces ordenamos más con la expectativa de que no tuvieramos que esperar tanto tiempo entre pedidos y nos negó esa opción. En fin vimos a la mesera traer pedidos de otras mesas que habían llegado a la par o poco después que nosotros y le volvimos a preguntar es entonces cuando nos dice, enseguida vuelvo. Vuelve con las hamburguesas, en un solo plato y nos dice enseguida les traigo platos, ese enseguida se convirtió en más de 10 minutos cuando ya habíamos acabado de comerlas porque además estaban frías, por lo que pensamos que llevaban rato hechas pero la mesera estaba despistada. Tardó otros 25 minutos en traernos otra orden y es entonces que le pregunté donde estaban las papas fritas que pedimos con las hamburguesas y nos que las pedirías a cocina, mismas que nunca llegaron. Después de casi dos horas y pocos clientes pues muchos se iban. Decidimos pedir la cuenta ( gran error no pedirla antes) la mesera tardó casi media hora y fue solo tras decirle que no teníamos más tiempo y que llamara a su capitán que fue por la cuenta. Entrega la cuenta esta vez y literalmente no se despegó de nosotros esperando incluyéramos la propina o “Servicio” como ellos le llaman. Al pagar en efectivo le dije que esperara el cambio y me preguntó de nuevo si cobraba el servicio de ahí, obviamente le dije que no. Así que una vez de nuevo regresó con el cambio estuvo ahí esperando, solo nos fuimos. Soy una persona a favor de la cultura de propinas y me gusta hacerlo cuando el mesero es atento o mínimo amable y el servicio es aceptable o lo menos que esperas ir y comer. Sin embargo el hecho de que, se molestaron por preguntar, la comida y bebidas tardó excesivamente, mencionaron agregar el “servicio” y ni siquiera expresaron que porcentaje. Porque seamos claros, servicio no hubo, y con tan poco personal, que seguramente es la razón de que muchas reseñas concuerdan en lo mismo, el lugar ha de pagarles un buen salario para no tener que contratar mas personal y en verdad ofrecer “servicio”
traduccion_nueva: Just as advice, avoid going. We arrived and they took our order after 15 minutes, we didn't mind because we saw they were busy. We ordered liters of drinks and placed our orders. All started here. It took more than 30 minutes to bring us our drinks. And then we asked the waitress about the food and she said she would take care of it and bring it right away, so we ordered more with the expectation that we wouldn't have to wait so long between orders and she denied us that option. Finally we saw the waitress bring orders from other tables that had arrived at the same time or shortly after us and we asked her again, that's when she told us, I'll be right back. He comes back with the hamburgers, on a single plate and tells us I'll bring you plates right away, that immediately turned into more than 10 minutes when we had already finished eating them because they were also cold, so we thought they had been done for a while but the waitress was clueless . It took him another 25 minutes to bring us another order and that's when I asked him where the fries were that we ordered with the hamburgers and told us that you would ask the kitchen for them, which never arrived. After almost two hours and few customers, many left. We decided to ask for the bill (big mistake not asking for it before) the waitress took almost half an hour and it was only after telling her that we didn't have more time and to call her captain who went for the bill. He handed over the bill this time and literally stood by us waiting for us to include the tip or “Service” as they call it. When paying in cash I told him to wait for the change and he asked me again if I charged for the service there, obviously I told him no. So once he came back with the change he was there waiting, we just left. I'm a pro-tipping culture person and I like to do it when the waiter is attentive or minimally friendly and the service is acceptable or the least you expect to go and eat. However, the fact that, they bothered to ask, the food and drinks took excessively long, they mentioned adding the “service” and did not even express what percentage. Because let's be clear, there was no service, and with so little staff, which is surely the reason why many reviews agree on the same thing, the place has to pay them a good salary so as not to have to hire more staff and actually offer “service.”

Review: Pésimo servicio. Nos trataron muy mal. Nunca me había pasado en la sucursal de dorada, las chicas son hamables y apesar de que tarda tu orden son atentas. Pero en la sucursal de la juarez. El mesero muy grosero. Tardó demasiado, nada atento. Y bien exigente en su pripina. No recomiendo este lugar.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. They treated us very badly. It had never happened to me at the Dorada branch, the girls are friendly and even though your order takes a while, they are attentive. But in the Juarez branch. The waiter very rude. It took too long, not attentive at all. And very demanding in his opinion. I don't recommend this place.

Review: Fui para ver una banda que me gusta,  pero el servicio es pésimo,  pedimos unas alitas y no sabían muy buenas,  solicite un aderezo y jamas me lo llevaron,  tardaban mucho para llevar otra bebida y me toco en la parte de arriba y no disfrutas el escenario ya que me pusieron en una mesa super escondida.
traduccion_nueva: I went to see a band that I like, but the service is terrible, we ordered some wings and they didn't taste very good, I asked for a dressing and they never brought it to me, they took a long time to bring another drink and I touched the top and I didn't enjoy it the stage since they put me on a super hidden table.

Review: Horrible, su comida sabe fea, una bebida estaba echada a perder, no la querían cambiar, la mesera tarda mucho en anotar tu orden y la entrega de alimentos es de 40 minutos la espera aprox, pésimo! Y lo peor no aceptan pago con tarjeta.
traduccion_nueva: Horrible, their food tastes ugly, one drink was spoiled, they didn't want to change it, the waitress takes a long time to write down your order and the food delivery takes approximately 40 minutes, the wait is terrible! And the worst thing is they don't accept card payment.

Review:
El lugar necesita mantenimiento por dónde lo veas.
El recibimiento bastante malo, la mayoría de los meseros parece que están en contra de su voluntad.  Para tomar orden como 30 minutos..rescatable solo la chica que nos atendió que sí fue amable.
Sus aros de cebolla malos, alitas frías y poco aderezo, cerveza tibia.
Si quieren un mal servicio y alimentos ya hay de sobra igual que  la mayoría de los Mc Carthys.
traduccion_nueva: The place needs maintenance wherever you see it. The reception was quite bad, most of the waiters seem to be against their will. It took about 30 minutes to take the order... only the girl who served us was rescued, and she was friendly. Their bad onion rings, cold wings and little dressing, lukewarm beer. If they want bad service and food, there is plenty, just like most Mc Carthys.

Review: La verdad la comida está buena pero las instalaciones son muy viejas y feas las sillas viejisimas y más mesas ni se digay son de esos lugares que en tu ticket t ponen una cantidad y cuando t regresan tu cambio es otro porque  el servicio t lo cobran fuera del ticket obligatoriamente eso tampoco m gustó y los baños ni se diga olian muy mal :(
traduccion_nueva: The truth is, the food is good but the facilities are very old and ugly, the chairs are very old and there are more tables, not to mention, they are one of those places that put an amount on your ticket and when they return your change it is another because they don't charge for the service outside. I didn't like that about the ticket either and the bathrooms, not to mention, smelled very bad :(

Review: Honestamente no recomendaría nada el lugar, no ofrece nada equivalente al pecio, el servicio fue malo, no son para acercarse a preguntar si se ofrecen algo mas o retirar lo que ya consumiste encima la propina te la incluyen a su abusiva consideración probablemente sea por que el sueldo como mesero ahi es muy malo. Ese dia iba a un supuesto “tributo” y mas que eso fue un palomazo, canciones incompletas y un repertorio pobre ya ni mencionar la puntualidad anunciada 9:30 y empezando 11:20. La comida insipida. En lo personal no tuve problemas con la demora de mis alimentos y las bebidas no estuvieron mal.
traduccion_nueva: Honestly, I wouldn't recommend the place at all, it doesn't offer anything equivalent to the price, the service was bad, they aren't there to ask if they offer anything else or remove what you already consumed, the tip is included in their abusive consideration, it's probably because The salary as a waiter there is very bad. That day I was going to a supposed “tribute” and more than that it was a blow, incomplete songs and a poor repertoire, not to mention the punctuality announced at 9:30 and starting at 11:20. The food tasteless. Personally, I had no problems with the delay of my food and the drinks were not bad.

Review:
La comida es pésima te la llevan 1hora después de que la pides y fría, los boneles estaban congelados y solo le hechan la salsa no estaban cosidos.
El servicio pésimo te toman la orden 15min. Después de que entras, te dan el lugar que ellos quieren, aunque el lugar estaba basio. El mesero que nos atendió, un chico que tenía lentes nos exigió la propina del 20% como minimo. Y no nos quiso sellar el boleto de estacionamiento  porque no le cubrimos la cuota que el exigía.
Su forma de cobrarte es la sig. Manera
1. Te da la cuenta, te dice que el solo acepta efectivo.
2.  en el momento que le pagas , te dice que le tienes que dar la propina mínimo del 20%.
(Si le das la propina mayor del 20% el mismo te pregunta, trae boleto de estacionamiento para que te lo sellé y te salga gratis.).
Pero si no le das lo que te pide no te sella nada de boleto de estacionamiento aunque tú se lo des,  te dice que el no está obligado a sellar te el boleto si no le das su propina que pide. así el se lo cobra. ,(hay que mencionar que en la propaganda que ellos ofertan es que hay estacionamiento gratis.)
3.  El ambiente es pésimo dicen que su música en vivo empieza a las 9 y no es así tarda 1 hora después  y no son canciones completas.
traduccion_nueva: The food is terrible, they bring it to you 1 hour after you order it and it is cold, the bonnets were frozen and they only made the sauce, they were not sewn. Terrible service, they take your order in 15 minutes. After you enter, they give you the place they want, although the place was basic. The waiter who served us, a guy who had glasses, demanded a tip of at least 20%. And he didn't want to stamp our parking ticket because we didn't cover the fee he demanded. Their way of charging you is the following. Way 1. He gives you the bill, tells you that he only accepts cash. 2. When you pay him, he tells you that you have to tip him at least 20%. (If you tip more than 20%, he will ask you, bring a parking ticket so I can stamp it for you and it will be free.) But if you don't give him what he asks for, he won't stamp any parking ticket even if you give it to him, he tells you that he is not obliged to stamp the ticket if you don't give him the tip he asks for. so he charges it. (It should be mentioned that in the advertising they offer is that there is free parking.) 3. The atmosphere is terrible, they say that their live music starts at 9 and it doesn't, it takes 1 hour afterward and they are not complete songs.

Review: La comida está bien, pero se tardan mucho en traerla, te cobran la propina a fuerza y la llaman "servicio", y aún así está medio feo el "servicio".
traduccion_nueva: The food is good, but they take a long time to bring it, they forcefully charge you the tip and call it "service", and even then the "service" is kind of ugly.

Review: El mesero te atiende si le caes bien, la mesera creo no sabía que estaba ahí trabajando en ese momento, esta muy pequeño el lugar, y pues sobretodo el servicio tardan demasiado en atender si es que te quieren atender.
traduccion_nueva: The waiter will serve you if he likes you, I don't think the waitress knew she was there working at that time, the place is very small, and above all the service takes too long to serve you if they want to serve you.

Review:
Cuentan con una promoción de $99.00 en alitas, sushi, hamburguesas etc,  es un bufete que no es completo) ( no es como la promoción lo anuncia ).
Tardaron 1hora para atenderte entre un servicio y otro.
La hamburguesa que pedí no es carne de pollo solo son 3 pedazos de boneles fríoqs, es más el pan que ponen y una rebanada de lechuga y jitomate.
Ojo Así mismo exigen una propina del 20% apesar de un mal servicio qué dan, en especial el mesero (moreno con lentes) , muy aparte de esto  ofrecen servicio gratis de estacionamiento en el túnel.
Pero como no das la propina del 20% que exigen no te sellan el boleto.
Tuve que regresar que me pusieran el sello y la contestación fue esa que ellos así se cobran la propina, pagando uno el estacionamiento.
Cómo reclame y exigí el sello lo realizaron.
Si quieren pasar un mal rato vallan a Barclays pero eso sí les dejo como ejemplo como les tienen que sellar el boleto para que sea gratis su estacionamiento. No recomiendo el lugar por el pésimo servicio
traduccion_nueva: They have a promotion of $99.00 on wings, sushi, hamburgers, etc., it is a buffet that is not complete (it is not as the promotion advertises). It took them 1 hour to serve you between one service and another. The hamburger I ordered is not chicken meat, it's just 3 pieces of cold boneles, it's more of the bread they put on it and a slice of lettuce and tomato. Be careful, they also require a 20% tip despite the poor service they provide, especially the waiter (dark-haired with glasses), apart from this they offer free parking in the tunnel. But since you don't give the 20% tip they require, they don't stamp your ticket. I had to return to have the stamp put on me and the answer was that this is how they collect the tip, paying for the parking. How I claimed and demanded the seal was done. If you want to have a bad time, go to Barclays, but I'll give you an example of how you have to get your ticket stamped so that your parking is free. I don't recommend the place because of the terrible service.

Review: Buena atención  por parte de la mesera que nos atendio... la comida un poco simple a mi punto de vista, pero buenas porciones. La música en vivo de radio vintage genial. Sin dudarlo vuelvo a regresar.
traduccion_nueva: Good service from the waitress who served us... the food was a little simple in my opinion, but good portions. Great live vintage radio music. Without hesitation I will return again.

Review:
lindo lugar y con un servicio, sabor increíble.
muuuy recomendable la verdad.
traduccion_nueva: Nice place with incredible service, flavor. Very recommendable indeed.

Review: Decepción total. No hay cerveza de barril, el lugar está descuidado en todos los sentidos. Desde el mobiliario hasta la capacitación del personal, la mesera te hace caras si le pides algo jaja.
traduccion_nueva: Total disappointment. There is no beer on tap, the place is run down in every way. From the furniture to the staff training, the waitress makes faces at you if you ask her for something haha.

Review: Un lugar muy descuidado ,la comida no está tan mal pero el servicio es malo .Además te obligan a pagar 25% de propina.
traduccion_nueva: A very run down place, the food is not that bad but the service is bad. They also force you to pay a 25% tip.

Review: Primera vez que visitamos el lugar. Anteriormente habían ido nuestros hijos y sus padrinos. Nos dijeron que no les gustó mucho el lugar porque le hace falta más limpieza y más iluminación. Ahora que ya lo conocemos nosotros, confirmamos que la limpieza del lugar, especialmente los baños, está fatal. Definitivamente el concepto del lugar no es familiar, por lo cual no deberían aceptar a menores, pues se la pasan corriendo y jugando por todo el restaurante.  Los tiempos para llevar los platillos a la mesa son excesivos, casi un cuarto de hora entre un tiempo y otro. También siguen la pésima costumbre de otros lugares, de poner ellos el monto de su propina, en lugar de dejar que eso lo decida el cliente.  Tristemente para el lugar, nosotros no regresaremos.
traduccion_nueva: First time we visited the place. Previously our children and their godparents had gone. They told us that they didn't like the place very much because it needs more cleaning and more lighting. Now that we know it, we confirm that the cleanliness of the place, especially the bathrooms, is terrible. The concept of the place is definitely not family-friendly, which is why they should not accept minors, since they run and play all over the restaurant. The times to bring the dishes to the table are excessive, almost a quarter of an hour between one time and another. They also follow the terrible custom of other places, of setting the amount of their tip themselves, instead of letting the customer decide. Sadly for the place, we won't be returning.

Review: Dlv el servicio es de lo peor, atienden como si te hicieran un favor y con caras, baños muy mal estado.y mal olor, muy descuidado el lugar. Aléjense mejor !!!!
traduccion_nueva: Dlv the service is the worst, they serve as if they were doing you a favor and with faces, bathrooms in very poor condition and bad smell, the place is very neglected. Stay away better!!!!

Review:
Buen lugar, fui un viernes por la noche
Pros:
- Tenían una promo de cantarito de 3 litros a muy buen precio
- Las alitas estaban ricas
- El servicio fue bastante bueno
- Cuando no está la banda en vivo se puede platicar bastante bien
- Si vas en plan de escuchar sólo música, la banda que fue estuvo muy bien

Cons:
- No tenían nada de cerveza de barril (en el menú si lo ofrecen)
- Las alitas vienen naturales y te traen las salsas aparte, sólo se pueden dos, si quieres un aderezo blue cheese te cuenta como salsa
- Los cocteles tienen muy poco alcohol, técnicamente es un mocktail
-
traduccion_nueva: Good place, I went on a Friday night Pros: - They had a 3 liter jug promo at a very good price - The wings were delicious - The service was pretty good - When the live band is not there you can talk quite well - Yes You plan to just listen to music, the band that was there was very good Cons: - They didn't have any beer on tap (on the menu if they offer it) - The wings come natural and they bring you the sauces separately, you can only have two, If you want a blue cheese dressing it counts as a sauce - The cocktails have very little alcohol, technically it is a mocktail -

Review: Fui al lugar porque hicieron un tributo al nümetal diciendo en redes sociales que el evento iniciaría a las 9:30pm, llegamos 9:00pm y pusieron un partido de fútbol el cual acabó 11:20pm, en lo personal no me gusta el fútbol mexicano pero me esperé y ví el partido forzadamente, la banda tocó bien pero no lo prometido y el servicio de las meseras fue asqueroso, encima de eso te piden mas del 10% de propinas como si lo merecieran, obviamente jamás regresaré a ese lugar y se lo deje en claro a la mesera.
traduccion_nueva: I went to the place because they made a tribute to nümetal saying on social media that the event would start at 9:30pm, we arrived at 9:00pm and they played a soccer game which ended at 11:20pm, personally I don't like Mexican soccer but I waited and forcefully watched the game, the band played well but not as promised and the service from the waitresses was disgusting, on top of that they ask for more than 10% tips as if they deserved it, obviously I will never return to that place and I will I made it clear to the waitress.

Review: La mesera prepotente, tardo en atendernos y nos dio un pésimo trato y aun así cuando le dejamos el 10% de su servicio nos dijo “si no tienen dinero no vengan” ojalá la corran
traduccion_nueva: The overbearing waitress was slow to serve us and gave us terrible treatment and even so when we left her 10% of her service she told us “if you don't have money don't come” I hope they fire her

Review: Lamentablemente me tocó a mí, una mala experiencia en el servicio, el personal demostró una falta de capacitación y atención al consumidor, evidentemente no se ve reflejado lo que en años anteriores era la buena atención, en fin un capitán de meseros y mejor coordinación ayudarán a resolver ciertos detalles en tú visita, mejorando al personal harán que el consumidor se sienta con ganas de volver en un futuro.
traduccion_nueva: Unfortunately, it was my turn to have a bad experience in the service, the staff showed a lack of training and customer service, obviously what was good service in previous years is not reflected, in short, a captain of waiters and better coordination will help resolving certain details during your visit, improving the staff will make the consumer feel like coming back in the future.

Review:
Un lugar bastante simple.
No es la mejor atención y está sucio.
Realmente pagas lo que recibes pero no es recomendable
traduccion_nueva: Quite a simple place. It is not the best service and it is dirty. You really pay what you get but it is not recommended

Review:
Buen lugar, Los boneless un poço secos, Pero agradáble, el mobiliário un poço descuidado.
El servicio muy atento y amáble,
traduccion_nueva: Good place, The boneless a little dry, But pleasant, the furniture a little neglected. Very attentive and friendly service,

Review: Be aware some commets are self promotion from the very same Intercam bank executives. I am personally familliar with their names. Reported to Google. The worst possible service, arrogant and totally dishonest. Go figure, they have to promote themselves here - against Google policy! Yes, they are clueless to that extent. Expect everything and anything you have never ever experienced before. How is this possible? Protective manager.
traduccion_nueva: Be aware some commitments are self promotion from the very same Intercam bank executives. I am personally familiar with their names. Reported to Google. The worst possible service, arrogant and totally dishonest. Go figure, they have to promote themselves here - against Google policy! Yes, they are clueless to that extent. Expect everything and anything you have never ever experienced before. How is this possible? Protective manager.

Review: All staff friendly,helpful,professional !!
traduccion_nueva: All staff friendly,helpful,professional!!

Review:
Pésimo servicio, trate de abrir una cuenta empresarial y mas que orientar y ayudar a que se logre una cuenta mas para INTERCAM, el ejecutivo trabajo mas en dar trabas y peticiones absurdas durante unas semanas, despues se llego a nada, es decir, ni siquiera una llamada de "gracias por haber participado".

Mucho clasismo, o esa fue mi percepción.

Pero bueno, esa ha sido mi experiencia, lo importante es que ya logre el servicio con otro banco.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, I tried to open a business account and more than guide and help achieve one more account for INTERCAM, the executive worked harder to give obstacles and absurd requests for a few weeks, then it came to nothing, that is, not even a "thank you for participating" call. A lot of classism, or that was my perception. But hey, that has been my experience, the important thing is that I already get the service with another bank.

Review: Muy buen servicio al cliente.
traduccion_nueva: Very good customer service.

Review: No funciona todas las cajas y la atención a clientes no estaba. 3 cajeros marcaban falta de fondos
traduccion_nueva: Not all the boxes work and customer service was not there. 3 ATMs showed lack of funds

Review: Sin servicio. Ni siquiera el cajero automático.
traduccion_nueva: No service. Not even the ATM.

Review: Excelente servicio y atención en especial de la asesora Karla Torres  toda la paciencia y la forma más clara se explicar  de verdad nuy buen servicio de parte de la Srita 👏👏👏👏👏👏
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service and attention especially from the advisor Karla Torres, all the patience and the clearest way to explain really good service from the Miss 👏👏👏👏👏👏

Review: Mal servicio. BBVA= Banco Baja Valor Agregado.
traduccion_nueva: Bad service. BBVA= Low Value Added Bank.

Review: Excelente atención, la sucursal cuenta con personal calificado, les agradezco haberme ayudado.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service, the branch has qualified personnel, I thank them for helping me.

Review:
Buen servicio, muy poco tiempo de espera para ser atendido.
Y siempre hay alguien que te esté orientando para el trámite qué vayas a realizar 👍🏻
traduccion_nueva: Good service, very little waiting time to be served. And there is always someone who is guiding you for the procedure you are going to carry out 👍🏻

Review: Que tal buenas noches.... Se que es algo que no tiene nada que ver con dinero y el banco... En la noche de ayer fui a depositar, llegué en mi bici la cuál deje por descuido entre las 9 pm espero que si alguno de los de seguridad la pudo resguardar se lo voy a recompensar 😔🙏la ocupo para trabajo... Espero que si me la hayan guardado... Si no pues ya alguién ya se la llevo... 😔😪
traduccion_nueva: How about good evening.... I know it's something that has nothing to do with money and the bank... Last night I went to deposit, I arrived on my bike which I accidentally left between 9 pm I hope If any of the security people were able to protect it, I will reward them 😔🙏I use it for work... I hope they have saved it for me... If not, then someone has already taken it... 😔😪

Review:
En la entrada la actitud del personal, grosero.  Para pasar con un ejecutivo de cuenta hay que esperar a que terminen su "reunión", para que puedan atenderte. Para hacer una aclaración te tardan , como si uno tuviera su tiempo y disponibilidad.
Pésimo servicio 😡 😒 😑
traduccion_nueva: At the entrance the attitude of the staff, rude. To see an account executive you have to wait for them to finish their "meeting" so they can assist you. They take you a while to make a clarification, as if you had your time and availability. Terrible service 😡 😒 😑

Review: Cambio la gerencia y decayó el servicio totalmente, el trato pésimo desde que llegas al lobby para solicitar un turno, siempre te niegan cambio y jamás quieren atender en cajas
traduccion_nueva: The management changed and the service completely declined, the treatment was terrible from the moment you arrived at the lobby to request an appointment, they always denied you change and never wanted to serve you at the tills.

Review: Las cajeras son muy groseras quise hacer un cobro de nómina en ventanilla con el número de referencia y el concepto y la tipa aferrada a que no están y nada y nada y pues me fui sin cobrar, nefasta!
traduccion_nueva: The cashiers are very rude. I wanted to collect payroll at the window with the reference number and the item and the woman clung to the fact that they were not there and nothing and nothing and so I left without being paid, disastrous!

Review: Mala atención en recepción, para un cambio de tarjeta de crédito a tecnología nfc te dicen que esperes al vencimiento
traduccion_nueva: Bad service at reception, to change your credit card to NFC technology they tell you to wait until it expires

Review: De las mejores sucursales del centro, velocidad y su personal muy amable
traduccion_nueva: One of the best branches in the center, speed and very friendly staff

Review: Casi siempre el servicio es rápido y amable en la sucursal de bolivar
traduccion_nueva: The service is almost always fast and friendly at the Bolivar branch

Review: Varios cajeros sin servicio
traduccion_nueva: Several ATMs without service

Review:
I don't know why all banks have these 1-2 stars reviews. But this branch was spacious and not busy at all. The employees were very friendly. And we being foreigners didn't feel any hostility or ignoring from them.
The lady that served us and her partner who speaked English very well, translated everything she said, helped us to fill all the required forms and explained what we would get by creating accounts in this bank.
We have been here about half of the hour, maybe a little more and I thought that maybe people just don't understand that processing all documents and forms while creating back accounts isn't a minute deal so they become impatient and angry this creating these low reviews.
Moreover we left with our cards ready instantly. In Europe and Russia we need to wait our cards to be prepared for about few days. But here we got everything ready in one day of visit.

Highly recommending this branch and thanking its staff again! Muchos Gracias!.
traduccion_nueva: I don't know why all banks have these 1-2 stars reviews. But this branch was spacious and not busy at all. The employees were very friendly. And we being foreigners didn't feel any hostility or ignoring them. The lady that served us and her partner who spoke English very well, translated everything she said, helped us to fill out all the required forms and explained what we would get by creating accounts in this bank. We have been here about half of the hour, maybe a little more and I thought that maybe people just don't understand that processing all documents and forms while creating back accounts isn't a minute deal so they become impatient and angry this creating these low reviews. Moreover we left with our cards ready instantly. In Europe and Russia we need to wait for our cards to be prepared for about a few days. But here we got everything ready in one day of visit. Highly recommending this branch and thanking its staff again! Thank you very much!

Review: Fatal atención, la asesora digital no sabe los productos que manejan, me hizo un caos con mi cuenta, pedí hablar con un asesor y se negó a darme el turno, pedí hablar con otra persona y llego otro chico que no aporto en nada, se hacen los graciosos y en lugar de solucionar solo hacen burlas.
