Review: PÉSIMO SERVICIO. Nadie contesta nunca el teléfono y el servicio de WhatsApp es pésimo sin ayudarte a encontrar una solución. Me renovaron el seguro del coche SIN mi consentimiento. Yo ya tengo otro seguro y ni siquiera te mandan la póliza que según esto renovaron.  Quiero que me cancelen el seguro y nadie está para ayudarte ni explicarte NADA.  Son los peores.
traduccion_nueva: TERRIBLE SERVICE. Nobody ever answers the phone and WhatsApp service is terrible without helping you find a solution. They renewed my car insurance WITHOUT my consent. I already have other insurance and they don't even send you the policy that they renewed according to this. I want my insurance to be canceled and no one is there to help you or explain ANYTHING to you. They are the worst.

Review:
Si lo que desean es un pesimo servicio, adelante contraten esta empresa.
Para todos sus procesos son ineficientes y solo se la pasan rebotando la pelota hechandose la culpa de área en área.
Hasta para cancelar ponen sus pretextos, que necesidad de fastidiar a las personas.
Respuestas como "no lo se, solo somos intermediarios, espera 72 hrs para q te contesten si hace falta algo, no podemos hacer nada solo esperar, es que desconozco los procesos, no puedo contactar a otra area hasta despues de 72 horas, entre otras ^#&#^".

Como cliente uno busca un poco de empata y seguridad en los servicios que pagamos. Lo único que les pedí por última ocasión es un número de folio de cancelacion y ni eso pueden darme. Diciendo que eso no existe, que para que un folio???... es neta? No saben que es un número de folio y tampoco dar un servicio.

Pésima experiencia con esta empresa.
SERVICIO DEPLORABLE, INNEFICIENTE Y CAÓTICO, NO TIENEN ORDEN, NO TIENEN AMABILIDAD, CARECEN DE PROCESOS Y MAS IMPORTANTE NO SABEN COMO BRINDAR SERVICIO AL CLIENTE.

*NO CONTRATEN CETELEM*
traduccion_nueva: If what you want is terrible service, go ahead and hire this company. For all their processes they are inefficient and they only spend time bouncing the ball, blaming themselves from area to area. They even use their excuses to cancel, what a need to annoy people. Responses like "I don't know, we are just intermediaries, wait 72 hours for them to answer you if something is needed, we can't do anything just wait, I don't know the processes, I can't contact another area until after 72 hours, among others ^#&#^". As a client, one looks for a little empathy and security in the services we pay for. The only thing I asked them for the last time is a cancellation folio number and they can't even give me that. Saying that this does not exist, why is a sheet of paper???... net? They don't know what a folio number is and they don't know what a service is. Terrible experience with this company. DEPLORABLE, INEFFICIENT AND CHAOTIC SERVICE, THEY HAVE NO ORDER, THEY HAVE NO KINDNESS, THEY LACK PROCESSES AND MOST IMPORTANTLY THEY DO NOT KNOW HOW TO PROVIDE CUSTOMER SERVICE. *DO NOT HIRE CETELEM*

Review: He intentado comunicarme para liquidar mi auto y me dicen que me deben dar una referencia para hacer el pago en ventanilla de Santander. Envié correo, llamé a atención a clientes pero una grabación dice que están haciendo cambios o de plano se interrumpe la llamada. Esto desde ayer, no he logrado respuesta por ningún medio. A quien me dirijo o quien puede apoyarme para resolver esta situación?
traduccion_nueva: I have tried to call to pay off my car and they tell me that they must give me a reference to make the payment at the Santander window. I sent email, I called customer service but a recording says that they are making changes or the call is simply interrupted. Since yesterday, I have not received a response by any means. Who do I contact or who can support me to resolve this situation?

Review:
Pésimo servicio, liquidé el crédito hace dos meses y por su mala organización no han podido aplicar el pago. La atención al cliente es PÉSIMA, tardas horas en comunicarte y cuando te llegan a contestar cuelgan la llamada.

O sea nunca te resuelven nada y después de dos meses sigo esperando mi factura. 😓

Al pedir crédito de auto EVITEN ESTA FINANCIERA.

TIENEN TRATO CON LAS AGENCIAS PARA QUE FORZOSAMENTE EL CRÉDITO SALGA CON ELLOS.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, I settled the loan two months ago and due to their poor organization they have not been able to apply the payment. The customer service is TERRIBLE, it takes hours to communicate and when they answer you they hang up the call. In other words, they never resolve anything and after two months I'm still waiting for my invoice. 😓 When requesting car credit AVOID THIS FINANCIAL. THEY HAVE DEALINGS WITH THE AGENCIES SO THAT THE CREDIT FORCEDLY GOES WITH THEM.

Review: Dan mala información o incompleta, tengo un reembolso que gestioné el 26 de marzo 2024 y me comentan que se realizará en 7 días hábiles, ahora que marco para el estatus, me dicen que por ser fin de mes tarda una semana más por cuestiones financieras, pero cuando te atrasas un día, luego luego están cobrando al día siguiente. No recomiendo para nada esta empresa, poca seriedad e impuntualidad en sus procesos (si es que los llegaran a tener)
traduccion_nueva: They give bad or incomplete information, I have a refund that I managed on March 26, 2024 and they tell me that it will be done in 7 business days, now that I mark for the status, they tell me that because it is the end of the month it takes an extra week for financial reasons, but when you are late one day, then they are charging you the next day. I do not recommend this company at all, lack of seriousness and unpunctuality in their processes (if they ever have them)

Review:
Consideren otra financiera antes de cetelem, su personal de cobranza llama al día siguiente de la fecha de pago si no aparece el pago, eso diría que esta bien pero todos sin excepción son unos patanes por que no solo amenazan si no son groseros en su estilo de cobranza
Y la comisión es muy elevada. Y no tiene caso reportar con un supervisor pues su respuesta es de la misma forma Grocera
traduccion_nueva: Consider another financial company before cetelem, their collection staff calls the day after the payment date if the payment does not appear, that would say that it is fine but everyone without exception is a jerk because they not only threaten if they are not rude in their style collection And the commission is very high. And there is no point in reporting to a supervisor because their response is the same Grocera

Review: Muy mal servicio, no responden las llamadas, no me han renovado mi pago de póliza de seguro, solo un asesor por Whatsapp me dijo que marcará o mandará mensaje el 15 de junio para que me proporcionarán las referencias de pago y ya no me han respondido por ningún medio.
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, they do not answer the calls, they have not renewed my insurance policy payment, only an advisor on WhatsApp told me that he will dial or send a message on June 15 so that they will provide me with payment references and they have no longer responded to me by any means.

Review: Pésimo servicio, no logro que me atiendan ni me pueden dar número de referencia para poder hacer abono a mi cuenta, no tienen referencia de quien soy pero eso si me cobran mes con mes mi mensualidad que servicio tan deficiente
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, I can't get them to attend to me nor can they give me a reference number to be able to make a payment to my account, they have no reference to who I am but they do charge me month after month for my monthly payment, what a poor service

Review: LA PEOR FINANCIERA. NO ADQUIERAN NINGUN CREDITO CON ELLOS. NO HAY CERTEZA JURIDICA, NI NADA. SERVICIO A CLIENTES, NO RESUELVE NADA. TARDAN MUCHISIMO EN RESPONDER LLAMADAS. MUY DIFICIL CONTACTARLOS. YO PREFERI LIQUIDAR MI CREDITO CON ELLOS PARA NO TENER NADA QUE VER CON ELLOS. LA PEOR EXPERIENCIA
traduccion_nueva: THE WORST FINANCIAL. DO NOT ACQUIRE ANY CREDIT WITH THEM. THERE IS NO LEGAL CERTAINTY, OR ANYTHING. CUSTOMER SERVICE, DOES NOT RESOLVE ANYTHING. THEY TAKE A LONG TIME TO ANSWER CALLS. VERY DIFFICULT TO CONTACT THEM. I PREFERED TO SETTLE MY CREDIT WITH THEM SO I WOULD NOT HAVE ANYTHING TO DO WITH THEM. THE WORST EXPERIENCE

Review: Al inicio si me asuste por ver todos los malos comentarios, pero la verdad es que todo bien con ellos no tuve ningún problema, mientras tengas tus pagos domiciliados y el dinero a tiempo no hay tema, para las aportaciones igual tampoco tuve problema. Todo bien. Le doy 4 estrellas porque deben mejorar su servicio de atención a cliente, conmigo no fueron groseros para nada pero si tardaban muchísimo en contestar. Solo mejoren los tiempos de espera. De ahí en fuera bien
traduccion_nueva: At first I was scared by seeing all the bad comments, but the truth is that everything was fine with them, I didn't have any problems, as long as you have your payments direct debited and the money on time there is no issue, for the contributions I didn't have any problems either. All good. I give them 4 stars because they should improve their customer service, they were not rude to me at all but they did take a long time to respond. Just improve the wait times. From then on it was fine

Review: Yo quiero hablar de una modalidad de fraude de esta empresa que nadie ha dicho. En mi contrato de apertura de crédito me dijeron q tenia q contratar un seguro q iba a durar por 5 años aunque lo liquidara antes, liquide mi carro antes y me cobraron mi seguro por 5 años, resulta q tuve un siniestro, hablo a la aseguradora y me dicen que cetelem había cancelado mi seguro, trato de comunicarme con ellos y me dicen que mi numero de contrato es incorrecto, que casualidad q cuando me cobraban a la primera lo reconocían. Necesito hablar con alguien y es imposible. Si van a comprar un carro con ellos pidan que sea con otra financiera, CETELEM ES PÉSIMA
traduccion_nueva: I want to talk about a type of fraud by this company that no one has mentioned. In my credit opening contract they told me that I had to take out insurance that was going to last for 5 years even if I paid it off before, I paid off my car before and they charged me for my insurance for 5 years, it turns out that I had an accident, I spoke to the insurance company and they told me that Cetelem had canceled my insurance, I tried to contact them and they told me that my contract number was incorrect, what a coincidence that when they charged me the first time they recognized it. I need to talk to someone and it's impossible. If you are going to buy a car with them, ask that it be with another financial company, CETELEM IS TERRIBLE

Review:
Una porquería de empresa. Llevo 3 semanas esperando la liquidación de mi carro por perdida total, mi aseguradora tiene más de un mes que liquido el carro a la financiera y no me dan solución, cada que hablo a atención a clientes el asesor me dice una cosa diferente a lo que me dijo el anterior. No dan bien la información

Para cobrar por atraso son buenos para responder y molestar pero no para dar un buen servicio
traduccion_nueva: A crappy company. I have been waiting for the settlement of my car for a total loss for 3 weeks. My insurer has been paying the car to the finance company for more than a month and they have not given me a solution. Every time I speak to customer service, the advisor tells me something different than what I expected. the previous one told me. They do not give information well. To charge for late payments, they are good at responding and bothering but not at giving good service.

Review: Son una compañía horrible, no se por que otras empresas trabajan a través de ustedes. Me mandaron un mensaje diciéndome que tengo un pago atrasado lo cual no es verdad y cuando pregunte de que era el pago me dijeron que es de un seguro, que yo no contrate porque lo pague desde un inicio. Después me mandan un mensaje amenazando de que me mandaran a buro, cuando el dinero está disponible en mi cuenta  (lo cual se me hace raro que no tomen el dinero) si según ellos lo debo y no puedo comunicarme con ellos todos sus números me mandan a buzón.
traduccion_nueva: You are a horrible company, I don't know why other companies work through you. They sent me a message telling me that I have a late payment which is not true and when I asked what the payment was for they told me that it is from insurance, which I did not contract because I paid for it from the beginning. Then they send me a message threatening that they will send me to the bureau, when the money is available in my account (which seems strange to me that they don't take the money) if according to them I owe it and I can't communicate with them, they send me all their numbers to mailbox.

Review: #cetelem ya paguenme mi reembolso no es justo gnp tw pago el 8 de noviembre y tu no me regresas mi reembolso reconoces saldo a favor pero no me lo depositas y en las oficinas de Reforma no me quisieron atender acaso no están ahí sus oficinas donde se ubican entonces den la cara no sean corruptos exijo mi pago completo quedaron muy formales que ayer 7 de diciembre me depositarian y puras mentiras YA PAGUENME ya espere sus tiempos YA PAGUENME .
traduccion_nueva: #cetelem already pay me my refund it's not fair gnp tw I paid on November 8 and you don't return my refund you recognize balance in favor but you don't deposit it to me and in the Reforma offices they didn't want to assist me maybe their offices aren't there where it is locate then show your face, do not be corrupt, I demand my full payment, they were very formal that yesterday, December 7, they deposited me and pure lies, PAY ME NOW, wait your time, PAY ME NOW.

Review: El servicio telefónico es lo peor que he conocido. No es posible que te quiten media hora para resolver un asunto sencillo como adelantar mensualidades o liquidar una deuda. Por si fuese poco, son súper opacos en la información del crédito. Ni tiene sentido que te pidan datos personales para validar identidad, tienen la consigna de no dar información.  Además, tienen malas prácticas financieras, al obligarte a contratar seguros con ellos por lo que dure el crédito. Coincido con otros comentarios, deberían investigarlos y en su caso, quitarles la denominación de sociedad crediticia.
traduccion_nueva: The phone service is the worst I have ever experienced. It is not possible for them to take half an hour from you to resolve a simple matter such as advancing monthly payments or settling a debt. As if that were not enough, they are super opaque in their credit information. It doesn't make sense for them to ask you for personal information to validate your identity, they have the mandate of not giving information. In addition, they have bad financial practices, forcing you to take out insurance with them for the duration of the credit. I agree with other comments, they should be investigated and, if appropriate, remove the name of credit society.

Review: Terrible el servicio, la compra todo un show, mal manejo del crédito y creo que lo peor ha sido la cobranza, pasaron 2 días del mes y ya se cobró interés, entiendo se debe pagar, pero hay formas. Definitivamente, no puedo recomendarlos, muy mala experiencia
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, the purchase was quite a show, poor credit management and I think the worst was the collection, 2 days of the month passed and interest was already charged, I understand it must be paid, but there are ways. I definitely cannot recommend them, very bad experience

Review: Pésimos servicio, llevamos años de pagar puntualmente y por error este mes faltaron $300 llamamos para regularizar el pago y tuvimos la pésima fortuna de ser atendidos por una persona falta de educación y tan prepotente que se hace llamar “Atziri aguilar” diciéndonos que le paguemos su dinero, que la camioneta es suya, a lo cual le mencionamos que fue un error y que por supuesto realizaremos el pago y a parte queremos realizar un pago mas grande para abonar a capital a lo cual nos respondió que no tenemos ni $300 pesos que como queremos abonar más ( en un tono burlón y grosero) creo que deberían mejorar a su personal y no contratar gente sin educación para que así podamos realizar los pagos y abonos con mayor facilidad, al fin de cuentas ese es su negocio y me imagino que les interesa recibir dinero !
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, we have been paying punctually for years and by mistake this month $300 was missing. We called to regularize the payment and we had the terrible fortune of being served by a person who was uneducated and so arrogant that he called himself “Atziri Aguilar” telling us to pay him his money, that the truck is his, to which we mentioned that it was a mistake and that of course we will make the payment and part of it we want to make a larger payment to pay the capital to which he responded that we do not even have $300 pesos as we want pay more (in a mocking and rude tone) I think they should improve their staff and not hire uneducated people so that we can make payments and payments more easily, at the end of the day that is their business and I imagine they are interested receive money !

Review: Pésimo y mediocre servicio al cliente, no entiendo porque Kia, sigue trabajando con está financiera, la siguiente vez que compré un auto, definitivamente no será con ellos, simplemente por no volver que tener que lidiar con Cetelem.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible and mediocre customer service, I don't understand why Kia continues to work with this financial company, the next time I buy a car, it will definitely not be with them, simply to avoid having to deal with Cetelem again.

Review:
Quería dar mi opinión porque cuando a mí me tocó ver todos los comentarios malos me asusté muchísimo y tenía mucha incertidumbre, sin embargo mi experiencia fue totalmente distinta.
Yo contraté con ellos para comprar Hyundai, mis pagos siempre fueron domiciliados y nunca hubo retrasos ni adeudos. Nunca quise meter el seguro a financiamiento, así que desde el término del primer año me tocaba notificar está decisión vía telefónica, al hacerlo me brindaban el número de cuenta al cual depositar la cantidad del seguro y las fechas límite que tenía, la única vez que tuve inconveniente fue el primer año ya que me era imposible comunicarme (me imagino que por pandemia estaban faltos de personal), sin embargo insistí, esperé en la línea por mucho tiempo hasta que lograba contactarme con alguien que me atendiera y se resolvió todo sin mayor inconveniente. La siguiente ocasión ya fue todo más rápido. Si bien, sus tiempos de espera en vía telefónica son algo largos, a excepción de la primera vez, si esperaba con paciencia nunca había temas. Anticipé mi liquidación de crédito y todo fue muy fácil, me dieron gran atención y los tiempos que me indicaron fueron respetados, en un par de semanas recibí mi carta factura y puedo decir que mi experiencia con cetelem fue buena.
traduccion_nueva: I wanted to give my opinion because when I saw all the bad comments I was very scared and had a lot of uncertainty, however my experience was totally different. I contracted with them to buy Hyundai, my payments were always direct debited and there were never delays or debts. I never wanted to finance the insurance, so from the end of the first year I had to notify this decision by telephone. When I did so, they gave me the account number to deposit the insurance amount and the deadlines I had, the only time I I had a problem the first year since it was impossible for me to communicate (I imagine that due to the pandemic they were short of staff), however I insisted, I waited on the line for a long time until I was able to contact someone who would assist me and everything was resolved without further ado. inconvenient. The next time everything went faster. Although their waiting times on the phone are somewhat long, except for the first time, if I waited patiently there were never any issues. I anticipated my credit settlement and everything was very easy, they gave me great attention and the times they indicated were respected, in a couple of weeks I received my invoice letter and I can say that my experience with cetelem was good.

Review: Una pesadilla. Esta financiera no tiene ningún control sobre los movimientos de sus clientes (y parece que tampoco de los propios). Tuve relación con ellos para financiar un KIA, créanme, cualquier otro medio de financiamiento es mejor que esta empresa abusiva, ventajosa y por lo tanto nada confiable.
traduccion_nueva: A nightmare. This financial institution has no control over the movements of its clients (and it seems that neither of its own). I had a relationship with them to finance a KIA, believe me, any other means of financing is better than this abusive, advantageous and therefore unreliable company.

Review:
Hola.

Me he comunicado con CETELEM para poder validar la situación recibiendo 3 versiones diferentes durante las llamadas, mismas que cuando pido hablar con algún supervisor son colgadas o terminadas por parte de su equipo de atención al cliente.

Me han transferido con más de 4 áreas diferentes sin recibir respuesta alguna, sin tener solución alguna y mucho menos sabiendo que va a proceder con mi pago.

Esto me parece una situación INACEPTABLE y poco profesional por su parte, me parece algo desagradable y por su puesto que ameritable para ser una denuncia con CONDUSEF quien se encarga de productos financieros.

Espero tener una respuesta hoy mismo a más tardar 4pm.

Saludos cordiales.
traduccion_nueva: Hello. I have contacted CETELEM to be able to validate the situation, receiving 3 different versions during the calls, which when I ask to speak with a supervisor are hung up or terminated by their customer service team. They have transferred me to more than 4 different areas without receiving any response, without having any solution, much less knowing that they will proceed with my payment. This seems to me to be an UNACCEPTABLE and unprofessional situation on their part, it seems somewhat unpleasant and of course worthy of being a complaint with CONDUSEF who is in charge of financial products. I hope to have a response today no later than 4pm. Kind regards.

Review: Llamas para que te den soluciones a problemas y te contestan como si te estuvieran haciendo el favor. Terrible el servicio. Dan información que no es y al momento que aportas a capital vienen muchas letras chiquitas. TERRIBLE EL SERVICIO.
traduccion_nueva: You call to get solutions to problems and they answer as if they were doing you a favor. Terrible service. They give information that is not and when you contribute capital there are many fine prints. TERRIBLE SERVICE.

Review: Pésima financiera, pésima atencion al cliente vía telefonía, WhatsApp o por correo a pero para cobrar son excelentes, todo manipulado a su favor.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible financial, terrible customer service via telephone, WhatsApp or by email, but they are excellent to collect, everything manipulated in their favor.

Review: Pésimo servicio de atención a cliente y ante cualquier situación se lavan las manos muy rápido, hacen cobros injustos de comisión. Si tiene oportunidad de buscar otra financiera háganlo.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service and in any situation they wash their hands very quickly, they charge unfair commissions. If you have the opportunity to look for another financial institution, do so.

Review: Super pesimo, pudiera compartir muchisimas capturas de pantalla donde solicitas hablar con asesor por whatsapp y dias sin contestar ah!! pero eso si, si tu no les contestas en media hora ellos finalizan la conversacion por seguridad. por telefono ni se diga, pesimo, da muchisima impotencia no poder resolver estos asuntos, desde junio intentando liquidar pero de verdad imposible que te den informacion o te aclaren, Fatal!!!
traduccion_nueva: Super terrible, I could share many screenshots where you request to speak with an advisor on WhatsApp and days without answering ah!! But yes, if you don't answer them within half an hour they end the conversation for safety. Not to mention by phone, terrible, it is very helpless not to be able to resolve these matters, since June trying to settle but it is really impossible for them to give you information or clarify, Fatal!!!

Review:
Es un batallar para dar aportaciones a capital, no contestan, y no puedo liberar mi factura, cuando ya no se debe casi nada y quiero liquidarlo.

No vuelvo  a tramitar un credito con ellos, ni a recomendarlos.
traduccion_nueva: It is a struggle to make capital contributions, they do not answer, and I cannot release my invoice, when almost nothing is owed and I want to settle it. I will not process a loan with them again, nor recommend them.

Review:
Pésimo Servicio al cliente   Son muchas veces las que me e comunicado por tonterías que me mandan mensajes que debo x cantidades cuando no es así y te contestan de mala manera  diciéndote que suele pasar eso  deberían de capacitarlos mejor. Y que se dirijan a los clientes de una manera amable y correcta  y no lleven sus problemas personales asu trabajo.
Tengan cuidado si tiene domiciliado su pago aúna tarjeta aveces hacen cargos  no autorizados
traduccion_nueva: Terrible Customer Service There are many times that I have been contacted for stupid reasons that they send me messages that I owe And that they address clients in a friendly and correct manner and do not bring their personal problems to their work. Be careful if you have your payment direct debited to a card, sometimes they make unauthorized charges

Review: No financien nada con esta basura de empresa, las penalizaciones por 1 día de atraso peor que el banco, la atención telefónica super groseros e impacientes, para cobrar no buenísimos fatal basura de financiera.
traduccion_nueva: Do not finance anything with this garbage company, the penalties for 1 day of delay are worse than the bank, the telephone service is super rude and impatient, to charge not very good, fatal financial garbage.

Review: La peor financiera de México, no recomendada, solo quieren cobrar mensualidades no les interesa que liquides el crédito, te ponen trabas y te dan largas, pésimo servicio y la actitud de los asesores telefónicos peor, se creen dueños de la empresa, no lo recomiendo para nada.
traduccion_nueva: The worst financial company in Mexico, not recommended, they only want to collect monthly payments, they are not interested in you paying off the credit, they put obstacles in your way and give you delays, terrible service and the attitude of the telephone advisors is worse, they think they own the company, I do not recommend it not at all.

Review: Me cargaron dos veces una póliza que jamás contraté, ni correspondía a cuenta nueva, envié todo tal como lo pedían para reembolso una y otra vez, me confirmaron de recibido y resolvían a los 15 días. Ya pasaron los 15 días  y no resuelven nada y Scotiabank menos.
traduccion_nueva: They charged me twice for a policy that I never contracted, nor did it correspond to a new account, I sent everything as requested for reimbursement again and again, they confirmed receipt and resolved within 15 days. The 15 days have passed and nothing has been resolved, much less Scotiabank.
dimension_SASB: MANAGEMENT OF THE LEGAL AND REGULATORY ENVIRONMENT

Review: Mi padre llevaba más de 3 años pagando, cuando ocupo el seguro JAMAS logro comunicarse para que lo asesorarán y brindaran apoyo, el 5 de marzo de este año "cancelo" a la fecha siguen cobrando, son de lo peor, te piden mil requisitos para el reembolso y aun así no agilizan, siguen cobrando, tardas siglos en que te contesten la llamada, ocupan estados de cuenta que te envían días después de que ya te cobraron, pésimo servicio, no lo recomendaría para nada
traduccion_nueva: My father had been paying for more than 3 years, when I got the insurance I NEVER managed to get in touch so that they would advise him and provide support, on March 5 of this year I "cancelled" to this day they continue to charge, they are the worst, they ask you for a thousand requirements to the refund and even then they don't expedite it, they keep charging, it takes forever for them to answer your call, they take up account statements that they send you days after they already charged you, terrible service, I wouldn't recommend it at all

Review:
Tengo desde el 13 de mayo con ustedes tratando de hacer mi tramite y la respuesta solo es le falta un papel y  esperar el tiempo correspondiente .
Segun su contrato tardan 20 dias para resolver cada caso. Espero su resputa si no tendré que asesorarme en profeco
traduccion_nueva: I have been with you since May 13 trying to complete my procedure and the only response is that you need a piece of paper and to wait the corresponding time. According to their contract, they take 20 days to resolve each case. I await your response if not I will have to seek professional advice.

Review: Si van a contratar con ellos les evito hacerlo. Sus procesos están hechos para alargar la comunicación con el cliente y evitan los pagos de siniestros. en mi caso fue desempleo.
traduccion_nueva: If they are going to contract with them, I prevent them from doing so. Their processes are designed to lengthen communication with the client and avoid claims payments. In my case it was unemployment.

Review: Me dejaron de cobrar, y cuando reclamo para que me cobren me cancelan la póliza con la que tenía más de 5 años, no dan opción para que uno pague directamente por si se les olvida cobrarte!....PEEEEEEEEEESIMA empresa, no contraten nada con ellos.
traduccion_nueva: They stopped charging me, and when I claim to be charged they cancel the policy that I had had for more than 5 years, they do not give the option for one to pay directly in case they forget to charge you!...PEEEEEEEEEEEES GREAT company, don't hire anything with them.

Review: Una aseguradora que se oculta a la sombra de otras instituciones, dando un servicio lento y poco eficaz a sus clientes. Su metodo de atención; correos burócraticos con mil años de tiempo de respuesta y folios de aclaracion sin respuesta.
traduccion_nueva: An insurance company that hides in the shadow of other institutions, providing a slow and ineffective service to its clients. Your method of care; bureaucratic emails with a thousand-year response time and pages of clarification without a response.

Review: Muy decepcionante, no contraten este seguro. Desde el mes de marzo no me dan respuesta sobre mi póliza de seguro, y me traen dando vueltas, alguien sabe cómo puedo proceder por este pésimo servicio?
traduccion_nueva: Very disappointing, do not take out this insurance. Since March they have not given me a response about my insurance policy, and they keep me going, does anyone know how I can proceed due to this terrible service?

Review: Esta empresa es un fraude. Llevo meses intentando cancelar la póliza que me dieron por abrir una cuenta con Scotiabank. Me siguen haciendo los cargos indebidos pese a que mandé la documentación completa.
traduccion_nueva: This company is a fraud. I have been trying to cancel the policy they gave me for opening an account with Scotiabank for months. They continue to make improper charges even though I sent complete documentation.
dimension_SASB: MANAGEMENT OF THE LEGAL AND REGULATORY ENVIRONMENT

Review:
Esta “compañía de seguros” es un fraude. He cancelado en 3 ocasiones el servicio que sin mi consentimiento incluyó #Scotia Bank. Aún con trámites y folios de confirmación de servicio cancelado. Me siguen descontando mensualmente de la cuenta.
El “modus operandi” parece ser colusion con ejecutivos del Banco Mencionado.
Habrá que exhibir sus estafas en redes y demandar en Conducef por fraude.
traduccion_nueva: This “insurance company” is a fraud. I have canceled on 3 occasions the service that included #Scotia Bank without my consent. Even with procedures and confirmation sheets of canceled service. They continue to deduct my account monthly. The “modus operandi” appears to be collusion with executives of the Mentioned Bank. They will have to display their scams on networks and sue Conducef for fraud.

Review: peso servicio, contrate un seguro a través de Banorte de robo bienes personales, entregue toda la documentación y nunca me pagaron, era mas desgastante llamar que darlo por perdido
traduccion_nueva: peso service, I took out insurance through Banorte for theft of personal property, I handed in all the documentation and they never paid me, it was more exhausting to call than to give it up for lost

Review: Es un fraude está disque empresa de seguros, solamente para cobrar sirven, desde octubre contraté un seguro y jamás me llegó la póliza ni siquiera la encontraban en sistema, lo cancele por teléfono después de un choro de requisitos absurdos y me siguen cobrando los ratas
traduccion_nueva: This insurance company is a fraud, they only serve to collect, since October I took out insurance and I never received the policy, they couldn't even find it in the system, I canceled it by phone after a bunch of absurd requirements and the rats continue to charge me

Review:
Concuerdo con todos los inconformes contra cardif, es un astuto y tramposo método el que usan para liberarse de compromisos que prometen y no cumplen.

Y lo peor que Scotiabank está siendo cómplice voluntario de sus tranzas, apenas se puede creer que una institución que supuestamente es muy seria y profesional esté unida a esta aseguradora.
traduccion_nueva: I agree with all the dissidents against Cardif, it is a cunning and deceitful method that they use to free themselves from commitments that they promise and do not fulfill. And the worst thing is that Scotiabank is being a voluntary accomplice in their misdeeds; one can hardly believe that an institution that is supposedly very serious and professional is linked to this insurer.

Review: Son buenos para cobrar a pesar de solicitar la baja de un seguro que nunca enviaron número de póliza , veo que no soy la única deberíamos ir PROFECO todos .
traduccion_nueva: They are good at collecting money despite requesting cancellation of insurance that they never sent a policy number. I see that I am not the only one, we should all go PROFECO.

Review: Pesimo servicio, tardan en contestarte y para ser efectivo el seguro de desmpleo, le dan muchas vueltas, pero eso si, para cobrar están molestando
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they take a long time to respond to you and for the unemployment insurance to be effective, they give it a lot of thought, but yes, to get paid they are bothering you

Review:
La peor aseguradora que he tenido
PÉSIMO es poco
Llevo 3 meses tratando de hacer valido mi seguro de Desempleo y solo me dan largas y el ultimo día de mes me dicen que hace faltan mas documentos (y al siguiente día es mi cobro) y cuando mandas los documentos jamás te contestan tu tienes que estar marcando para darle seguimiento…

Nadie te sabe resolver y lo peor es que el seguro es CARÍSIMO.
traduccion_nueva: The worst insurance company I've ever had is TERRIBLE. It's not much. I've been trying to validate my Unemployment insurance for 3 months and they only give me pause and on the last day of the month they tell me that more documents are needed (and the next day is my payment) and when you send The documents never answer you, you have to keep dialing to follow up... Nobody knows how to solve it and the worst thing is that the insurance is VERY EXPENSIVE.

Review: Fraude, de igual manera cancele hace 1 mes y me siguen domiciliando el cobro de estos ESTAFADORES me dan números de cancelación y aún así nadie los para, alguien que se quiere unir para hacer algo en contra de ellos ?
traduccion_nueva: Fraud, in the same way I canceled 1 month ago and they continue to direct me the payment from these SCAMMERS, they give me cancellation numbers and still no one stops them, someone who wants to join together to do something against them?

Review: Pésimo servicio no contraten se evitan la molestia de que no les contesten y los dejen en espera por más de una hora
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, don't hire them, you avoid the hassle of not being answered and left on hold for more than an hour.

Review: JAMAS CONTRATEN ESTE SEGURO BASURA, NO RESPONDEN ANTE SITUACIONES Y AL ENVIAR DOCUMENTOS LOS VUELVEN A PEDIR, EN MI CASO FUE ESO ME DIJERO QUE ME PAGARIAN ESTE 3 O 4 DE ENERO DE 2024 MI SINIESTRO FUE DESDE ANTES DE SEPTIEMBRE DE 2023 Y NADIE ME DA SOLUCION, SUGIERO METAN ESCRITOS DE INCONFORMIDAD A LA CONDUSEF
traduccion_nueva: NEVER HIRE THIS GARBAGE INSURANCE, THEY DO NOT RESPOND TO SITUATIONS AND WHEN SENDING DOCUMENTS THEY REQUEST THEM AGAIN, IN MY CASE IT WAS THAT. THEY TOLD ME THEY WOULD PAY ME THIS JANUARY 3 OR 4, 2024. MY CLAIM WAS BEFORE SEPTEMBER 2023 AND NOBODY GIVES ME SOLUTION, I SUGGEST WRITINGS OF NON-CONFORMITY TO THE CONDUSEF

Review: Es todo un robo. En su primera mensualidad se cobraron 4 cargos cuando nada mas deberian tomar uno. Y para hacer la devolución te ponen muchas trabas. Que pesimo que una empresa asi este labarando, a toda la gente que le esta pasando lo mismo deberian denuncialos.
traduccion_nueva: It's all a robbery. In their first monthly payment, 4 charges were charged when they should only have one. And to make the return they put many obstacles in your way. How sad that a company like this is working, all the people who are experiencing the same thing should report them.

Review: Tengan mucho cuidado, es un robo, Scotiabank te integra el cobro de manera muy discreta y sin tu consentimiento, no puedes dar de baja el servicio de forma rápida y la idea es seguir vaciando tu cuenta.
traduccion_nueva: Be very careful, it is a theft, Scotiabank charges you very discreetly and without your consent, you cannot cancel the service quickly and the idea is to continue emptying your account.

Review: Yo aperture una cuenta en scotia Bank y me metieron este seguro a fuerza.yo no lo necesitaba ya qué contaba con uno similar por parte de liverpool pero bueno, me dijeron que al mes lo podía cancelar, y total que hasta el 3er mes la pude cancelar porque en cardif literal me colgaban cuando les decía que quería cancelar. Es un Robo disfrazado. Que pena que un banco como scotia tenga que ver con esta empresa fraudulenta.
traduccion_nueva: I opened an account at Scotland Bank and they forced this insurance on me. I didn't need it since I had a similar one from Liverpool, but well, they told me that after a month I could cancel it, and in total I was able to cancel it until the 3rd month. cancel because in Cardif they literally hung up on me when I told them I wanted to cancel. It's a disguised robbery. What a shame that a bank like Scotland has to do with this fraudulent company.

Review: Unos completos estafadores, horribles cada que tratas de cancelar te dan un folio pero te siguen cobrando nunca respetan el folio; los comentarios buenos los pagan y junto con Scotiabank cometen fraude. Horrible servicio que te cobran y nunca te dicen que tienes el servicio ni siquiera te dan las pólizas. Hay que juntarse todos los estafados y demandarlos.
traduccion_nueva: Complete, horrible scammers, every time you try to cancel they give you a folio but they continue charging you, they never respect the folio; They pay for the good comments and together with Scotiabank they commit fraud. Horrible service that they charge you and never tell you that you have the service or even give you the policies. All the scammed people must get together and sue them.

Review: Si quieren gastar todo su tiempo aire a lo wey, llamen a este lugar. Nadie sabe nada y te cuelgan...son de lo peor...
traduccion_nueva: If you want to spend all your airtime cool, give this place a call. Nobody knows anything and they hang up on you...they are the worst...

Review: Pésimo servicio, quieres aplicar tus seguros que ya pagaste y te inventan miles de pretextos para no hacerlo. Creo que es una empresa fantasma que sólo te roba tu dinero
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, you want to apply your insurance that you already paid for and they invent thousands of excuses not to do so. I think it is a ghost company that only steals your money

Review: Pésimo servicio primero te mueres antes que te resulvan
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, first you die before they solve you

Review: Puras mentiras dan puras largas pedi mi poliza vigente y me dicen que espere 72 para que me llegue es la 4 vez que marco y espero las 72 horas y no llega muy poco profesionalismo
traduccion_nueva: Pure lies, they give a lot of time, I asked for my current policy and they told me to wait 72 for it to arrive, this is the 4th time I have dialed and I waited 72 hours and it doesn't arrive, very unprofessionalism

Review: Pésimo servicio y la cancelación ni se diga
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service and the cancellation is not said

Review: Grupo cárdif, nefastos. Nunca me llego la póliza pero los cobros puntuales, es una pesadilla la cancelación 😡😡😡😡
traduccion_nueva: Cardif group, disastrous. I never received the policy but the payments were punctual, cancellation is a nightmare 😡😡😡😡

Review: Si quieren venir a perder su tiempo con un solo ejecutivo y 6 personas esperando les espera Ci Banco.
traduccion_nueva: If you want to come and waste your time with a single executive and 6 people waiting, Ci Banco awaits you.

Review:
Bad experience.
The guy to the right was very unprofessional. He asked for my passport and scanned it for what seemed to be 2 minutes. Then he was listening to the girls talk and didn’t even continue doing what he was doing.

Another lady came in from China, she showed her passport through the glass and didn’t give it to them.
They exchanged her money quick.

For me it took almost 10 minutes for the whole process.

Then he tried to give me 17.20, but the sign on the door said 17.30.

I had to correct him. But he was rude, he shouldn’t be at work.

Go other to another place for better customer service.
traduccion_nueva: Bad experience. The guy on the right was very unprofessional. I asked for my passport and scanned it for what seemed to be 2 minutes. Then he was listening to the girls talk and didn't even continue doing what he was doing. Another lady came in from China, she showed her passport through the glass and didn't give it to them. They exchanged her money quickly. For me it took almost 10 minutes for the whole process. Then he tried to give me 17.20, but the sign on the door said 17.30. I had to correct him. But he was rude, he shouldn't be at work. Go elsewhere to another place for better customer service.

Review: My experience was great . I had to ask a hotel employee where is the nearest place where I can convert my USD money and they told me here . You need your passport and it’s only a small fee . Perfect 👍
traduccion_nueva: My experience was great. I had to ask a hotel employee where is the nearest place where I can convert my USD money and they told me here. You need your passport and it's only a small fee. Perfect 👍

Review: Servicio muy mal!
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service!

Review: Cambie dólares y el servicio fue bueno y rápido
traduccion_nueva: I exchanged dollars and the service was good and fast

Review: Fui el primer cliente para cambiar un cheque. Amables. Lo que si no me agrado es que me hicieran  volver a firmar porque ahí no iba la firma y que finalmente no me lo cambiarán porque quién me dió el cheque estaba variada su firma.
traduccion_nueva: I was the first customer to cash a check. Kind. What I don't like is that they made me sign again because the signature wasn't there and that in the end they won't change it because whoever gave me the check had a different signature.

Review: Excelente servicio ... Gracias Ci banco
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service...Thank you Ci bank

Review: Muy mal que no tengan servicio para apertura de cuenta.
traduccion_nueva: It's too bad that they don't have an account opening service.

Review: Fui a cambiar un euro en perfecto estado y no quisieron recibírmelo argumentando que estaba rayado. La señorita ni siquiera estaba concentrada en su trabajo, estaba platicando con su compañero es vez de brindarme una atención de calidad. No vengan aquí y mejor vayan a Mackenzie casa de cambio, que se encuentra en la plaza de a lado. Ahí muy diferente la atención, revisaron el billete y no tenía ningún daño o rayadura como dijo su “empleada”. Deberían contratar personal con experiencia y más competente
traduccion_nueva: I went to exchange a euro in perfect condition and they did not want to receive it, arguing that it was scratched. The young lady was not even focused on her work, she was talking to her colleague instead of providing me with quality care. Don't come here and better go to Mackenzie's exchange house, which is located in the square next door. The attention there was very different, they checked the bill and it did not have any damage or scratches as their “employee” said. They should hire more experienced and competent staff.

Review: Very lovely staff and helped me thru all processes. Only one problem is that they took a lot of time for the process and it required me to give calls to the customer service, their bilingual service was difficult to connect so I gave up and communicate in Spanish, then all well.
traduccion_nueva: Very lovely staff and helped me through all processes. Only one problem is that they took a lot of time for the process and it required me to give calls to the customer service, their bilingual service was difficult to connect so I gave up and communicate in Spanish, then all well.

Review:
SON UNOS RATEROS
Aparte de la mala experiencia no me querían respetar el tipo de cambio que tenían anunciado. Incluso siendo cliente de Ci banco me querían cobrar más por meterlo a la tarjeta
Unos ladrones no vayan a esta sucursal
traduccion_nueva: THEY ARE THIEVES Apart from the bad experience, they didn't want to respect the exchange rate they had announced. Even as a Ci Banco customer they wanted to charge me more for putting it on the card. Some thieves don't go to this branch.

Review: Pesimo servicio al cliente. La gerente que está ahí es súper grosera y parece que hay que rogarle para que te atienda. De verdad lamentable
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service. The manager there is super rude and it seems like you have to beg her to help you. Truly unfortunate

Review:
COUNTERFEIT BILLS
I am not the first person to post that we were given counterfeit money in this branch of CI Banco. If you have foreign currency to exchange DO NOT go here. They will try to give you counterfeit hidden among real bills. In general, familiarize yourself with the ways to tell counterfeit and real bills and do not trust anyone, even banks.

BILLETES FALSOS
No soy la primera en escribir que nos dieron billetes falsos en esta sucursal de CI Banco. Si necesitan cambiar moneda extranjera NO vayan a esta sucursal. Nos dieron billetes falsos entre los billetes reales.
traduccion_nueva: COUNTERFEIT BILLS I am not the first person to post that we were given counterfeit money in this branch of CI Banco. If you have foreign currency to exchange DO NOT go here. They will try to give you counterfeit hidden among real bills. In general, familiarize yourself with the ways to tell counterfeit and real bills and do not trust anyone, even banks. FAKE BILLS I am not the first to write that they gave us fake bills at this CI Banco branch. If you need to change foreign currency, DO NOT go to this branch. They gave us fake bills among the real bills.

Review: La experiencia de sacar un credito con ellos y el servicio post-venta, sugiero que se lo pierdan.
traduccion_nueva: The experience of getting a loan with them and the after-sales service, I suggest you miss it.

Review: Pésimo servicio de la Srita, acudí a poner dolares y euros el 21 septiembre, y la tarjeta dejará de funcional el 2 de octubre y mi viaje es a partir del 5 de octubre. En ningún momento me informó. Me hubiera ido con una tarjeta con $ y sin poder usar. Groseramente me.dice ...se les envió correo para avisarles. Le pregunto si ya sabias que va a caducar en pocos días,  porque no me informas? Usted debe saber...pésima la mujer....
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from the lady, I went to put dollars and euros on September 21, and the card will stop working on October 2 and my trip is from October 5. At no time did he inform me. I would have left with a card with $ and without being able to use it. He rudely tells me... they were sent an email to notify them. I ask you if you already knew that it will expire in a few days, why don't you inform me? You should know...the woman is terrible...

Review: Excelente seguimiento al tramite de entrega de factura de un credito automotriz. Recomendable para siguientes tramites
traduccion_nueva: Excellent follow-up to the invoice delivery process for an automotive loan. Recommended for following procedures

Review: pesima atencion telefonica
traduccion_nueva: terrible telephone service

Review: Muy leeeeennttooooooo el servicio
traduccion_nueva: Very readeeeeennttoooooo service

Review: Pésimo servicio telefónico en la sucursal, no te responden y te dejan en espera por demasiado tiempo
traduccion_nueva: Terrible phone service at the branch, they don't answer you and leave you on hold for too long

Review: Muy buen servicio y trato amable
traduccion_nueva: Very good service and friendly treatment

Review: Muy buena a atención y servicio
traduccion_nueva: Very good attention and service

Review:
Avviso importante per i turisti,
“Non andate a cambiare i vostri soldi in questo posto”.
Giorno 11/01/2024 Abbiamo cambiato 200 € e ci hanno propinato soldi falsi. Pensavamo fosse un ufficio serio invece ci hanno rubato i soldi. Quando ce ne siamo accorti ci siamo rivolti alla polizia che gentilmente ci ha accompagnati con una volante in questo posto ma nonostante la presenza della polizia hanno negato il fatto assumendo un atteggiamento di chi è stato scoperto. Abbiamo fatto denuncia presso la polizia federale per frode.
Molto probabilmente i soldi li perderemo ma almeno saranno indagati Vi raccomando boigottate questa associazione di ladri.
traduccion_nueva: Important notice for tourists, “Don't go to change and you sold in this post.” Giorno 01/11/2024 We exchanged €200 and we have not tipped soldi falsi. We thought we had a serious job once and for all we had rubato and soldi. When we do not act as a member of the police, we have graciously accompanied them with a steering wheel in this post, but the presence of the police has not denied the fact that we have assumed an atteggiamento di chi è stato scoperto. Abbiamo fatto denuncia presso la polizia federale per frode. Most likely, I sold out and lost, but at least we will investigate.

Review:
Hay varias sucursales en la terminal 1, filas enormes, es lento el servicio, 3 cajas, solo 2 personas atendiendo.
Observé discriminación a una persona adulto mayor, no traía lentes y de mal modo llenaron su formato para cambio de divisas.
Esperé 1 hora en la fila, ya en la caja el empleado habla contigo y al mismo tiempo con sus compañeras, no pone atención.

Mal servicio.
Mala atención.
Fíjate en el tipo de cambio...haz tu conversión para saber cuánto dinero vas a recibir...
En la foto se aprecia el tamaño de la fila de la sucursal.
traduccion_nueva: There are several branches in terminal 1, huge lines, service is slow, 3 checkouts, only 2 people serving. I observed discrimination against an elderly person, he was not wearing glasses and they filled out their currency exchange form in a bad way. I waited 1 hour in line, already at the checkout the employee talks to you and at the same time with his colleagues, he does not pay attention. Bad service. Bad attention. Look at the exchange rate...do your conversion to know how much money you will receive... In the photo you can see the size of the line at the branch.

Review: Servicio fiable para el cambio de moneda, hasta ahora he cambiado más de $1000 USD y todo bien. Ha que considerar que existen diferentes horarios dónde se aplica tarifas distintas. Por ejemplo, en las noches hay tasas diferentes a las diurnas. Siempre de debe contar bien el dinero para garantizar que no hayan malos entendidos. Pero de todas las casas de cambia que recorrí en el aeropuerto ha sido la que ofrece más dinero de. También hay que tener en cuenta que siempre hay muchas personas que vienen a cambiar aquí, por lo que si estás dispuesto a esperar en la fila por algo de tiempo, valdrá la pena. Suerte con tu cambio.... Recomendable
traduccion_nueva: Reliable service for currency exchange, so far I have changed more than $1000 USD and everything is fine. It must be considered that there are different schedules where different rates apply. For example, at night there are different rates than during the day. Money should always be counted correctly to ensure that there are no misunderstandings. But of all the exchange houses that I visited at the airport, it was the one that offered the most money. Also keep in mind that there are always a lot of people coming to change here, so if you are willing to wait in line for a while, it will be worth it. Good luck with your change.... Recommended

Review: Pésimo servicio, la señorita se la pasaba haciendo otras cosas en vez de atendernos. Solamente éramos 2 en la fila y tardamos 30mins en completar la solicitud, el chico parece ser nuevo y se entiende en cierto grado, pero les falta capacitación, no son empáticos, menos mal no están en una sucursal fuera del AICM porque no funcionarían, tendrían filas de horas de atención. Afortunadamente ha sido la primera vez que he tenido que acercarme a ese "banco" y espero sea la última.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, the lady spent her time doing other things instead of serving us. There were only 2 of us in line and it took us 30 minutes to complete the application, the guy seems to be new and understands it to a certain degree, but they lack training, they are not empathetic, thank goodness they are not in a branch outside the AICM because they would not work, they would have queues of hours of attention. Fortunately, it was the first time that I had to approach that "bank" and I hope it will be the last.

Review: Terrible servicio, con trato discriminatorio y grosero hacia los clientes, además de lento. Existen mucho mejores opciones. En mi caso en particular el Sr. J. Hernández brindó una muy mala experiencia.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, with discriminatory and rude treatment towards customers, as well as slow. There are much better options. In my particular case, Mr. J. Hernández provided a very bad experience.

Review: Fuí a cambiar menos de 500 dólares y no me aceptaron el pasaporte porque según su sistema no está vigente. Es una prórroga de un documento oficial, reconocido internacionalmente y a pesar de que soy residente permanente, simplemente rechazaron mi identificación. No lo recomiendo. No pierdan su tiempo, busquen otras opciones, que por fortuna, si las hay.
traduccion_nueva: I went to exchange less than $500 and they did not accept my passport because according to their system it is not valid. It is an extension of an official, internationally recognized document and even though I am a permanent resident, they simply rejected my identification. I do not recommend it. Don't waste your time, look for other options, which fortunately, there are.

Review: Pésimo servicio, todas las personas que atienden son nefastas y no entienden lo que es el servicio al cliente. Te tratan con la punta del pie y resuelven tus dudas con cara. Ojalá puedan mejorar el servicio
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, all the people who serve are terrible and do not understand what customer service is. They treat you with the tip of their foot and resolve your doubts with their face. I hope they can improve the service

Review:
Excelente servicio! El personal más atento y preparado de toda la ciudad.
Cuentan con múltiples servicios para todo tipo de necesidad, desde una cuenta con divisas hasta préstamos personales o para auto.
Recomendados 100%
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service! The most attentive and prepared staff in the entire city. They have multiple services for all types of needs, from a foreign currency account to personal or car loans. 100% recommended

Review: Pésimo banco. La atención es mala y aparte lo asesores no explican con transparencia. Es un banco fraudulento. No recomiendo ningún tipo de inversión aquí.
traduccion_nueva: Bad bank. The attention is bad and the advisors do not explain with transparency. It is a fraudulent bank. I do not recommend any type of investment here.

Review: Asesores en cotorreo y se molestan si uno llega para algún servicio. Como banco no lo recomiendo pero esta sucursal se me hizo muy corriente por atención, personal poco preparado, tiempo de espera, etc. Deberían contratar a gente más proactiva.
traduccion_nueva: Advisers chatter and get upset if one arrives for a service. As a bank I do not recommend it but this branch seemed very common to me due to attention, poorly trained staff, waiting time, etc. They should hire more proactive people.

Review: Buena atención, y servicio atractivos
traduccion_nueva: Good attention and attractive service

Review: PESIMO SERVICIO!! La persona que te atiende se la pasa hablando por teléfono con otros clientes
traduccion_nueva: TERRIBLE SERVICE!! The person who serves you spends his time talking on the phone with other customers

Review: El estacionamiento está chico y con cadenas para que no te estaciones, pero hay un estacionamiento público cerca de ahí. El lugar limpio y la atención que me dieron fue buena.
traduccion_nueva: The parking lot is small and with chains so you don't park, but there is a public parking lot nearby. The place was clean and the attention they gave me was good.

Review: Buena ubicación y excelente atención de los agentes
traduccion_nueva: Good location and excellent service from the agents

Review: Pésimo servicio, me hicieron esperar a pesar de que mo había ningún cliente. Me hicieron llenar un formato aun cuando sacaron copia de mi INE. El tipo de cambio que manejan es superior al que hay en otros lugares y no tienen denominaciones bajas. Ejemplo: solo tenán billetes de 100 Euros.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they made me wait even though there were no customers. They made me fill out a form even though they took a copy of my INE. The exchange rate they use is higher than in other places and they do not have low denominations. Example: they only have 100 Euro bills.

Review: Pésima atención al cliente, no había ni una persona cuando llegué y tardaron mas de 40 minutos para que me atendieran antes de irme a la sucursal de la huayacan
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, there was not a single person when I arrived and it took more than 40 minutes for them to serve me before I went to the Huayacan branch

Review: Pésima atención por telefono
traduccion_nueva: Bad service on the phone

Review: Un banco muy responsable, serio y que cumple, obvio este crédito es también gracias a su personal, que siempre está muy atento y al servicio del cliente...haciendo mención especial al lic. Enrique, quien es una persona intachable, honesta y muy capaz, hábil y sobretodo respetuosa y amable, el cual hace sentir al cliente en confianza y seguro... siempre dando opciones y resolviendo todas las dudas que llevamos.. una persona honorable, gran líder comprometido con su trabajo y muy leal a el... felicidades CI Banco!
traduccion_nueva: A very responsible, serious and compliant bank, obviously this credit is also thanks to its staff, who are always very attentive and at customer service...making special mention of the lic. Enrique, who is an impeccable, honest and very capable, skilled and above all respectful and kind person, who makes the client feel confident and secure... always giving options and resolving all the doubts we have... an honorable person, great leader committed to his work and very loyal to him... congratulations CI Banco!

Review: Estoy muy contento con Cibanco ya que es el único banco que creyó en mi para solicitar un crédito automotriz, el Lic. Liquidano Mora siempre al pendiente de mis necesidades y preguntas, y sobre todo la actitud de servicio que lo caracteriza. en verdad agradezco a Cibanco por darme la oportunidad de ser su cliente, recomiendo 100% a Cibanco Acapulco
traduccion_nueva: I am very happy with Cibanco since it is the only bank that believed in me to request a car loan, Mr. Liquidano Mora is always attentive to my needs and questions, and above all the service attitude that characterizes him. I really thank Cibanco for giving me the opportunity to be their client, I 100% recommend Cibanco Acapulco

Review: Excelente Banco, tienen muy buenos productos 100% recomendables y la atención de su personal es también excelente en especial la del Ejecutivo Lic. Enrique Liquidano siempre atento, muchas gracias! Espero pronto ya puedan abrir sus oficinas. Gracias CIBanco.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent Bank, they have very good products that are 100% recommended and the attention of their staff is also excellent, especially that of the Executive Lic. Enrique Liquidano, always attentive, thank you very much! I hope you can open your offices soon. Thank you CIBanco.

Review: Cibanco una institución financiera con prestigio, con respaldo de una  gran organización bancaria. Por causalidad inicié la interacción con Cibanco, ya con varios años, de los cuales he podido ahorrar dinero, por la orientación, que me ha dado, en especial el Sr Enrique Liquidano, claro esta que no solo por parte de él, sí no del equipo que conforma en esa localidad. Que solo se cuenta con una sola sucursal...ojalá hubiera otras más. Pues bien, he tenido varios productos con la citada entidad, y pienso en seguir adquiriendo otros, si me lo permiten. Recomiendo y he recomendado al 100%
traduccion_nueva: Cibanco is a prestigious financial institution, with the support of a large banking organization. By chance, I began the interaction with Cibanco, several years ago, of which I have been able to save money, due to the guidance that he has given me, especially Mr. Enrique Liquidano, of course not only on his part, but also on his part. team that forms in that location. There is only one branch...I wish there were more. Well, I have had several products with the aforementioned entity, and I plan to continue purchasing others, if they allow me. I recommend and have recommended 100%

Review:
Hola, con el respeto de siempre me dirijo a Usted Liquidano de la Manera más atenta para permitirme decirle unas palabras de agradecimiento por su apoyo, disponibilidad y atención hacia mi persona. reconozco el alto valor ético, profesionalismo y entrega no solo a su trabajo, que por cierto lo desempeña de manera muy profesional, sino hacia los clientes de los cuales Usted  siempre atiende de la manera más atenta y profesional. Por {ultimo, pero no menos importante, me permito despedirme deseándole el mejor de los éxitos en su vida personal y profesional, que estoy seguro lo está logrando gracias a su entrega, disciplina, pero ante todo por la empatía hacia sus clientes. reciba un fuerte y caluroso abrazo.

ATENTAMENTE.

C. QUEVEDO.
traduccion_nueva: Hello, with the usual respect, I address you Liquidano in the most attentive manner to allow me to say a few words of gratitude for your support, availability and attention towards me. I recognize the high ethical value, professionalism and dedication not only to your work, which by the way you perform in a very professional manner, but also to the clients of whom you always serve in the most attentive and professional manner. Last but not least, I would like to say goodbye by wishing you the best of success in your personal and professional life, which I am sure you are achieving thanks to your dedication, discipline, but above all because of your empathy towards your clients. receive a strong and warm hug. SINCERELY. C. QUEVEDO.

Review: La verdad un excelente servicio del ejecutivo que me atendió hace algún tiempo, el Sr. Enrique de esa sucursal. De hecho cuando tengo alguna duda referente a CIBANCO siempre me atiende con esmero. Saludos
traduccion_nueva: The truth is, excellent service from the executive who assisted me some time ago, Mr. Enrique from that branch. In fact, when I have any questions regarding CIBANCO, they always assist me with care. Greetings

Review: Excelente banco en el manejo de las divisas y productos, amable y comprometida atención con total profesionalismo de el Lic. Enrique Liquidano. Gracias por siempre estar al 100!
traduccion_nueva: Excellent bank in the management of currencies and products, friendly and committed attention with total professionalism from Mr. Enrique Liquidano. Thank you for always being 100!

Review: Execelente servicio y atención por parte de los ejecutivos del banco, destacando Enrique quien siempre está atento en solucionar cualquier cuestión relacionada con mis trámites bancarios.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service and attention from the bank's executives, highlighting Enrique who is always attentive in solving any issue related to my banking procedures.

Review: Me agrada el servicio de CiBanco y la atencion personalizada que nos brinda el Ejecutivo Enrique Liquidano ya que le da seguimiento a todos los tramites y no demora en resolverlos
traduccion_nueva: I like CiBanco's service and the personalized attention that Executive Enrique Liquidano gives us since he follows up on all the procedures and does not take long to resolve them.

Review: Buena institución bancaria, una buena opción para hacer crecer tu dinero, además de que brindan excelente atención a los usuarios.
traduccion_nueva: Good banking institution, a good option to grow your money, in addition to providing excellent service to users.

Review: Me gusta 👍  es una buena suc. Y opcion de créditos buen servicio lo recomiendo
traduccion_nueva: I like it 👍 it's a good suc. And credit option, good service, I recommend it

Review:
Fui al banco para que me expliquen el cargo año por año que hacen y la respuesta fue yo no te di el crédito y que me dijieron mentiras.  la mensualidad subió mil pesos que es por renovación de seguros que seguro tendré??
Pero es mucho y no resuelven nada..
No lo recomiendo trucha...
traduccion_nueva: I went to the bank to have them explain the year-by-year charge they make and the answer was that I didn't give you the credit and that they told me lies. The monthly payment went up a thousand pesos, which is due to insurance renewal, what insurance will I have? But it's a lot and they don't solve anything... I don't recommend it trout...

Review: Pésimo servicio y atención al cliente por los administrativos.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service and customer service from the administrative staff.

Review: El Lic. Enrique Liquidano es un excelente asesor, da soluciones a diversos problemas, me a apoyado en la gestion de creditos para clientes que en otros lugares no. 1000% recomendado CiBanco como entidad financiera y 10,000% el Lic. Enrique Liquidano
traduccion_nueva: Mr. Enrique Liquidano is an excellent advisor, he provides solutions to various problems, he has supported me in managing credits for clients that are not available elsewhere. 1000% recommended CiBanco as a financial entity and 10,000% the Lic. Enrique Liquidano

Review: Excelente servicio. Había poca gente, me ayudaron a llenar un documento, Muy amables y fue todo muy rápido. ¡Sigan así!
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service. There were few people, they helped me fill out a document, They were very friendly and everything was very fast. Keep in that way!

Review:
Mariana Aguilar gerente de sucursal
Su atención es terrible estoy seguro tendrá suficientes quejas esta es una más un tema de atención y servicio
traduccion_nueva: Mariana Aguilar branch manager Your attention is terrible, I am sure you will have enough complaints, this is one more issue of attention and service

Review: La peor atención tan solo para pasar a ventanilla.
traduccion_nueva: The worst service just to go to the window.

Review: Muy mal servicio te hacen dar muchas vueltas porque no dan la información completa y cuando acudes te piden otros documentos
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, they make you go around in circles because they don't give you complete information and when you go they ask for other documents.

Review:
Estimados amigos de Banamex.
Su servicio de mensajería, para entrega de tarjetas, nunca llego.
Nunca recibí mi reposición.
Y por lo tanto no puedo comprar ni pagar por medio de ustedes.
Chequen quien les entrega las tarjetas, por que les están engañando.
ING. Rogelio Morales
Área de Sistemas AICM
traduccion_nueva: Dear friends of Banamex. Their courier service, for delivering cards, never arrived. I never received my replacement. And therefore I cannot buy or pay through you. Check who gives you the cards, because they are deceiving you. ING. Rogelio Morales AICM Systems Area

Review:
Amplias felicitaciones para el Lic. Ricardo López Sánchez, subdirector en análisis financiero. Excelente trayectoria profesional, asertividad, transparencia, siempre a la vanguardia y perfecta atención a todos sus clientes.
Lo extrañamos en Foro TV, canal financiero y la radio.
Cabe mencionar aparte del reconocimiento y sugerencias, tomen en cuenta su perfecta imagen para la Institución Bancaria y le extiendan mayores oportunidades de crecimiento para el mencionado analista como para sus cautivos clientes.
Realmente merece un mejor reconocimiento e incentivos para continuar creciendo juntos.
Atte. Psic. Lucy López
La banca número uno!! Siempre!!
traduccion_nueva: Broad congratulations to Lic. Ricardo López Sánchez, deputy director of financial analysis. Excellent professional career, assertiveness, transparency, always at the forefront and perfect attention to all clients. We miss him on Foro TV, financial channel and radio. It is worth mentioning, apart from the recognition and suggestions, take into account his perfect image for the Banking Institution and extend greater growth opportunities for the aforementioned analyst as well as for his captive clients. It really deserves better recognition and incentives to continue growing together. Atte. Psych. Lucy López The number one bank!! Always!!

Review:
Pésimo servicio !!!    ❌❌
Más de 2 años y nadie entiende mi solicitud.
No leen los correos ni las reseñas,  es frustrante !
Ahora su prioridad son los EVENTOS
¿Algún teléfono o correo donde conteste un ser humano pensante?
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service !!! ❌❌ More than 2 years and no one understands my request. They don't read emails or reviews, it's frustrating! Now your priority is EVENTS. Any phone or email where a thinking human being answers?

Review: Les pongo una estrella por qué no puedo ponerles 0 siempre es una sucursal donde te. Están casi haciendo un favor de cambiarte un cheque.  Piden endoso de una manera mandé a uno de mis colaboradores a cambiarlo y me dicen que está mal endosado exijo hablar con el gerente y me lo niegan  y eso si cuando uno va están muele y muele que quieren que saques tu cuenta ahí. En ese banco  con servicio nefasto
traduccion_nueva: I give them one star because I can't give them 0. It's always a branch where you. They are almost doing you a favor by cashing you a check. They ask for an endorsement in a way, I sent one of my collaborators to change it and they tell me that it is wrongly endorsed, I demand to speak with the manager and they deny it and that's when you go and they are going on and on that they want you to get your account there. In that bank with disastrous service

Review: Es el banco con el más pésimo servicio... gente inepta que no sabe ni hacer su trabajo... gente que solo esta platicando y no brinda la atención al cliente...
traduccion_nueva: It is the bank with the worst service... inept people who don't even know how to do their job... people who are just talking and don't provide customer service...

Review: Pésimo servicio. Se tardan horas para atender
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. It takes hours to attend

Review: El personal resolvió los problemas y dudas que tenía; también fueron muy atentos.
traduccion_nueva: The staff resolved the problems and doubts I had; They were also very attentive.

Review:
Pésimo servicio
Media hora esperando a pasar a ventanilla solo por no tener cuenta con el banco
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service Half an hour waiting to go to the window just because you don't have a bank account

Review:
Que servicio tan nefasto.
Siempre es lo mismo con esta sucursal.
1 cajero para atender a todos los clientes.
El ser cliente no te da ningún beneficio.
traduccion_nueva: What a disastrous service. It's always the same with this branch. 1 cashier to serve all customers. Being a customer does not give you any benefits.

Review: Tengan cuidado están robando en el área de los cajeros. Se acercan los disque ejecutivos para ayudarte con algún movimiento y en la distracción te cambian tu tarjeta. Sobre todo se acercan a los adultos mayores y el Banco no te ayuda! Pésimo todo el servicio
traduccion_nueva: Be careful, they are stealing in the ATM area. The executive dialers come to help you with some movement and in the distraction they change your card. Above all, they approach older adults and the Bank does not help you! Terrible all the service

Review: Pesimo servicio del recepcionista
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from the receptionist

Review:
Febrero 2024
Ha cambiado el personal de esta sucursal y ahora son mucho más atentos y amables MUCHAS FELICIDADES.
La plantilla de trabajadores anteriores eran muy groseros en general otorgo 5 estrellas por que realmente se lo merecen por el cambio tan grato.
traduccion_nueva: February 2024 The staff at this branch has changed and now they are much more attentive and friendly. CONGRATULATIONS. The previous staff of workers were very rude in general, I give 5 stars because they really deserve it for the pleasant change.

Review:
Pésimo servicio de la Señora que esta en la entrada hoy 6 de Marzo 2024 aprox a las 13:20 hrs. grosera y me dijo quejate con quien quieras de todos modos no me hacen nada.
No quería darme turno y me dijo que en ventanilla me negaría el servicio y al contrario super atentos en ventanilla..
