On one occasion I went with my mother and my baby in my arms, we waited for more than 40 minutes since the staff was busy to that in the end they told us the same thing, "the person showing the jewelry is not there and they couldn't show anything."

Review: Excelente opción para empeñar y obtener un préstamo a una tasa muy razonable. Adicional si lo que quieres es comprar tienen artículos muy interesantes. Yo he comprado muchas cosas que necesito en está tienda. El personal es muy atento y cordial. Muy recomendable.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent option to pawn and obtain a loan at a very reasonable rate. Additionally, if what you want is to buy, they have very interesting items. I have bought many things that I need in this store. The staff is very attentive and friendly. Highly recommended.

Review: Si eres cliente de empeño te hacen descuento al comprar, yo fui a comprar pero le suben mucho al precio porque no he empeñado, de mal modo me enseñó una cadena la chica, no tienen buena actitud
traduccion_nueva: If you are a pawn customer they give you a discount when you buy, I went to buy but they raise the price a lot because I haven't pawned, the girl showed me a chain in a bad way, they don't have a good attitude

Review: Falta de seguimiento en el servicio a sus clientes
traduccion_nueva: Lack of follow-up in customer service

Review:
Excelente opción para empeñar y financiarse.  El servicio en la sucursal es muy bueno y el precio razonable.
Muy recomendable.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent option to pawn and finance yourself. The service at the branch is very good and the price is reasonable. Highly recommended.

Review: Me gusta el servicio de ahora
traduccion_nueva: I like the service now

Review: Excellent customer service
traduccion_nueva: Excellent customer service

Review:
El día 10 de febrero a las 12 acudí a esta sursal para empeñar 2 relojes de la marca citizen stiletto eco drive ..la srita que me atendió de conflexion robusta ,cabello corto negro usaba lentes de aumento me dijo con desdén que por mis artículos cuando mucho  me prestaría $100 por cada reloj !! Sin consultar previamente el sistema.
Me llamo mucho la atención su pésima actitud ya que la empresa invierte bastante dinero en capacitar al personal..
Es una verdadera lástima que los colaboradores que trabajan en Donde carezcan de empatia, me encuentro muy desilusionado por el mal trato que recibí.
traduccion_nueva: On February 10 at 12 noon I went to this store to pawn 2 citizen stiletto eco drive brand watches. The lady who served me with a robust build, short black hair, wore magnifying glasses and disdainfully told me that because of my items when He would very much lend me $100 for each watch!! Without previously consulting the system. I was very struck by their terrible attitude since the company invests a lot of money in training staff. It is a real shame that the collaborators who work at Donde lack empathy, I am very disappointed by the poor treatment I received.

Review: Hola buen dia, excelente atencion, el Joven Rodolfo tiene un trato excelente, muy amable, gentil siempre esta dispuesto a ayudar y aclarar dudas.
traduccion_nueva: Hello, good day, excellent service, Young Rodolfo has excellent treatment, very kind, gentle, always willing to help and clarify doubts.

Review: Pésimo servicio  hasta cuando quieres comprar algo . Hacen todo lo posible para que no te lleves el artículo.  Por el que preguntas  . Más el jotito que esta ahí te atiende con unas jetas . Que fan ganas de darle en su madre
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service even when you want to buy something. They do everything possible to prevent you from taking the item. The one you ask about. Plus the little jot who is there serves you with some faces. What a fan you want to give to your mother

Review: Muuuuuy mal servicio, me hicieron esperar casi una hora para que al final me dijieran que me podían cotizar lo que llevaba a empeñar, pero que no tenían sistema para levantar la boleta de empeño, y como ya faltaban 15 minutos para su cierre, ah y aparte si uno no es cliente todavía te hacen a un lado y atienden a las personas que llegaron después de uno. La verdad pésimo servicio y las 2 muchas y 2 hombres que había no son suficientes para atender, por lo que ví tres de las personas que hay en esa sucursal estaban comiendo y la muchacha que estaba ahí a todas la personas que llegaban les decía que no tenían sistema desde hace como 20 minutos.
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, they made me wait almost an hour until they finally told me that they could quote me what I needed to pawn, but that they had no system to collect the pawn ticket, and since there were already 15 minutes left until it closed, oh and Besides, if you are not a customer, they still push you aside and serve the people who arrived after you. The truth is, terrible service and the 2 men and 2 men that were there were not enough to serve, so I saw three of the people in that branch were eating and the girl who was there told all the people who arrived that they were not there. They had a system for about 20 minutes.

Review: pesimo servicio, te tuercen la cara, parece que te regalan las cosas
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they twist your face, it seems like they give you things for free

Review: 6 lugares de ejecutivos y solo uno atendiendo, el otro en su lugar con el celular. Pésimo servicio
traduccion_nueva: 6 executive seats and only one serving, the other in his place with the cell phone. Terrible service

Review: Garbage bank. Garbage service.
traduccion_nueva: Garbage bank. Garbage service.

Review: Es un asco de servicio no ay gente esta vacía la sucursal y no me pasan dentro de 2 horas cuando acaben de platicar las señoritas te atienden
traduccion_nueva: The service is disgusting, there are no people, the branch is empty and they don't come to me within 2 hours when they finish talking, the ladies will assist you

Review: Pésimo servicio. Me espere a que me dieran un  turno, mientras  paso una persona y en caja la atendieronbprimeto, sin turno. Reclame y la señorita de la caja me dijo que era cosa entre los clientes. Que a ella le dijeron que no se daban turnos, le enseñe el mío y me ignoro totalmente.  Le dije a la gerente y su única respuesta es que lo iba a ver. Para que ponen reglas si las van a ignorar.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. I waited for them to give me a turn, while a person passed by and was attended to quickly at the checkout, without a turn. I complained and the lady at the cashier told me that it was between the customers. They told her that they didn't take turns, I showed her mine and she totally ignored me. I told the manager and her only response was that she was going to see him. Why make rules if they are going to ignore them.

Review: Poca gente y se tardan mucho tiempo en atender, se van los ejecutivos y regresan y no pasan a la gente. Son muy lentos, el servicio es ineficiente
traduccion_nueva: Few people and it takes a long time to serve, the executives leave and come back and they don't pass on to the people. They are very slow, the service is inefficient

Review: La sucursal con peor servicio a cliente, una incompetencia total por parte de sus ejecutivos de cuenta que tardan 30 minutos por caso. Estuve en espera una hr y media y no resolvieron nada.
traduccion_nueva: The branch with the worst customer service, total incompetence on the part of its account executives who take 30 minutes per case. I was on hold for an hour and a half and they didn't resolve anything.

Review: Cambio de tarjeta débito en BBVA por vencimiento ...7 minutos con mucha gente. Mismo trámite en HSBC 1.5 horas con banco vacío. Tienen capacitación para calidad en el servicio? Igual y sí tienen capacitación. El problema es capacidad.
traduccion_nueva: Change of debit card at BBVA due to expiration...7 minutes with a lot of people. Same procedure at HSBC 1.5 hours with empty bank. Do they have training for service quality? Maybe they do have training. The problem is capacity.

Review: Pésimo servicio. La chica de la recepción es sumamente grosera. La línea directa está en medio de la entrada, en frente de todo, entonces, cuando la chica de la recepción te quiere pasar con alguien por teléfono (porque claro que ella no ayuda), no es posible proporcionar información sensible como número de cuenta o número de tarjeta, nombre completo o fecha de nacimiento (información que cualquier criminal puede usar para robar tu información). Soy cliente Premier y, aunque llegué antes, atendieron a otro chico “porque ya habían quedado”, lo cual me parece una falta de respeto. La atención es sumamente lenta, como en todos los bancos. Ojalá hubiese más opciones de Fintech en el país para abandonar la banca tradicional.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service. The girl at the reception is extremely rude. The hotline is in the middle of the entrance, in front of everything, so when the girl at the reception wants to put you through to someone on the phone (because of course she doesn't help), it is not possible to provide sensitive information such as account number or card number, full name or date of birth (information that any criminal can use to steal your information). I am a Premier customer and, although I arrived earlier, they served another boy “because they had already met”, which seems disrespectful to me. Service is extremely slow, as in all banks. I wish there were more Fintech options in the country to abandon traditional banking.

Review: Traía un documento que decía que no necesito entregar más que la ine para la transacción, y me niegan el servicio por requerir copia, cuando el doc específicamente dice que no hay que llevarla. Unos inútiles que no quieren trabajar 🤷‍♀️ además la sucursal estaba vacía. Increíble
traduccion_nueva: I brought a document that said that I do not need to provide more than the INE for the transaction, and they denied me the service for requiring a copy, when the doc specifically says that you do not have to bring it. Some useless people who don't want to work 🤷‍♀️ plus the branch was empty. Incredible

Review: Fatal el trato a cliente la persona que te atiende en la entrada como tipo recepcionista, súper mal que atiende tipo IMSS para entrar haber un ejecutivo tarde aproximadamente 2 hrs cuando llegue a la sucursal era la segunda persona en la lista nunca entendí porque tanto el tiempo
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, the person who serves you at the entrance as a receptionist, super bad that the IMSS type attends to enter, there was an executive who was late for approximately 2 hours when he arrived at the branch, he was the second person on the list, I never understood why so much time

Review: Es la peor sucursal, desde la recepcionista hasta la Gerente, parece que te hacen un favor, nada de servicio al cliente
traduccion_nueva: It is the worst branch, from the receptionist to the Manager, it seems like they are doing you a favor, no customer service

Review: Pésima experiencia. Los cajeros no saben de atención a clientes.
traduccion_nueva: Bad experience. The cashiers don't know about customer service.

Review: Pésimo servicio por la recepción la chica que está en la entrada no pudo ayudarme.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service at the reception, the girl at the entrance couldn't help me.

Review: Pésimo servicio por parte de la chica de la entrada de recepción
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from the girl at the reception entrance

Review: Largos tiempos de espera para pasar con ejecutivos en comparación con otras sucursales. La señorita frente a cajas,  cero tacto de atención al cliente, se molesta si le haces preguntas sobre el trámite.
traduccion_nueva: Long wait times to spend with executives compared to other branches. The lady in front of the registers, zero customer service, gets upset if you ask her questions about the procedure.

Review: Siempre suele estar solo, lo malo es que por eso mismo a veces solo hay una persona en ventanilla y en ocasiones suele tardar muchooo en atender a cada persona. Otro punto negativo de esta sucursal es que la practi caja nunca funciona, además de que para hacer un depósito no basta con el número de tarjeta, a fuerza te pide el número de cuenta. Que mmda es esa? Para que lo consideren si van a hacer un depósito a alguien en este banco
traduccion_nueva: He is always usually alone, the bad thing is that for that reason sometimes there is only one person at the window and sometimes it usually takes a long time to serve each person. Another negative point about this branch is that the practical cashier never works, in addition to the fact that to make a deposit the card number is not enough, it forces you to ask for the account number. What the hell is that? For you to consider if you are going to make a deposit to someone in this bank

Review: Atención definitivamente mala sin ejecutivos que te atiendan de inmediato totalmente abandonada la sucursal y tiempo de espera muy largo.
traduccion_nueva: Definitely bad service without executives to assist you immediately, the branch completely abandoned and a very long waiting time.

Review: Pesimo servicio en todos sus aspectos y no se diga acerca del mal manejo de cuentas.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service in all its aspects and not to mention the poor management of accounts.

Review: Pésimo servicio, de 5 stands solo dos están atendiendo
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, out of 5 stands only two are serving

Review: Saludos :lleve a mi papá y es una persona discapacidad y la atención de la gerencia y del personal pésima lamentable la atención a los mayores y discapacitados
traduccion_nueva: Greetings: I took my dad and he is a disabled person and the attention of the management and staff is terrible, the attention to the elderly and disabled is terrible.

Review: Buena atención, hay 3 cajas y los ejecutivos regularmente hay uno mínimo disponible.
traduccion_nueva: Good service, there are 3 boxes and the executives regularly have a minimum one available.

Review: Pésima atención. El personal de ventanilla (hombre) muy grosero, contesta con una actitud prepotente y nada amable, no sabe explicar las cosas sólo me hizo perder el tiempo y con muy muy mala actitud. Hasta un señor que venía en la fila detrás de mi me dio la razón. Ni vayan a perder su tiempo
traduccion_nueva: Bad attention. The window staff (men) are very rude, they answer with an arrogant and not at all friendly attitude, they don't know how to explain things, they just wasted my time and with a very very bad attitude. Even a man who was in line behind me agreed with me. Don't even waste your time

Review: Pésima actitud. Si no les gusta su trabajo qué se busquen uno donde les paguen ahí parece que están en servicio comunitario porque todos andan con una cara y dan unas respuestas qué parece que están ahí obligados.
traduccion_nueva: Bad attitude. If they don't like their job, they should look for one where they get paid. It seems like they are doing community service because everyone walks around with a face and gives answers that make it seem like they are obligated there.

Review: Es el peor banco de todo México, se tardar horas en atender a sus clientes. No les importa la calidad del servicio que brindan. HSBC está cerrando en varios países, espero que cierren en México y esta gente pierda su trabajo para que aprendan a valorar lo que tienen.
traduccion_nueva: It is the worst bank in all of Mexico, it takes hours to serve its customers. They don't care about the quality of the service they provide. HSBC is closing in several countries, I hope they close in Mexico and these people lose their jobs so they learn to value what they have.

Review: Excelente atención rápida
traduccion_nueva: Excellent fast service

Review:
Más de 1 hr para dar de alta mi token Móvil.
Pésimo servicio.
traduccion_nueva: More than 1 hr to register my Mobile token. Terrible service.

Review: Pésimo servicio ni ejecutivos de cuenta hay para atender!!!
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, there are no account executives to attend to!!!

Review: Estuve 1h esperando para abrir una cuenta y nunca me atendieron, todos los asesores estaban cotorreando entre ellos, había 10 personas cuando llegué y solo atendieron a 2 en 1h el resto de las personas se fueron sin ser atendidas porque se cansaron de esperar, pésimo servicio, un asesor se me acercó y me dijo ahora te atiendo y nunca regreso ni siquiera sabía si me podía dar el servicio que ocupa. Les recomiendo que elijan otro banco o cambien su nómina a otro banco porque este es un circo.
traduccion_nueva: I spent 1 hour waiting to open an account and they never helped me, all the advisors were chattering among themselves, there were 10 people when I arrived and they only attended to 2 in 1 hour, the rest of the people left without being attended to because they got tired of waiting, terrible service , an advisor approached me and told me now I'll take care of you and I'll never come back. He didn't even know if he could give me the service he occupies. I recommend that you choose another bank or change your payroll to another bank because this is a circus.

Review: Demasiado lento el servicio, solo hay un cajero de 4 que debería haber. Se pierde mucho tiempo sobre todo porque los cajeros automáticos no funcionan
traduccion_nueva: The service is too slow, there is only one cashier out of 4 that there should be. A lot of time is wasted especially because ATMs do not work

Review:
Son lo que le siguen de lentos, tanto en ventanilla, como con ejecutivos, he ido 2 veces y me he aventado más de una hora hasta por una fila de 15 personas.

No sé si no tienen personal o no están capacitados pero siempre es lo mismo
traduccion_nueva: They are the next slowest, both at the counter and with executives, I have gone twice and I have waited more than an hour for up to a line of 15 people. I don't know if they don't have staff or they aren't trained but it's always the same.

Review: El servicio es pésimo y muy lento.  No se ha previsto ninguna ruta de cola
traduccion_nueva: The service is terrible and very slow. No queue route planned

Review: Sus cajeros automáticos constantemente están fuera de servicio y tienen poco personal en ventanilla a pesar de ser solo cuatro ventanillas.
traduccion_nueva: Their ATMs are constantly out of service and they have little staff at the counter despite there being only four counters.

Review: No me pudo ayudar me dijo "no está aprobado tu pago cuando minutos antes me enseñaron un baucher de que ya estaba aparte se aferran y no te apoyan 0 buena calidad del servicio y tardan años en atender los asesores espere una hora y no cambiaron de cliente me fui exasperada
traduccion_nueva: He couldn't help me, he told me "your payment is not approved when minutes before they showed me a baucher that was already apart, they cling to you and don't support you. 0 good quality of service and it takes years for the advisors to attend to me, I waited an hour and they didn't change clients I left exasperated

Review: El personal que atiende esta sucursal es muy amable siempre dispuesto a ayudar en los trámites y dudas que se tengan además la mayoría del tiempo siempre hay rapidez para la atención ya sea en el área de escritorios o en el área de cajas es rápida la atención
traduccion_nueva: The staff that attends this branch is very friendly, always willing to help with the procedures and questions you may have. Furthermore, most of the time there is always quick service, whether in the desk area or in the cashier area, the service is fast.

Review: Eficiencia en general
traduccion_nueva: Overall efficiency

Review: Fuimos a abrir una cuenta mancomunada. De inicio, la ejecutiva con poco conocimiento, poca claridad y mucho desgano. Parecía que nos estaba haciendo un favor. Tardó 1 hora y media la “apertura” que al final no se logró. 2 días después la cuenta sigue en autorización y vinimos a cancelarla por ineficientes. Nos urgía abrir la cuenta. No era cliente HSBC. Ahora ni de broma lo voy a considerar a futuro! No pierdas tu tiempo .
traduccion_nueva: We went to open a joint account. At the beginning, the executive with little knowledge, little clarity and a lot of reluctance. It seemed like he was doing us a favor. The “opening” took 1 hour and a half, but in the end it was not achieved. 2 days later the account is still authorized and we came to cancel it because it was inefficient. We needed to open the account. I was not an HSBC customer. Now I'm not even jokingly considering it in the future! Do not waste your time .

Review: Parece un picadero más que un banco, la gente y los clientes de esa sucursal horribles. No pueden procesar un pago de pasaporte porque no les abre la página, es un depósito simple. Te hacen esperar para decirte que no se puede
traduccion_nueva: It looks like a riding school more than a bank, the people and customers at that branch are horrible. They cannot process a passport payment because the page does not open, it is a simple deposit. They make you wait to tell you that it can't be done

Review: Servicio lento, pero siempre me han atendido súper bien y muy amables. Vayan con tiempo porque cualquier trámite puede tomar más de lo esperado.
traduccion_nueva: Slow service, but they have always treated me very well and very friendly. Go early because any procedure can take longer than expected.

Review: La gerente de la sucursal tiene la peor actitud y servicio.
traduccion_nueva: The branch manager has the worst attitude and service.

Review: Pésimo servicio al cliente. Muy mala educación y groseras
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service. Very rude and rude

Review: Just went into this bank to try and withdraw dollars from the atm, as I need them for an upcoming trip to Cuba. There's no one on the front desk, so I had to line up to speak to an unbelievably rude teller who REFUSED to give me the address of their Angel branch (the only one, according to an Internet search, with an atm that dispenses dollars). I even had a lovely woman step in to help and he still wouldn't provide it, but had a terrible attitude and was totally dismissive. Fortunately, she was able to find and write it down for me, but not without him first telling her she wasn't to use her phone while in the bank. I've been a customer of HSBC in the UK for 30 years and used branches all over the world. Never have I had such an experience; in fact, I've always been super impressed with their service. I'd give this place zero stars if I could.
traduccion_nueva: Just went into this bank to try and withdraw dollars from the atm, as I need them for an upcoming trip to Cuba. There's no one on the front desk, so I had to line up to speak to an unbelievably rude teller who REFUSED to give me the address of their Angel branch (the only one, according to an Internet search, with an ATM that dispenses dollars) . I even had a lovely woman step in to help and he still wouldn't provide it, but had a terrible attitude and was totally dismissive. Fortunately, she was able to find and write it down for me, but not without him first telling her she wasn't to use her phone while in the bank. I've been a customer of HSBC in the UK for 30 years and used branches all over the world. Never have I had such an experience; In fact, I've always been super impressed with their service. I'd give this place zero stars if I could.

Review:
Una de las peores sucursales.
Acudí en 3 ocasiones por diferentes situaciones, en ninguna fueron capaces de darme una solución, ni los ejecutivos ni por vía telefónica.
Al revisar las reseñas veo que no soy el único cliente insatisfecho, personal poco capacitado e ineficaz.
traduccion_nueva: One of the worst branches. I went 3 times for different situations, in none of them were they able to give me a solution, neither the executives nor by phone. When reviewing the reviews I see that I am not the only dissatisfied customer, poorly trained and ineffective staff.

Review: Es la peor sucursal a la que he ido, en realidad siento que es el peor banco que existe, los cajeros son extremadamente groseros, mal vestidos, te atienden de mala gana, el servicio es demasiado lento, si pueden evítense la molestia de ir ahí.
traduccion_nueva: It is the worst branch I have ever been to, in reality I feel that it is the worst bank that exists, the tellers are extremely rude, poorly dressed, they serve you reluctantly, the service is too slow, if you can avoid the trouble of going there .

Review: En particular quisiera reportar a sus cajeros por sobornos dado aque cada ves que ocupo cambiar algunos billetes por monedas como soy trabajadora del seven me solicitan a cambio chocolates o algo de tomar si no no me cambian y el día de hoy se me negó el cambio por no permitirles calentar gratis su comida y yo creo que como empresa no debería ya que es un conflicto  de interés. Y en otras sucursales  por ser de seven y tener la nómina con ellos nunca tenia problemas por ir a cambiar
traduccion_nueva: In particular, I would like to report their cashiers for bribery since every time I try to exchange some bills for coins, as I am a sevens worker, they ask me for chocolates or something to drink in exchange, otherwise they do not change me and today I was denied the change for not allowing them to heat their food for free and I believe that as a company they should not since it is a conflict of interest. And in other branches, because it was seven and they had the payroll with them, I never had problems going to change.

Review: Ineficiente servicio, demasiado tardado, mala atención de los ejecutivos, favoritismo en la atención, nadie hace caso a la lista de espera, no tienen orden. Espera de 2 horas para reponer una tarjeta robada, los ejecutivos fingiendo que trabajan pero solamente están evitando atender gente. Pésimo
traduccion_nueva: Inefficient service, too late, poor attention from executives, favoritism in service, no one pays attention to the waiting list, they have no order. Waiting for 2 hours to replace a stolen card, the executives pretending that they work but they are only avoiding serving people. Appalling

Review:
*LO MALO
1. Los ejecutivos no conocen al 100 los productos; literal se rieron cuando les pedí la CLABE de una TdC, pero se justificaron cuando la vieron en un estado de cuenta que la banco dejó de enviarme.
2. El chico de la caja con la peor actitud, que he visto en servicio a clientes.
*LO BUENO
El reembolso de anualidad de TdC es muy tardado y debe concluir en sucursal, pero los ejecutivos tratan de agilizarlo para que sea lo más rápido posible.
traduccion_nueva: *THE BAD 1. Executives do not know 100% of the products; They literally laughed when I asked them for the CLABE of a ToC, but they justified themselves when they saw it in an account statement that the bank stopped sending me. 2. The cashier boy with the worst attitude I have ever seen in customer service. *THE GOOD The TdC annuity reimbursement takes a long time and must be completed at the branch, but executives try to expedite it so that it is as quick as possible.

Review: Pésimo servicio, se ponen a platicar los ejecutivos y el gerente no cumple con su puesto. No lo recomiendo prefiero moverme a otra sucursal donde me den buena atención.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, the executives start talking and the manager does not fulfill his position. I do not recommend it, I prefer to move to another branch where they give me good attention.

Review: Pésima atención, ejecutivos de mal humor, maltratan a cuentabientes y se salen todos a comer a la misma hora cuanto habemos muchos esperando ser atendidos
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, executives in a bad mood, they mistreat accountants and they all go out to eat at the same time when there are many of us waiting to be served.

Review:
Me lleve una enorme decepción de este banco.

Fui a una apertura de una cuenta (primera vez) ya que no pude sacarla online. Solo me dijeron que siga intentándolo desde internet. Pésima atención y pésimo servicio.
traduccion_nueva: I was hugely disappointed in this bank. I went to open an account (first time) since I couldn't get it online. They just told me to keep trying from the internet. Terrible attention and terrible service.

Review: Mal servicio, no son puntuales con sus horarios de operación.
traduccion_nueva: Bad service, they are not punctual with their operating hours.

Review: MIENTRAS UNO ESPERA ELL@S  EN SU CELULAR.  PESIMO SERVICIO DE HSBC PREFIERO CITIBANAMEX.
traduccion_nueva: WHILE ONE WAITS FOR THEM ON THEIR CELL PHONE. TERRIBLE HSBC SERVICE I PREFER CITIBANAMEX.

Review: Ni una estrella se merecen el servicio es pésimo los cajeros déspotas groseros siempre de mal humor soy cliente advance y nos Dan esos tratos imaginense los q no son clientes eviten este banco
traduccion_nueva: They don't even deserve a star. The service is terrible. The ATMs are rude despots, always in a bad mood. I'm an advance customer and they give us that kind of treatment. Imagine those who are not customers, avoid this bank.

Review:
Pésimo servicio, no se merece ni una estrella, desde el gerente hasta el que te atiende en la puerta, llevo dos meses cambiando mi nómina y no queda, quería tomar la oferta del Cashback de $6,000 que tanto promocionaban y es una decepción, termine regalando dinero, tiempo, no saben que tarjeta de débito deben aplicar para esa promoción, te dan vueltas y total ni dan nada, hablo con el gerente para checar el motivo por el cual no cae mi nómina con ellos y me dijo que cancele el proceso, cuando tengo los dos plásticos que me dieron ese día cuando abri la cuenta (la de crédito y débito) neta no saben ni que hacen con los clientes, no hay seguimiento de atención, una lástima.
Mi recomendación, no vayan a esa sucursal!!!
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, it doesn't deserve a single star, from the manager to the person who assists you at the door, I've been changing my payroll for two months and it doesn't fit, I wanted to take the $6,000 Cashback offer that they promoted so much and it's a disappointment, I ended up giving away money, time, they don't know which debit card they should apply for that promotion, they give you the runaround and don't give anything, I spoke to the manager to check the reason why my payroll doesn't fall with them and he told me to cancel the process, When I have the two plastic cards that they gave me that day when I opened the account (the credit and debit account) they do not even know what they do with the clients, there is no follow-up service, a shame. My recommendation, don't go to that branch!!!

Review: Pésimo servicio, muy pocas personas atendiendo y si preguntas no te responden, la señorita Mariana Rodríguez muy grosera en su trato.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, very few people serving and if you ask they don't answer, Miss Mariana Rodríguez is very rude in her treatment.

Review: Pésima atención al cliente. Estuve en espera y en el momento en que tenían que atenderme, el asesor se acercó a preguntarme que trámite iba a realizar. Después de decirle con lujo de detalles a lo que iba, me dijo que enseguida me pasaba, pero una señora se acercó para hacerle una pregunta y se la llevó para atenderla primero. Le dije que yo seguía pero me dijo que no se tardaba y siguió atendiéndola. Mejor me fui a otra sucursal 😠
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service. I was on hold and at the moment when they had to see me, the advisor came to ask me what procedure I was going to carry out. After telling her in great detail what she was about, she told me that she would come right by, but a lady came up to ask her a question and took her away to attend to her first. I told her that I was going to continue but she told me that she wouldn't take long and continued treating her. I better went to another branch 😠

Review: O sea es red 24 horas y no se puede acceder al cajero, que mal servicio
traduccion_nueva: In other words, it is a 24-hour network and you cannot access the ATM, what a bad service.

Review: Las instalaciones están pésimas. Actualmente sus instalaciones son precarias, no tienen sillas. La lista de espera para pasar con un ejecutivo, hay que cuidarla por qué te brincan o se la llevan y te tiene que volver a anotar.
traduccion_nueva: The facilities are terrible. Currently their facilities are precarious, they do not have chairs. The waiting list to go through with an executive, you have to take care of it because they skip you or take you away and you have to sign up again.

Review:
Pésimo servicio al cliente, los ejecutivos te atienden de mala gana, se la pasan platicando y no atienden a los usuarios
De las cuatro ventanillas solo una funcionaba
No te quieren dar cambio que por qué no tienen
Casi hora y media formada para cambiar un cheque
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, the executives serve you reluctantly, they spend all their time talking and do not attend to the users. Of the four windows, only one worked. They don't want to give you change, why don't they have almost an hour and a half to wait to cash a check?

Review:
Ofenden a personas de la tercera edad.
Cometen errores en sus proceso.
Te hacen perder el tiempo.
Sistema de turnos del año del caldo. Con papel y hoja.
Ofenden a mujeres con agresión y groserías.

La peor sucursal del mundo. Si quieren evitarse un coraje, eviten ir a esta sucursal. Es mejor invertir 15 minutos de traslado que pararse por aquí.
Mi trámite era muy sencillo: apertura de una cuenta... el trámite super tardado, para que al final el asesor cometiera un error que provocó reiniciar el proceso dese cero. Se inició el proceso desde cero, de nuevo, y el sistema lo bloqueó por 15 minutos. De verdad desesperante. Perdí dos horas sin concluir un trámite tan fácil. Y mientras estuve ahí, fui testigo de como trataron mal a una persona de la tercera edad en bastón, hablándole de una manera muy irrespetuosa y agresiva. Asimismo le pasó lo mismo a una señora.

De verdad eviten ir a esta asquerosa sucursal. Espero con ganas el día que la cierren.
traduccion_nueva: They offend elderly people. They make mistakes in their processes. They waste your time. Broth year shift system. With paper and sheet. They offend women with aggression and rudeness. The worst branch in the world. If you want to avoid anger, avoid going to this branch. It is better to spend 15 minutes traveling than to stop here. My procedure was very simple: opening an account... the procedure took a long time, so that in the end the advisor made a mistake that caused the process to be restarted from scratch. The process was started from scratch, again, and the system blocked it for 15 minutes. Truly desperate. I wasted two hours without completing such an easy procedure. And while I was there, I witnessed how they treated an elderly person with a cane badly, speaking to him in a very disrespectful and aggressive manner. The same thing happened to a lady. Seriously avoid going to this disgusting branch. I look forward to the day they close it.

Review: No tienen mucho flujo de gente, pero el personal te atiende cuando quiere y se tardan años en realizar simples trámites.
traduccion_nueva: They don't have a lot of people flow, but the staff assists you whenever they want and it takes years to carry out simple procedures.

Review:
Super nefasta la atención tienes que esperar una hora aun que no haya gente para intentar aperturar una cuenta esta terrible el servicio nada
recomendable.
traduccion_nueva: The service is super disastrous, you have to wait an hour even if there are no people to try to open an account, the service is terrible, not recommended.

Review:
Pésimo servicio, están con la novia en vez de atender a los clientes.
No les importa ni si quiera que sea cliente advance
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they are with the bride instead of serving customers. They don't even care if I'm an advance customer.

Review: Pesima atencion, se tardan mucho en poder atenderte y ni siquera pueden darte una solucion, lo unico que hacen es darte largas.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they take a long time to assist you and they can't even give you a solution, all they do is drag you out.

Review:
El servicio es ineficiente (son tardados aunque no haya gente), la  información que brinda el personal no es clara, al final te terminan comunicando servicio al cliente vía telefónica,  para que un asesor te diga informaciónsimple que en sucursal te pudieron haber dado...
Sí acudes con personas con discapacidad, ten en cuenta que no hay vía de acceso, las escaleras es la única opción desde la entrada, a pesar de que están en un lugar muy bien ubicado, no se conocen las rampas ni elevadores en esa sucursal.
traduccion_nueva: The service is inefficient (they are slow even if there are no people), the information provided by the staff is not clear, in the end they end up communicating with customer service over the phone, so that an advisor can tell you simple information that they could have given you in the branch. If you go with people with disabilities, keep in mind that there is no access route, the stairs are the only option from the entrance, even though they are in a very well located place, there are no ramps or elevators in that branch. .

Review: Gran servicio, dos trámites complejos en menos de 30 min. Parece que mejoraron sus procesos y remodelaron la sucursal.
traduccion_nueva: Great service, two complex procedures in less than 30 minutes. It seems that they improved their processes and remodeled the branch.

Review:
La peor sucursal de HSBC que pueda existir. Un trato denigrante hacia los usuarios, esperé más de 1 hr para que me atendiera la ejecutiva, y fui a preguntar si se demoraba más y me respondió que si, unos 20 min más aún sabiendo que ya tenía esperando 1 hora. Soy cliente Premier y no hay ni siquiera trato preferencial. La persona de la entrada es un mal educado y no ayuda en absolutamente nada!!! HORRENDO servicio.
Si podía les daba -100
traduccion_nueva: The worst HSBC branch that can exist. Degrading treatment towards users, I waited more than 1 hour for the executive to attend to me, and I went to ask if it was taking longer and she answered yes, about 20 minutes more even knowing that I had already been waiting for 1 hour. I am a Premier customer and there is not even preferential treatment. The person at the entrance is rude and does not help at all!!! HORRENDOUS service. If I could I would give them -100

Review: Si pudiera darle 0 estrellas se las daría con gusto. Pésimo servicio ojalá los investiguen para averiguar a qué se debe que tanta gente esta inconforme con ustedes 😚
traduccion_nueva: If I could give it 0 stars I would gladly give it to you. Terrible service, I hope you investigate them to find out why so many people are dissatisfied with you 😚

Review: They are taking more than 1 month to issue a credit card that has already been approved. Extremely slow staff and never know what is the next step what makes me go back and forth. Already spent more than 8h just at the place to solve the problem that they started because they typed my name wrong on their system which froze everything and are taking more than 1 month to solve a problem that they created. DO NOT OPEN AN ACCOUNT HERE
traduccion_nueva: They are taking more than 1 month to issue a credit card that has already been approved. Extremely slow staff and never know what is the next step what makes me go back and forth. Already spent more than 8h just at the place to solve the problem that they started because they typed my name wrong on their system which frozen everything and are taking more than 1 month to solve a problem that they created. DO NOT OPEN AN ACCOUNT HERE

Review:
Los sábados deberían tener 2 módulos para que la atención sea más rápido, por favor.

La atención está bien 👍
Las instalaciones son buenas 👍
Las opciones de servicio y autoservicio son efectivas 👍
traduccion_nueva: On Saturdays they should have 2 modules so that service is faster, please. The service is good 👍 The facilities are good 👍 The service and self-service options are effective 👍

Review:
Mal servicio. Se aperturo una cuenta de nomina y resulta que no esta habilitada, acudo el día sábado para solucionarlo y resulta que no hay sistema y hay poco personal.
Todo esto se hubiera evitado, si desde un principio hubieran hecho bien el servicio
traduccion_nueva: Bad service. A payroll account was opened and it turns out that it is not enabled, I went on Saturday to solve it and it turns out that there is no system and there are few staff. All this would have been avoided if they had done the service well from the beginning.

Review: El personal no es amable. Los ejecutivos perezosos, comie do en los escritorios y haciendo esperar. Falta de espíritu de servicio. El sistema súper lento para un trámite muy sencillo.
traduccion_nueva: The staff is not friendly. Lazy executives, eating at desks and making people wait. Lack of spirit of service. The super slow system for a very simple procedure.

Review: Te tratan super mal...y aún más  si se acerca la hora de su salida. Todo arrebatado el servicio...
traduccion_nueva: They treat you very badly...and even more so if your departure time is approaching. Everything taken away from the service...

Review: Todas las sucursales HSBC en cuestión con su personal, son muy lentos para atender a las personas. Una sola caja, un solo ejecutivo. Por mis experiencias es lo que yo he visto y para pasar a ventanilla hasta casi una hora con una linea de 5 a 8 personas, con un ejecutivo ni se diga. El servicio es pésimo
traduccion_nueva: All the HSBC branches in question with their staff, are very slow in serving people. A single box, a single executive. From my experiences this is what I have seen and to go to the window for almost an hour with a line of 5 to 8 people, with an executive not to mention. The service is terrible

Review: Bastante lento el servicio en ventanilla, por cada operación demoran más de 10 min y se ponen a platicar con los clientes, entiendo la parte del servicio y buen trato pero la espera y es demasiada. De 4 ventanillas solo funcionan dos y el cajero para depósitos no sirve.
traduccion_nueva: The service at the window is quite slow, for each operation it takes more than 10 minutes and they start talking to the customers, I understand the service and good treatment part but the wait is too much. Of the 4 windows, only two work and the ATM for deposits is not useful.

Review: Soy cuentahabiente de HSBC además de estar cerrando sucursales en la zona. La viga y Lorenzo Boturini/ La viga y recreo. Traen un mal servicio en esta sucursal la srita de la recepción te da turno. Pero el único cajero que atiende los llama "como van llegando" aún estando la pantalla encendida. Y nadie organiza ni le importa el hecho que. Los clientes estén confundidos, esperando que el sistema notifique el acceso con ejecutivos, ventanilla. Etc. Y cuando reclamas por qué. No faltó el vivo que se saltó al señor de edad mayor que no escucha. Se ofende y da excusas. En lugar de organizar la fila y de decir en la recepción que no den turnos.
traduccion_nueva: I am an HSBC account holder in addition to closing branches in the area. The beam and Lorenzo Boturini/ The beam and recreation. They have bad service in this branch, the lady at the reception gives you your turn. But the only cashier who serves calls them "as they arrive" even when the screen is on. And no one organizes or cares about the fact that. Customers are confused, waiting for the system to notify the access with executives, counter. Etc. And when you claim why. There was no shortage of the lively one who skipped the older man who doesn't listen. He gets offended and makes excuses. Instead of organizing the line and telling the reception not to take turns.

Review:
Pésimo servicio, si tienen la oportunidad de hacer uso de está sucursal desaprovechenla.
Tengo casi 7 meses intentando resolver mi caso, siendo que tenemos toda la documentación en regla, el ejecutivo comete muchas omisiones y la gerente se deslinda de todo.
Aún no me resuelven nada.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, if you have the opportunity to use this branch, miss it. I have been trying to resolve my case for almost 7 months, and we have all the documentation in order, the executive makes many omissions and the manager distances herself from everything. They still haven't solved anything for me.

Review: A mi en lo personal puedo decir que me trataron  muy bien, hiba seguido a depositar dinero y casi nunca he tenido que esperar mucho de tiempo en ser atendido y las cajeras y cajeros  que  atienden son  muy amable y rápidos  en atender mi requerimiento, me dieron hasta mi tarjeta de credito muy rápido.. es una sucursal grande y cuenta con estacionamiento el.cuel si tiene  costo. Tiene varios cajeros automáticos casi no se espera en general y casi siempre sirven y tiene  dinero.    ...
traduccion_nueva: Personally, I can say that they treated me very well, I had often deposited money and I have almost never had to wait for a long time to be attended to and the cashiers and cashiers who serve are very friendly and quick to attend to my request, they gave me even my credit card very quickly... it is a large branch and has el.cuel parking if there is a cost. It has several ATMs, almost not expected in general and they almost always work and have money. ...

Review: Bonita sucursal, servicio amable pero hay 1 o 2 cajeros en ventanilla y eso alarga los tiempos de espera.
traduccion_nueva: Nice branch, friendly service but there are 1 or 2 tellers at the window and that lengthens the waiting times.

Review: En provincia te dan un mejor servicio. Ni siquiera tiene un buen internet para validar en folio DAP
traduccion_nueva: In the province they give you better service. You don't even have a good internet to validate DAP folio

Review: Totalmente incompetentes. Hace algunos años aperturé una cuenta de débito en esta sucursal, me cobraron manejo de cuenta por “no mantener” cierto saldo en la cuenta, saldo que sí mantuve, al ir a la sucursal me dijeron que ya era un problema reportado pero que había que meter una queja, la cual no sirvió en lo absoluto, terminé perdiendo mi dinero. Hace una semana decidí darles otra oportunidad más por su insistencia vía telefónica y hoy ya es el 4to día acudiendo a sucursal para arreglar temas de la aplicación, en la sucursal me mandan a asistencia telefónica y ellos a sucursal, no han podido resolverme algo tan sencillo.
traduccion_nueva: Totally incompetent. A few years ago I opened a debit account at this branch, they charged me for account management for “not maintaining” a certain balance in the account, a balance that I did maintain, when I went to the branch they told me that it was already a reported problem but that I had to filing a complaint, which was of no use at all, I ended up losing my money. A week ago I decided to give them another chance due to their insistence over the phone and today is the 4th day of going to the branch to fix application issues, at the branch they send me to telephone assistance and they send me to the branch, they have not been able to resolve something so simple for me .

Review: Pésimo servicio .. mala atención, un cajero ineficiente, un mostrador lento, peor de lo peor, ineficiente servicio y si pudieran hacerlo más lento ..
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service.. bad service, an inefficient cashier, a slow counter, worst of the worst, inefficient service and if they could make it slower..

Review: No hay compromiso ni en la apertura del banco supuestamente abren a las 9 en sábado y no han abierto. Pésimo servicio. La persona que hoy sábado tuvo la responsabilidad de abrir y la señorita recepcionista son el motivo del por el cual cancelo mi cuenta
traduccion_nueva: There is no commitment even in the opening of the bank. They supposedly open at 9 on a Saturday and they have not opened. Terrible service. The person who was responsible for opening today, Saturday, and the receptionist are the reason why I canceled my account.

Review: Ya a mejorado mucho pues anteriormente se manejaba a la antigua pues la tecnología como que no era su fuerte, se tenía que registrar en una libreta para que atendiera algún ejecutivo y también para pasar a las cajas, fui el día 8 de junio y la tecnología ya se hizo presente ahora si parece un banco moderno
traduccion_nueva: It has already improved a lot because previously it was handled in the old way because technology was not its strong suit, it had to be recorded in a notebook so that an executive could attend to it and also to go to the checkouts. I went on June 8 and the technology It is already present now if it looks like a modern bank

Review: Pésimo servicio realmente no tienen personal, por mucho solo hay 4 personas atendiendo en toda la sucursal, deberían por lo menos contratar becarios, uno pierde demasiado tiempo en este banco, el peor hsbc de la cdmx
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they really don't have staff, there are only 4 people working in the entire branch, they should at least hire interns, one wastes too much time in this bank, the worst HSBC in Mexico City

Review: Hoy en la mañana mal servicio, cajeros sin efectivo, multicajero fuera servicio, desarden por el exceso de gente.
traduccion_nueva: This morning, bad service, ATMs without cash, multiple ATMs out of service, chaos due to too many people.

Review: Buenas instalaciones y buena atención.
traduccion_nueva: Good facilities and good service.

Review:
Además de que dejan solo a una persona atendiendo en ventanilla, no responde el saludo, habla para ella sola, no se escucha ni entiende. Llega otra señora a su lado toda mal encarada y sangrona, te barren con loa ojos.

Mientras tanto la única ejecutiva en escritorio , toda adormilada.

Lo peor, cero accesible para personas con movilidad limitada, una señora en bastón, atravesando la sucursal y la señora que se estaba quedando dormida en vez de ayudarle con la silla o algo, la esperó cómodamente en su silla.
traduccion_nueva: In addition to the fact that they leave only one person serving at the window, she does not respond to the greeting, she speaks to herself, she cannot be heard or understood. Another lady arrives at his side, looking bad and bloody, they sweep you with their eyes. Meanwhile, the only executive at the desk, all sleepy. The worst thing, zero accessible for people with limited mobility, a lady with a cane, crossing the branch and the lady who was falling asleep, instead of helping her with the chair or something, waited for her comfortably in her chair.

Review: El personal es pésimo sobre todo en la sucursal av.coyoacan. el cajero es un nefasto y la Gerente una cretina.
traduccion_nueva: The staff is terrible, especially at the Av.coyoacan branch. The cashier is a nefarious person and the Manager is a cretin.

Review: La atención es rapida, normalmente no hay fila en cajero, los empleados muy amables
traduccion_nueva: The service is fast, there is usually no line at the cashier, the employees are very friendly

Review: No hay servicio en ventanillas, la chava platicando afuera y no te informa nada. No hay cajero para depositar.
traduccion_nueva: There is no service at the windows, the girl is talking outside and doesn't tell you anything. There is no ATM to deposit.

Review: Es de las peores sucursales de Hsbc, estuvimos casi 2 horas formados y cuando casi llegamos a la caja nos avisan que ya no hay dinero !!! Mala organización , mala atención , ahh pero cuando ofrecen sus tarjetas dicen que ellos son los  mejores !!😠
traduccion_nueva: It is one of the worst Hsbc branches, we were lined up for almost 2 hours and when we almost arrived at the cash register they told us that there was no more money!!! Bad organization, bad service, ahh but when they offer their cards they say that they are the best!!😠

Review: Fuí al cajero automático y tiene muchos problemas, al presionar algunas opciones el cajero no responde de manera correcta al tacto, se marca otra opción. Ya van 2 veces que se dona dinero sin siquiera presionar esa opción. El problema no es tanto por la donación si no porque puede ocasionar otros problemas más graves. Deberían mejorar esos cajeros...
traduccion_nueva: I went to the ATM and it has many problems, when I press some options the ATM does not respond correctly to the touch, another option is marked. There have been two times that money has been donated without even pressing that option. The problem is not so much because of the donation but because it can cause other more serious problems. They should improve those ATMs...

Review: Hace un par de días fui a pedir información y la señora me comentó que se comunicaria conmigo es fecha que no se comunica para agendar me cita, pésimo servicio siempre está solo aparece en la página que está abierto y no lo está, es una sucursal fantasma da mucho que pensar, ya mejor no quise tramitar la tarjeta.
traduccion_nueva: A couple of days ago I went to ask for information and the lady told me that she would contact me. It is a date that is not communicated to schedule an appointment, terrible service, it always only appears on the page that is open and it is not, it is a ghost branch It gives a lot to think about, I didn't want to process the card anymore.

Review: Una estrella es mucho para un personal que no tiene claro quien es el cliente y no tienen el más mínimo respeto por el tiempo de los demás. El banco está vacío y quieren que espere 2 horas para la reposición de una tarjeta, están comiendo y hablando.
traduccion_nueva: One star is a lot for a staff that is not clear about who the client is and does not have the slightest respect for other people's time. The bank is empty and they want me to wait 2 hours for a card to be replaced, they are eating and talking.

Review: Terrible servicio al cliente. La señorita que te recibe y te anota no hace su trabajo. Necesitaba cambiar mi NIP me anoto e indico pasar a la sala. De ahí se desocupo un ejecutivo y se fue a platicar con ella. Dejaron de platicar y después de 30 minutos de estar en la salita ví que todos los ejecutivos estaban libres y ella estaba platique y platique con un ejecutivo en su oficina. Por lo que me pare y acerque a lo que finalmente un ejecutivo me preguntó a qué venía. En menos de un minuto arreglo mi problema. Perdí media hora de mi tiempo solo porque la señorita que recibe no hace su trabajo. No está al pendiente y parece ser que el cliente es lo último que le importa. En resumen es inútil que la tengan ahí. Por lo que veo en otros comentarios a su director no le interesa el servicio así que si pueden ir a otra sucursal mejor.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service. The lady who receives you and signs you up does not do her job. I needed to change my PIN, I wrote it down and indicated to go to the room. From there an executive left and went to talk to her. They stopped talking and after 30 minutes of being in the living room I saw that all the executives were free and she was talking and talking with an executive in his office. So I stopped and approached and finally an executive asked me why I was coming. In less than a minute I fixed my problem. I wasted half an hour of my time just because the lady who receives doesn't do her job. He is not attentive and it seems that the client is the last thing he cares about. In short, it is useless to have it there. From what I see in other comments, your director is not interested in the service, so if you can go to another branch, better.

Review: Pesimismo servicio y los ejecutivos solo pierden el tiempo platicando y se molestan cuando les tocó atender, no llevan un orden y los tiempos de espera son excesivos.
traduccion_nueva: Pessimistic service and the executives only waste time talking and get upset when it is their turn to serve, they do not keep an order and the waiting times are excessive.

Review: Muy buena excelente servicio
traduccion_nueva: Very good excellent service

Review: Tiempos de espera muy largos, solo hay un ejecutivo que atiende muy lentos mal servicio
traduccion_nueva: Very long waiting times, there is only one executive who attends, very slow, bad service

Review: Pésimo servicio todos de mal humor
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service everyone in a bad mood

Review: Pésimo servicio solo 1 caja abierta y muchos clie tes en espera el trámite la app telefónica es eterno y la señorita que atiende ese trámite anda por todos lados menos en la atención a cliente.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, only 1 open box and many customers waiting, the phone app procedure takes forever and the lady who attends to that procedure is everywhere except in customer service.

Review: Excelente servicio por parte del ejecutivo que me atendió, me ayudó a registrar mis datos y activar mi Token móvil. También la señorita de la entrada fue muy amable, incluso me ofreció pasar mi scooter adentro 🫶🏼 Muchas gracias.
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service from the executive who assisted me, he helped me register my data and activate my mobile Token. Also the lady at the entrance was very kind, she even offered me to take my scooter inside 🫶🏼 Thank you very much.

Review: Muy buena atención de parte de la ejecutiva y de la cajera, fuí a cancelar una cuenta y fueron muy amables. Fuí temprano para evitar que hubiera mucha gente.
traduccion_nueva: Very good service from the executive and the cashier, I went to cancel an account and they were very kind. I went early to avoid too many people.

Review: Pesimo servicio los ejecutivos super lentos y descansan despues de atender a un cliente,  3 horas formados y no logre que me atendieran
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, the executives are super slow and rest after serving a client, 3 hours trained and I couldn't get them to serve me

Review: Horrible, nunca pueden atender, no hay servicio,  se cae la red, nunca adquieran un producto de ellos.
traduccion_nueva: Horrible, they can never answer, there is no service, the network goes down, never purchase a product from them.

Review: Falta personal en el área de cajas generales ya que haces fila de hasta 1 o 2 horas en ocasiones
traduccion_nueva: Lack of staff in the general checkout area since you wait in line for up to 1 or 2 hours sometimes

Review: Es pésima la atención al cliente. A tomarlo en cuenta.
traduccion_nueva: Customer service is terrible. To take it into account.

Review: Pésimo servicio mala atención
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, bad attention

Review:
Beneficio de la duda

El horario de cierre dice 4:30 pm. Debido a mi trabajo me apresuré para llegar antes de que cerraran, lo cual así fue, alcance a llegar a las 4:25 pm. Pero cuando llegue me dijeron que los cajeros "no tenían sistema" y no me podían atender. Qué hacer? Tienen el beneficio de la duda... Casualidad que justo 2 min de salir de la sucursal, esa misma persona que me mencionó que no tenían sistema, ya estaba afuera tmb con todas sus pertenencias.

Ojalá puedan atender igual de bien al último cliente así como atienden al primero del día.
traduccion_nueva: Benefit of the doubt Closing time says 4:30 pm. Because of my job I rushed to get there before they closed, which they did, I managed to arrive at 4:25 pm. But when I arrived they told me that the ATMs "did not have a system" and could not serve me. To do? They have the benefit of the doubt... Coincidentally, just 2 minutes after leaving the branch, that same person who mentioned to me that they had no system, was already outside with all his belongings. I hope they can serve the last customer just as well as they do the first of the day.

Review:
Tienen Cero seguridad!
No había nadie de seguridad en la entrada ni adentro, sólo cámaras. Había una señora loca hablando de armas, cuchillos, matar, drogas, secuestrados, que ella sabe robar nóminas e identificaciones y más. No hicieron nada los del banco en un buen de tiempo!
Decidimos ir a avisar a un ejecutivo y retirarnos por seguridad
traduccion_nueva: They have Zero security! There was no security at the entrance or inside, only cameras. There was a crazy lady talking about weapons, knives, killing, drugs, kidnapped people, that she knows how to steal pay slips and IDs and more. The bank didn't do anything for a long time! We decided to go notify an executive and leave for safety.

Review: Pésimo servicio, hay 6 cubículos y nada más 2 ejecutivos, la pantalla no muestra los turnos de ejecutivo, uno me negó el servicio de aperturar nómina que porque el señor era "ejecutivo premier"  y me negó el servicio cuando era mi turno y me hizo esperar al otro ejecutivo, tienen 2 ejecutivos y uno no quiere trabajar o lo tienen de adorno, pa escoger a quien si y a quien no le dan servicio
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, there are 6 cubicles and only 2 executives, the screen does not show the executive shifts, one denied me the service of opening payroll because the man was a "premier executive" and he denied me the service when it was my turn and made me wait for the other executive, they have 2 executives and one does not want to work or they have him as an ornament, to choose who does and who does not give service

Review: Fui a abrir una cuenta y la atención fue muy buena. El ejecutivo fue muy amable desde el primer momento, resolvió todas mis dudas y me ayudó a obtener lo que yo estaba buscando. La atención fue en realidad muy rápida. La sucursal es pequeña, pero acudí en un horario de poca afluencia así que no se veía mucha gente. Bien por la sucursal en mi primer contacto.
traduccion_nueva: I went to open an account and the service was very good. The executive was very friendly from the first moment, he answered all my questions and helped me get what I was looking for. The service was actually very fast. The branch is small, but I went at a slow time so there weren't many people. Good for the branch on my first contact.

Review: El banco más lento y desorganizado, no hay personal, es la segunda vez que intento recoger una tarjeta y no puedo por el tiempo de espera tan prolongado, servicio nefasto
traduccion_nueva: The slowest and most disorganized bank, there is no staff, it is the second time I have tried to pick up a card and I cannot because of the long waiting time, disastrous service

Review: Una rápida y buena atención
traduccion_nueva: Fast and good service

Review: No entiendo como su   no tienen la opción de depositar con número de tarjeta y tengas que hacerlo con el número de cuenta. Pasar a caja, es el servicio más lento que te puedas imaginar. No sean cliente de este banco, al menos que ofrezca un gran producto pero lo dudo
traduccion_nueva: I don't understand how they don't have the option to deposit with a card number and you have to do it with the account number. Checking out is the slowest service you can imagine. Do not be a customer of this bank, unless it offers a great product but I doubt it

Review: Pésimo servicio tanto de ejecutivos y cajeros, en una semana vine 3 veces porque me queda a una cuadra de mi trabajo, pero las 3 veces solo hay un cajero, hay demasiada gente esperando y si preguntas por si hay otro de enojan. Y dicen que no hay más personal. Hoy que vine somos 12 personas esperando. 1 horas casa solo para depositar un cheque.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from both executives and cashiers, in one week I came 3 times because it is one block from my work, but the 3 times there is only one cashier, there are too many people waiting and if you ask in case there is another one, they get angry. And they say there are no more staff. Today when I came there are 12 people waiting. 1 hour home just to deposit a check.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review:
Pésima atención, no vengan si buscan a un ejecutivo. No respetan los turnos, solo buscan vender tarjetas y ganar comisiones.
ESTO NO SUCEDE EN BBVA
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, don't come if you are looking for an executive. They do not respect turns, they only seek to sell cards and earn commissions. THIS DOES NOT HAPPEN AT BBVA

Review: Hice un trámite para una tarjeta que me comentaron que estaba "preaprobada" llevo una semana intentando comunicarme para saber si se aprobó y cuándo podría pasar. Pero el ejecutivo en el teléfono viene en su tarjeta no lo contesta. Mal el servicio...
traduccion_nueva: I made a procedure for a card that they told me was "pre-approved." I have been trying to get in touch for a week to find out if it was approved and when it could happen. But the executive on the phone comes in with his card and does not answer it. Bad service...

Review: Sucursal limpia y ordenada. Excelente atención 🙂 Ofrecen muchas alternativas financieras
traduccion_nueva: Clean and tidy branch. Excellent service 🙂 They offer many financial alternatives

Review: Hace 2 semanas acudi a este banco para abrir una cuenta y todo fue un caos desde el principio la gerente decidio pasarnos con un ejecutivo nuevo en el tipo de cuenta que queria abrir, se me asigno una tarjeta de debito temporal y se hizo un deposito ahi mismo, a los 2 dias recibi una tarjeta personalizada y acudi al banco para preguntar cual de las dos era valida, solo pelaban los ojos hasta hoy ha sido una pedidera de documentos y para corroborrar quise entrar con la tarjeta a mi cuenta y no pude en el cajero, me fui a la caja en persona y resulto que mi dinero esta en una cuenta oculta... Sin mas explicacion aun no puedo hacer uso de mi tarjeta porque siguen pidiendo documentos este banco es ridiculo, super mal servicio y la gerente coincido con anteriores comentarios despota e inepta
traduccion_nueva: 2 weeks ago I went to this bank to open an account and everything was chaos from the beginning, the manager decided to transfer us to a new executive in the type of account I wanted to open, I was assigned a temporary debit card and a deposit was made there Same thing, after 2 days I received a personalized card and I went to the bank to ask which of the two was valid, they just kept their eyes peeled until today it has been a request for documents and to corroborate I wanted to access my account with the card and I couldn't the teller, I went to the cashier in person and it turned out that my money is in a hidden account... Without further explanation I still can't use my card because they keep asking for documents this bank is ridiculous, super bad service and the manager agrees with previous despotic and inept comments

Review: Tarde 30 minutos en espera para que me atendiera un ejecutivo, si me atendió bien el ejecutivo, se quedaron muy atrás con su libreta donde tienes que escribir tu nombre para los turnos, deberían de cambiar la forma de turnos digitales, porque ni revisan los ejecutivos la libreta, muy pequeño el banco todo se escucha si vas a depositar o a retirar no tienes privacidad si vas a caja, solo hay una caja o dos abiertas y si es la hora donde llega más gente se amontonan
traduccion_nueva: It took me 30 minutes waiting for an executive to serve me, if the executive served me well, they were left far behind with their notebook where you have to write your name for the shifts, they should change the form of digital shifts, because the executives don't even check the book, the bank is very small, everything can be heard if you are going to deposit or withdraw you have no privacy if you go to the cash register, there is only one or two cash registers open and if it is the time when more people arrive they pile up

Review:
Si pudiera ponerle 0 estrellas, lo haría
Ni siquiera te ven a la cara, el servicio es horrible, incómodo y huele a baño público
En general todo de HSBC es nefasto
Van 3 veces que me cambian la tarjeta por un cargo no reconocido y me sigue pasando
No contestan los teléfonos ni los mensajes en la aplicación
Si pueden NO HAGAN DE HSBC SU BANCO
traduccion_nueva: If I could give it 0 stars, I would. They don't even look at your face, the service is horrible, uncomfortable and smells like a public bathroom. In general, everything about HSBC is disastrous. They change my card 3 times for an unrecognized charge and it still follows me. passing They do not answer the phones or messages in the application If they can DO NOT MAKE HSBC YOUR BANK

Review: Pésimo servicio, poco personal, nada atento. Tardas horas (literal) si deseas hacer un trámite con un ejecutivo que por cierto solo tienen uno. Y no hay un orden para la atención. Nada recomendable, es increíble que aún existan bancos y sucursales con tan mal servicio, yo de plano cancele mis cuentas con este banco y fui a otro que si me da mucho mejor atención.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, little staff, not attentive at all. It takes hours (literally) if you want to do a procedure with an executive who, by the way, only has one. And there is no order to attention. Not recommended at all, it is incredible that there are still banks and branches with such bad service, I flat out canceled my accounts with this bank and went to another one that does give me much better service.

Review:
Parace que les vas a pedir regalado
Muy mal servicio
Nunca te resuelven nada les molesta que les preguntes
Sobre todo con los ejecutivos
traduccion_nueva: It seems that you are going to ask them for free. Very bad service. They never solve anything, it bothers them that you ask them. Especially with the executives.

Review: Solo tienen una lista para tener el control de los turnos pero parece que es de decoración. mi trámite era "tardado" y decidieron saltarse mi turno. Si aprecian su tiempo hay otro banco a unos metros, yo seguire esperando
traduccion_nueva: They only have one list to control the shifts but it seems to be for decoration. My procedure was "late" and they decided to skip my turn. If you appreciate your time, there is another bank a few meters away, I will continue waiting.

Review: Muy mal servicio por parte de la única ejecutiva ni los buenos días me dio  grosera déspota y desinteresada por el cliente no me explico naa se sentia cortante no me ayudo y lo único que me dieron ganas es de cancelar la tarjeta  estaba en el turno del día jueves 8 de junio 2023 a las  10 am   aprox   atención hay seguirán perdiendo clientes
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service from the only executive, not even a good morning, she was rude, despotic and uninterested in the client, she didn't explain anything, she felt rude, she didn't help me and the only thing that made me want to do was cancel the card, I was on the day shift Thursday, June 8, 2023 at approximately 10 am attention, there will continue to be losing customers

Review: Tardadisimos contraten personal no ching....
traduccion_nueva: Very late to hire staff, no ching....

Review:
Pésimo servicio al cliente, tu tiempo sera eterno al esperar un turno con un ejecutivo.
Háganse un favor y no vengan ✌️
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, your time will be eternal waiting for an appointment with an executive. Do yourself a favor and don't come ✌️

Review: Muy limpio. Todo excelente servicio y buena. La información.
traduccion_nueva: Very clean. All excellent and good service. Information.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Tiene buen servicio.
traduccion_nueva: It has good service.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pésimo servicio, pésima atención. Un solo ejecutivo, dura mas de 1 hora con cada persona. Pésimo banco. No resuelven. No contestan el teléfono. Te cortan las llamadas.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, terrible attention. A single executive lasts more than 1 hour with each person. Bad bank. They don't solve. Nobody is picking up the phone. They cut off your calls.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pésima atención, son descorteses, no brindan la información adecuada ni la asesoría para los trámites, estoy por parte de las ejecutivas de cuenta (mujeres). No se presentan y ni te dan el nombre cuando les preguntas con quien tienes el gusto.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they are rude, they do not provide adequate information or advice for the procedures, I am on the side of the account executives (women). They don't introduce themselves and don't even give you their name when you ask them who you have the pleasure of meeting.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pésima atención no respetan turnos te atienden de mala gana no hay nadie que te ayude se la pasan platicando entre ellos
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they don't respect shifts, they serve you reluctantly, there is no one to help you, they spend all their time talking to each other.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pésimo servicio, no pueden atender si no tienes una cita. Se portan peor que los del IMSS.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they can't attend if you don't have an appointment. They behave worse than those of the IMSS.

Review: Servicio Demasiado lento solo una cajera
traduccion_nueva: Service Too slow only one cashier

Review: No te quieren atender , pésimo servicio tanto el gerente como los demás empleados
traduccion_nueva: They don't want to serve you, terrible service from both the manager and the other employees.

Review: Nomás hacer perder tiempo desde que llega la gente  a la sucursal no te hacen caso y al final te dicen que te atienden otro día y son muy déspotas los ejecutivos no tiene nada de gente y no aún así no te atienden deberían cerrar el banco de toda maneras ni te atienden por eso nadie quiere cuenta con ese banco
traduccion_nueva: Just waste time from the moment people arrive at the branch, they don't listen to you and in the end they tell you that they will serve you another day and they are very despotic. The executives don't have any people and they still don't serve you. They should close the bank altogether. ways they don't even serve you that's why no one wants an account with that bank

Review: 50 minutos de espera para ventanilla PÉSIMO SERVICIO
traduccion_nueva: 50 minute wait for window POOR SERVICE

Review: Atencion y buen servicio!
traduccion_nueva: Attention and good service!

Review: al estar en espera aparece "una ejecutiva"....yo buscaba una cuenta básica, de esas sin comisiones ni saldos mínimos y se atrevió a decirme que la info en la web de HSBC es errónea y que lo más probable es que yo hubiera leído mal 😂😂😂 NEFASTA
traduccion_nueva: When I was on hold, "an executive" appears... I was looking for a basic account, one of those without commissions or minimum balances, and she dared to tell me that the information on the HSBC website is wrong and that it is most likely that I had misread 😂😂😂 NEFASTA

Review: Pesimo servicio! Acudí a realizar mi tramite y me dejaron a medias con la activación, debido a que su terminal no funcionaba (  como si solo tuvieran una sola) sin embargo me percate que el gerente presionaba a la ejecutiva ya que le partirian pastel  por ello la ejecutiva me dejó el tramite a medias sin darme solución pidiéndome que regresara después para terminar con el tramite. Precentandome y me encuentro con la sorpresa de que la ejecutiva está de vacaciones y el gerente no pudo darme solución siendo un grosero !muy poco profesionalismo de su parte
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service! I went to carry out my procedure and they left me halfway through the activation, because their terminal did not work (as if they only had one), however I realized that the manager was pressuring the executive since they would split cake for the executive. He left the procedure halfway without giving me a solution, asking me to return later to finish the procedure. I get worried and I am surprised that the executive is on vacation and the manager could not give me a solution, being rude, very unprofessional on his part.

Review: Pésima atención al cliente  llegas y te dicen que no te pueden atender que porque ya tienen un cliente que está delante de ti  y que te tienes que esperar una hora y media !
traduccion_nueva: Terrible customer service, you arrive and they tell you that they can't serve you because they already have a customer in front of you and that you have to wait an hour and a half!

Review:
Son varias veces que acudo a realizar movimientos que únicamente se realizan en ventanilla y resulta que no hay quien atienda, mejor retiren esta sucursal si no será totalmente funcional.
Nota:(el personal es atento)
traduccion_nueva: There are several times that I go to make movements that are only carried out at the window and it turns out that there is no one to attend, it is better to remove this branch if it will not be fully functional. Note: (the staff is attentive)

Review: De verdad el peor banco de México, si les es posible no saquen ni tarjetas de crédito ni ningún otro servicio de HSBC. Pésima la atención en sucursal, pésima la atención por internet, pésima la atención en línea. Es un banco intratable, la gente te trata como todo menos como cliente/cuentahabiente.
traduccion_nueva: Truly the worst bank in Mexico, if possible, do not take out credit cards or any other HSBC service. The service in the branch is terrible, the online service is terrible, the online service is terrible. It is an intractable bank, people treat you as anything but as a client/account holder.

Review: Una pérdida de tiempo este banco. Tus datos los capturan mal y tienes que ir a perder tu tiempo para que los corrijan. Mínimo 1 hora de fila para que alguien incompetente te atienda y no te resuelva nada después de 3 horas. Te tratan de domiciliar tu nómina aunque tú no quieras pero si no lo haces no te ayudan
traduccion_nueva: This bank is a waste of time. Your data is captured incorrectly and you have to waste your time to get it corrected. Minimum 1 hour in line for someone incompetent to serve you and not solve anything after 3 hours. They try to domiciliate your payroll even if you don't want to, but if you don't do it they don't help you

Review: En una semana van 3 veces que asisto a la sucursal sin contar otras experiencias que he tenido con el banco llevo más de 6 meses con problemas en una cuenta... no es posible que no puedan realizar bien su trabajo y solucionar algo tan simple o tengan flojera de hacerlo, que servicio tan espantoso tiene HSBC en general.
traduccion_nueva: In a week there are 3 times that I go to the branch without counting other experiences that I have had with the bank. I have been having problems with an account for more than 6 months... it is not possible that they cannot do their job well and solve something so simple or Don't be lazy to do it, what a horrible service HSBC has in general.

Review: Pésima atención en la sucursal. No hay nadie para.que te den informes..Los ejecutivos no atienden a nadie y pasan a personas que acaban de llegar aunque tú ya lleves mucho tiempo esperando.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service in the branch. There is no one to give you reports. The executives do not attend to anyone and pass on to people who have just arrived even though you have already been waiting for a long time.

Review: Me gusto buen servicio
traduccion_nueva: I liked good service

Review: Me atendieron muy bien excelente servicio,muy buen banco, cajeras muy amables y con un servicio agradable y muy ameno de verdad lo recomiendo ampliamente,es de las mejores sucursales bancarias que se puede encontrar en toda Guadalajara 👍⭐⭐⭐🌟🌟
traduccion_nueva: They treated me very well, excellent service, very good bank, very friendly tellers and with a pleasant and very pleasant service, I highly recommend it, it is one of the best bank branches that can be found in all of Guadalajara 👍⭐⭐⭐🌟🌟

Review:
Basura de personal, solo reflejan la basura de banco que es HSBC.
