Puro perder tiempo con ineptos como ustedes. Ojalá les pasé lo que en san juan bosco.
traduccion_nueva: Rubbish staff, they only reflect the trash bank that is HSBC. Pure waste of time with inept people like you. I hope I pass on to you what I did in San Juan Bosco.

Review:
Nunca me hicieron válido mi seguro de desempleo para mi hipoteca. Espere durante meses pasando necesidades y sin poder recibir el apoyo por el cual pagué.
Les recomiendo que mejor saquen su hipoteca en otro banco
traduccion_nueva: They never made my unemployment insurance valid for my mortgage. I waited for months in need and without being able to receive the support I paid for. I recommend that you better take out your mortgage at another bank.

Review: Me atendieron muy bien. Si, es largo el tiempo de espera por la cantidad de gente que va a hacer trámites, pero no tengo ninguna queja del trato. La ejecutiva fue muy amable conmigo, realicé varias operaciones las cuales llevaron tiempo pero en cada una resolvieron mis dudas y me aconsejaban que era lo mejor. Mis felicitaciones para Angie que fue quien me atendió, tenía mucho trabajo, en todo el tiempo que estuve ahí no paró de trabajar.
traduccion_nueva: They treated me very well. Yes, the waiting time is long due to the number of people who are going to do the paperwork, but I have no complaints about the treatment. The executive was very kind to me, I carried out several operations which took time but in each one they resolved my doubts and advised me what was best. My congratulations to Angie who was the one who took care of me, she had a lot of work, the entire time I was there she didn't stop working.

Review: En verdad que falta de sentido común para la atención al cliente, no hay ejecutivos en semana santa y los pocos que hay en reunión con la jefa y los clientes esperando.
traduccion_nueva: In truth, there is a lack of common sense for customer service, there are no executives on Easter and the few that are there are in meetings with the boss and the clients are waiting.

Review:
La verdad suena a broma pero fue como si se hubieran esforzado para brindarme un servicio de pena. Iba por una reposición y les comenté a lo que iba así que me pidieron que esperara, hasta este momento supuse que si me iban a dar la reposición  habiéndome dicho que esperara, bueno espere una hora y cuando voy a pasar me dicen que ya no tienen tarjetas y que regrese mañana, habiendo les dicho cada que pasaban a preguntar por qué trámite íbamos que yo solo quería una reposición.
La verdad les pongo 2 estrellas solo porque la sucursal es agradable a la vista y por qué me pude sentar y mínimo no estuve parado.
traduccion_nueva: The truth is that it sounds like a joke but it was as if they had gone out of their way to provide me with a worthwhile service. I was going for a replacement and I told them what I was going for so they asked me to wait, until this moment I assumed that if they were going to give me the replacement having told me to wait, well I waited an hour and when I go to pass they tell me that they no longer have cards and to return tomorrow, having told them every time they stopped by to ask what procedure we were going through that I only wanted a replacement. The truth is that I give them 2 stars only because the branch is pleasant to look at and because I was able to sit down and at least not stand.

Review:
pésimo servicio de los ejecutivos de cuenta, en primer lugar la atencion de la gerente del asco!!! por eso nunca hay gente mejor se van a otra sucursal

Lo reitero 2 años después, sigo pensando que es una pésima sucursal de 8 personas que hay en los cubículos o están platicando entre ellos o desayunando o simplemente en sus celulares aunque haya personas esperando para ser atendidas y ellos no estén trabajando tienes que esperar horas para que al final no te resuelvan nada. Nefasto servicio
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from the account executives, first of all the attention from the disgusting manager!!! That's why there are never better people, they go to another branch. I repeat it 2 years later, I still think that it is a terrible branch with 8 people in the cubicles or they are talking to each other or having breakfast or simply on their cell phones even though there are people waiting to be attended and they are not working you have to wait hours so that in the end they do not solve anything for you. Disastrous service

Review: Pésimo servicio, solo hay dos cajas y cuando por fin llaga el turno , atienden mal , están los cajeros con su carota , ni el saludo contestan .
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, there are only two cash registers and when the turn finally comes, they serve poorly, the cashiers are with their face, they don't even respond to greetings.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: No vayan a esta sucursal, solo dos cajas el servicio pésimo y lento. Consideren una hora para pasar a cajas
traduccion_nueva: Don't go to this branch, only two boxes, terrible and slow service. Consider an hour to go to checkout
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: I went to open a bank account and they said they can’t open bank accounts for foreigners, despite the website saying they can and me having all the correct paperwork. Then they said well maybe they can after I tried asking why. Overall, very unhelpful and unkind staff. I went to a different bank and had no issues.
traduccion_nueva: I went to open a bank account and they said they can't open bank accounts for foreigners, despite the website saying they can and me having all the correct paperwork. Then they said well maybe they can after I tried asking why. Overall, very unhelpful and unkind staff. I went to a different bank and had no issues.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Waste of my 30 mins . No answer even being Premium customer . Please go to other HSBC branch
traduccion_nueva: Waste of my 30 mins. No answer even being Premium customer. Please go to other HSBC branch
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pésimo servicio, los ejecutivos siempre están en junta y nadie puede atenderte. Ponen a una persona para "Asesorar" pero al final no hace nada y tienes que regresar otro día y volver a perder el tiempo
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, the executives are always in meetings and no one can help you. They put a person to "Advise" but in the end he does nothing and you have to come back another day and waste time again

Review:
Pésimo servicio, ejecutivos nefastos, groseros y flojos. Hoy fui hacer un cambio de domicilio y nadie pudo atenderme, la única persona que estaba en su lugar estaba muy ocupado platicando con otra compañera, tuve que buscarle la cara a otro que pasó evadiendo la mirada para seguir de flojo. La respuesta que obtuve de este nefasto fue que lo podía hacer por internet riéndose y que si lo quería hacer ahi se tardaba 5 o 6 días y un rollo de lo que necesitaba, yo ya traía los papeles por qué necesito hacer el cambio. Al ver que si lo quería hacer solo se rio y me dijo que esperara.
Tuve que irme por qué como ya dije nadie me atendía no podía esperar más y al intentarlo por internet la sorpresa de que NO se puede, tengo que regresar a verle la cara a esos personajes que sienten que por que manejan cuentas grandes de dinero AJENO!! ya pueden tratar a los pobres que solo tenemos cuenta de débito mal jajaja.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, disastrous, rude and lazy executives. Today I went to make a change of address and no one could help me, the only person who was in his place was very busy talking to another colleague, I had to look in the face of another who passed by avoiding his gaze to continue being lazy. The answer I got from this disastrous person was that I could do it online, laughing, and that if I wanted to do it there it would take 5 or 6 days and a roll of what I needed, I already brought the papers why I need to make the change. Seeing that I did want to do it, he just laughed and told me to wait. I had to leave because, as I already said, no one attended to me, I couldn't wait any longer and when I tried online, I was surprised that it is NOT possible, I have to go back to see the faces of those characters who feel that because they manage large accounts of OTHERS' money! ! Now they can treat the poor people who only have a bad debit account hahaha.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pésima atención, tenían razón los demás malos comentarios. Pensé que no era para tanto pero si. DOS horas perdidas para nada. Que no hay sistema..... bueno, entonces para abren esa oficina.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, the other bad comments were right. I thought it wasn't that big of a deal but yes. TWO hours wasted for nothing. There is no system... well, then why not open that office.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pesimo servicio, nadie te atiende aunque no alla gente, y nunca contestan el telefono para darle el seguimiento a las cosas
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, no one helps you, even if there are no people there, and they never answer the phone to follow up on things.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review:
Solo éramos dos personas en espera. 1 hora para atendernos. No respetaron el turno de la
Persona que estaba adelante de mi y se fue, dejaron entrar a otros que tenían cita, pero el ejecutivo de la E3 ni siquiera se dignó a preguntar la hora de su cita a las personas entonces solo con decir la palabra tengo cita entraron y valió madre la espera de la hora de nosotros que igual por eso yo aún siendo premier en algún tiempo mejor me fui a BBVA por el pésimo servicio.
traduccion_nueva: We were only two people waiting. 1 hour to serve us. They did not respect the turn of the person who was in front of me and he left, they let in others who had an appointment, but the E3 executive did not even deign to ask people the time of their appointment then just by saying the word I have an appointment and they came in and it was worth waiting for the time for us, maybe that's why even though I was premier at some time, I better went to BBVA because of the terrible service.

Review:
Pésimo servicio gerente y personal de atención a pyme pésimo
Pésimo no desastre total
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, manager and SME support staff, terrible, not a total disaster.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Solo tienen en ventanilla una persona o dos y si esta lleno date la idea de que duraras más de 30 minutos o una hora, no hay nadie en la entrada para que te oriente al trámite que vaz a realizar, el estacionamiento esta muy pequeño, evita estacionarte a lado del banco en la calle de Mexicaltzingo en la cera de enfrente ya que los de vialidad en bicicleta te multan
traduccion_nueva: They only have one or two people at the window and if it is full, think that it will last more than 30 minutes or an hour, there is no one at the entrance to guide you to the procedure you are going to carry out, the parking lot is very small, avoid Park next to the bank on Mexicaltzingo Street on the sidewalk in front since the bicycle traffic police will fine you

Review: Muy mala atención , tardan más de una hora en atenderte los ejecutivos,  no te atienden a pesar de estar desocupados .
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, it takes more than an hour for the executives to serve you, they do not attend to you despite being unoccupied.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Muy buena atención por parte del ejecutivo, fui por apertura de cta y no fue tardado, eso si llegué temprano al rededor de las 9 am por lo que no tuve que esperar a ser atendida. Todo bien.
traduccion_nueva: Very good service from the executive, I went to open the account and it was not late, I did arrive early around 9 am so I did not have to wait to be attended to. All good.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pesima atencion, estuve 1 hora y media, nunca me atendieron y nisiquiera había más que 2 personas inicialmente, metieron a otros 3, literal no hay turnos,  solo los ven y deciden quien atender, personal no capacitado, y gerente selectivo, otras personas también optaron por retirarse, simplemente una perdida de  tiempo, iba por una tarjeta de crédito pero mejor con este banco no
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, I was there for 1 hour and a half, they never attended to me and there were not even more than 2 people initially, they put another 3 in, literally there are no shifts, they only see them and decide who to serve, untrained staff, and selective manager, other people too They chose to withdraw, simply a waste of time, I was going for a credit card but better with this bank not

Review: El peor banco al que he ido, estimado lector, si tienes pensado ir a esta sucursal para cualquier tipo de cuestión piénsalo dos veces, el servicio es una porquería, la atención es ETERNA, solo te hacen dar vueltas y nunca te resuelven nada, si crees que al venir aquí a ti no te sucederá nada de esto estás equivocado, evitate perder tu tiempo en esta sucursal, es de lo peor.
traduccion_nueva: The worst bank I have ever been to, dear reader, if you are thinking of going to this branch for any type of question, think twice, the service is crap, the attention is ETERNAL, they only make you go around and never solve anything, yes You think that by coming here none of this will happen to you, you are wrong, avoid wasting your time in this branch, it is the worst.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Solo atiende un ejecutivo y tarde mucho en que me atendieran, empieza a atender otra ejecutiva y me atendió con muy mala actitud, pésimo servicio, cero empática. No acudan a hsbc y menos a esta sucursal.
traduccion_nueva: Only one executive attends and it took a long time for me to be attended to, another executive begins to attend and she attended to me with a very bad attitude, terrible service, zero empathy. Do not go to hsbc and even less to this branch.

Review: Muy mal servicio abren hasta media hora después
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, they open up to half an hour later
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: No respetan el turno en ventanilla, como tienda de abarrotes es el que vaya llegando. El tiempo de espera es absurdo hasta en ventanillas con 3 personas en sucursal, esperé más de una hora para ser atendida por la única cajera que estaba en turno, pésima atención, cambiaré de banco.
traduccion_nueva: They do not respect the turn at the window, as a grocery store it is whoever arrives. The waiting time is absurd even at windows with 3 people in the branch, I waited more than an hour to be attended to by the only teller who was on duty, terrible service, I will change banks.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Van 3 fines de semana que voy a los cajeros a sacar efectivo y no tienen. Con estos nuevos cajeros como que no tienen la misma capacidad que los de antes. De que sirve que estén muy chidos si no tienen efectivo. Prefiero los de antes. No había problema. Y lo más malo es que los cajeros más cercanos están en plaza del sol o por avenida cruz del sur y isla raza. De los cajeros del banco scotiabank donde se puede sacar también. No hay. La sucursal que  estaba en el mercado de abastos ya no existe. Ya veo que poco a poco nos quieren obligar a pagar con tarjeta.
traduccion_nueva: There have been 3 weekends that I go to the ATMs to withdraw cash and they don't have them. With these new ATMs, they don't have the same capacity as the old ones. What's the point of being very cool if they don't have cash. I prefer the ones from before. There was no problem. And the worst thing is that the closest ATMs are in Plaza del Sol or on Avenida Cruz del Sur and Isla Raza. From the Scotiabank ATMs where you can also withdraw. There is no. The branch that was in the food market no longer exists. I see that little by little they want to force us to pay by card.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Espantosa experiencia, desde la persona que recibe a los clientes que fue increíblemente grosera y mandona hasta la "ejecutiva" Noemi, no recomiendo el servicio ni el banco. Yo solo fuí a aperturar mi cuenta de nómina.
traduccion_nueva: Horrible experience, from the person greeting customers who was incredibly rude and bossy to the "executive" Noemi, I do not recommend the service or the bank. I just went to open my payroll account.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Su sistema de anotarse una hoja esta inútil, nadie maneja esa hoja, ni ficha ni nada, y por falta de personal te atiendne muy lento
traduccion_nueva: Their system of writing down a sheet is useless, no one handles that sheet, no file or anything, and due to lack of staff they serve you very slowly.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Buen servicio buena atención y sobre todo la ayuda de los ejecutivos es muy buena
traduccion_nueva: Good service, good attention and above all, the help of the executives is very good

Review: Esta fuera de servicio
traduccion_nueva: It is out of service

Review: Pésima atención, el tiempo de espera promedio es entre 1 a 2 horas como mínimo. Solo uno o dos ejecutivos para atender la cantidad de personas a la espera.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, the average waiting time is between 1 to 2 hours at least. Only one or two executives to serve the number of people waiting.

Review: Es un banco que no me gusta el servicio. Y cada vez lo compruebo forzosamente tengo que usarlo para el pago el IMSS, hay dos filas una larga con un solo cajero donde atienden a todos los que no tenemos cuenta y una donde atienden a los que tienen cuenta. Sin embargo no hay nadie en esa fila, y la cajera no atiende a los demás. Honestamente jamás tendría cuenta aquí.
traduccion_nueva: It's a bank that I don't like the service. And every time I check it, I have to use the IMSS to pay, there are two lines, one long with a single ATM where they serve all of us who do not have an account and one where they serve those who have an account. However, there is no one in that line, and the cashier does not serve the others. Honestly I would never have an account here.

Review: Pésimo servicio, deberían de capacitar a sus cajeras, no conocen procedimientos de su mismo banco, además se la pasan platicando y una pésima actitud
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they should train their tellers, they do not know the procedures of their own bank, and they spend all their time talking and have a terrible attitude

Review:
Es una sucursal agonizante . Malas instalaciones , poco personal y de ese poco con mala actitud de servicio . No ofrece nada a nuevos clientes . Asistí para abrir una cuenta nueva y no dure ni 10 minutos cuando me retire, no hay nadie que te reciba en puerta o que te de informes siquiera , no tienen aire acondicionado lo que hace insoportable la estáncia por más de 30 minutos .
El control de turnos qué tienen es absurdo ya qué tu te debes apuntar en una libreta y ya esta, no te dan ni una noción de tiempo para ser atendido . Solo sentarte y esperar . Para ser mi primera impresión del servio de HSBC como nuevo cliente ya fue pésima.
traduccion_nueva: It is a dying branch. Bad facilities, few staff and a poor service attitude. It does not offer anything to new clients. I went to open a new account and it didn't even last 10 minutes when I left, there is no one to greet you at the door or even give you information, they don't have air conditioning which makes the stay for more than 30 minutes unbearable. The shift control they have is absurd since you have to write it down in a notebook and that's it, they don't give you even a notion of time to be attended to. Just sit and wait. For my first impression of HSBC's service as a new customer, it was already terrible.

Review:
Le daría 0 estrellas pero no se puede, pésima atención.
Fui a una apertura de nomina, pedí información, me hicieron anotarme en su hoja de registro y me dejaron en espera 2 horas y media! para que cuando me pasarán me dijeran que no me podían atender porque ese trámite solo lo hacen por las mañanas.
Toda la gente en la sucursal que estaba esperando quedaron igual de sorprendidos que yo porque hubo 0 empatía ni ganas de apoyarme con el trámite
traduccion_nueva: I would give it 0 stars but you can't, terrible attention. I went to a payroll opening, I asked for information, they made me sign up on their registration form and they left me waiting for 2 and a half hours! so that when they passed me they would tell me that they could not assist me because they only do this procedure in the mornings. All the people in the branch who were waiting were just as surprised as I was because there was zero empathy or desire to support me with the procedure.

Review: Muy mal servicio en esa sucursal los tiempos de espera son de hasta 3 horas, además de que el personal te trata muy mal. Cómo para cambiarse de banco
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service in that branch, waiting times are up to 3 hours, in addition to the fact that the staff treats you very badly. How to change banks

Review:
Tenían razón las opiniones y no hice caso.
Pésima atención del personal en caja, déspota, no explican razones y muchos menos dan soluciones.
Fui en muletas, en fila de clientes y aún así la cajera pasó a otras personas antes que a mí, cero empatía
traduccion_nueva: The opinions were right and I didn't pay attention. Terrible attention from the cashier staff, despotic, they do not explain reasons and much less give solutions. I went on crutches, in a line of customers and still the cashier passed other people before me, zero empathy

Review: No suele estar muy lleno pero difícil acceder en transporte público
traduccion_nueva: It is not usually very crowded but difficult to access by public transport

Review: Los ejecutivos son muy groseros, no dan atención, te hacen perder tiempo. Si tienen opción, mejor acudan a otra sucursal.
traduccion_nueva: The executives are very rude, they don't pay attention, they waste your time. If you have a choice, better go to another branch.

Review: Pesima atención,  nunca hay sistema o tarjetas y los ejecutivos son groseros y no resuelven tus dudas. Además exigen cita para abrir cuenta.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, there is never a system or cards and the executives are rude and do not answer your questions. They also require an appointment to open an account.

Review: No habrán cuenta en este banco,.su aplicación apesta, solo me sirvió para hacer una sola transferencia y ya no sirvió, además usan tus datos personales para avisarte, te pueden hablar hasta 3 veces al día diario!!! Para ofrecerte un préstamo, y aunque bloquees el número te marcan de otros es una historia sin fin, solo habri cuenta por la nómina de mi empresa, pero me arrepiento tanto, hare portabilidad a mi otro banco por qué en el otro no te acosan, no usan tus datos hay más cajeros disponibles y su app si sirve y es muy Segura, no lo recomiendo para nada
traduccion_nueva: There will be no account in this bank, their application sucks, it only served me to make a single transfer and it no longer worked, they also use your personal information to notify you, they can talk to you up to 3 times a day!!! To offer you a loan, and even if you block the number they call you from others, it is a never-ending story, I will only have an account for my company's payroll, but I regret it so much, I will make portability to my other bank because they don't harass you in the other one, They do not use your data, there are more ATMs available and their app does work and is very Secure, I do not recommend it at all

Review: Pésimo la atención por parte del personal de HSBC lo dejan a uno esperando y nada que resuelven
traduccion_nueva: Terrible attention from the HSBC staff, they leave you waiting and nothing is resolved

Review: El peor banco no había personal que atendiera a la clientela todos platicando uno se tenía que dar su turno anotándose y adivinando para que cuando atiendan te digan que para sacar una tarjeta es con cita incluso dándole preferencia a una muchacha con el mismo problema que yo a ella si la atendieron pésimos trabajadores
traduccion_nueva: The worst bank had no staff to serve the clientele, everyone talking, you had to take your turn signing up and guessing so that when they answer they tell you that to get a card you have to make an appointment, even giving preference to a girl with the same problem as me. She was treated by terrible workers

Review:
Que manera de hacerse pendej05...
8 personas en la sucursal, 3 ejecutivos, 3 cajeros, un gerente y alguien que parece estar de host....
Solo una caja abierta, y lenta parece fila para la reta de maquinitas y de los ejecutivos ni se diga, a puro dar vueltas, una copia, una pluma, un vaso de agua, otra copia, chismecito en el cuartito, en fin puro vobrar sueldo y valer cabeza...
traduccion_nueva: What a way to be stupid... 8 people in the branch, 3 executives, 3 cashiers, a manager and someone who seems to be hosting.... Only one open cash register, and a slow one seems to be in line for the challenge of machines and the executives, not to mention, just going around, a copy, a pen, a glass of water, another copy, gossip in the little room, in short, just earning a salary and worth a head...

Review: Ineficientes pésimo servicio
traduccion_nueva: Inefficient terrible service

Review: Horrible atención de esta cadena de bancos y en esta sucursal lo peor de lo peor, te citan a una hora y no respetan tu cita, te atienden cuando quieren y de mala gana.
traduccion_nueva: Horrible service from this chain of banks and in this branch the worst of the worst, they make an appointment at an hour and do not respect your appointment, they serve you whenever they want and reluctantly.

Review: Pésimo servicio y el personal muy lento hacen esperar más de una hora y hay unos que llegan y los pasan primero !!!
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service and very slow staff, they make you wait more than an hour and there are some who arrive and pass them first!!!

Review: Pésimo servicio no dan solución a nada y solo te hacen perder el tiempo
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, they don't solve anything and only waste your time.

Review: El personal como siempre muy amable
traduccion_nueva: The staff as always very friendly

Review: Pésimo servicio de los ejecutivos, te hacen esperar demasiado, no solucionan nada y una banca móvil que no sirve de nada, 4 horas para poder hacer una transferencia, si pueden no tengan cuenta en este banco
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from the executives, they make you wait too long, they don't solve anything and a mobile bank that is of no use, 4 hours to be able to make a transfer, if they can, they don't have an account at this bank

Review: Pésimo banco, con pésimo servicio, personal pararece que están en el parque, gerente de sucursal con la de limpieza empiernada  en la entrada  de sucursal más de dos horas para una apertura de cuenta
traduccion_nueva: Terrible bank, with terrible service, staff seem to be in the park, branch manager with the cleaning lady stuck at the branch entrance more than two hours to open an account

Review: Pésimo servicio, siempre hay algo que no funciona, siempre les falla el sistema siempre hay excusas. Lamentablemente así es este banco. No lo recomiendo ni de lejos.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, there is always something that doesn't work, the system always fails, there are always excuses. Unfortunately that's how this bank is. I don't recommend it even remotely.

Review: Si pudiera le pondría cero estrellas, el tiempo de espera es increíblemente tardado de 2 a 2:30 o más! No resuelven las dudas ni ayudan en lo que se requiere, sin duda alguna de las peores experiencias que he tenido en cuanto atención al cliente
traduccion_nueva: If I could I would give it zero stars, the wait time is incredibly long from 2 to 2:30 or more! They do not resolve doubts or help with what is required, without a doubt one of the worst experiences I have had in terms of customer service.

Review: Muy amables los asesores hacen todo a medida de sus recursos
traduccion_nueva: Very friendly advisors, they do everything according to their resources.

Review: No tuve inconveniente con la atención de los ejecutivos. El único problema es que esperé más de media hora para ser atendido con respecto a mi cuenta de HSBC que fue cerrada sin previo aviso o motivo para que al final me dijeran que solo un gerente podía ayudarme y no tienen a uno trabajando en este lugar actualmente. Al parecer, lo habían liquidado al anterior. Deberían de poner un aviso en la entrada que si es algo que tiene que ver un gerente, que ni se moleste la gente en ir para perder el tiempo.
traduccion_nueva: I had no problem with the attention of the executives. The only problem is that I waited over half an hour to be assisted regarding my HSBC account which was closed without notice or reason only to be told in the end that only one manager could help me and they do not have one working at this location currently . Apparently, they had liquidated the previous one. They should put a notice at the entrance that if it is something that a manager has to see, people should not even bother going there to waste their time.

Review: No vale madre el servicio la señora que está muy bn atiende bien pero el asesor de pelo largo y barba a puro perder tiempo no hace las cosas bien y no sabe hacer nada una pérdida de tiempo
traduccion_nueva: The service is not worth it, the lady who is very good serves well but the advisor with long hair and a beard just wastes time and does not do things well and does not know how to do anything, a waste of time.

Review: Asco de servicio ,si tienes algún inconveniente ve dispuesto a pasar al menos 2 horas ahí y lo más probable es que no te resuelvan
traduccion_nueva: Disgusting service, if you have any problem, be prepared to spend at least 2 hours there and most likely they will not solve it

Review:
Es un fraude las operaciones en cuanto a servicio .
Casi una hora esperando para asuntos menores .
Las trabajadoras son como su Ego Grande panzonas y feas
traduccion_nueva: The operations in terms of service are a fraud. Almost an hour waiting for minor matters. The workers are like their Big Ego, paunchy and ugly.

Review: Aquí dice que abren en Sábado y no es cierto, está cerrado los sábados. Deberían tener su información actualizada para no hacer perder el tiempo a sus clientes, pero evidentemente les importa muy poco.
traduccion_nueva: It says here that they open on Saturday and it is not true, it is closed on Saturdays. They should have their information up to date so as not to waste their clients' time, but they evidently care very little.

Review: Muy mal servicio, es muy tardado el servicio de ejecutivo, de 4 q hay solo uno atiende, he acudido a otras y son muy rápidos y amables
traduccion_nueva: Very bad service, the executive service is very slow, out of 4 there is only one who attends, I have gone to others and they are very fast and friendly

Review: No abren los sabados. Corrijan su horario no hagan perder el tiempo
traduccion_nueva: They don't open on Saturdays. Correct your schedule, don't waste time

Review: Cerrado en horario de trabajo
traduccion_nueva: Closed during business hours

Review:
Esta Sucursal tiene un horario de 8:30 a 16:30 aunque es importante considerar dos cosas: en ventanilla empiezan a atender después de las 8:40 en lo que preparan su caja.
Casi todos vamos a pago de derechos para el pasaporte mexicano y no es posible pagar directamente hay que ir primero con ejecutivos que también empiezan a atender tarde y normalmente están muy ocupados.
Por otro lado la atención del personal muy bien
traduccion_nueva: This Branch has hours from 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., although it is important to consider two things: at the window they start serving after 8:40 a.m. while they prepare your box. Almost all of us go to pay the fees for the Mexican passport and it is not possible to pay directly, you have to go first with executives who also start working late and are normally very busy. On the other hand, the staff's attention is very good.

Review: Pésimo servicio de HSBC Plaza Patria y en General, quise aperturar una cuenta Premier llegué a las 9:00 que abren y tardaron 40 minutos en atenerme, solo tienen tres ejecutivos de los cuales solo uno estaba atendiendo, parece que no le dan valor a sus clientes por mas alto perfil que tengan. Tienen productos increíbles pero la atención al cliente deja mucho que desear.
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service from HSBC Plaza Patria and in general, I wanted to open a Premier account, I arrived at 9:00 when they opened and it took them 40 minutes to serve me, they only have three executives of which only one was attending, it seems that they do not give value to their clients no matter how high profile they have. They have amazing products but the customer service leaves a lot to be desired.

Review: Pésimo servicio y sobre todo la persona que pasa a los clientes hoy viernes por la tarde muy grosero y prepotente …..uno chaparrito y barbón hiba a abrir una cuenta y fue muy grosero ….. me perdieron me voy a otro banco
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service and especially the person who passes the clients today, Friday afternoon, very rude and arrogant…..a short and bearded man was about to open an account and was very rude…..they lost me, I'm going to another bank

Review: Pésima atención por parte del personal, no te avisan que tienes que apuntarte en una bitácora para ser atendido por un ejecutivo, de qué sirve su máquina en la recepción que te pregunta qué tipo de movimiento se va a realizar, si al final de cuentas es por un cuaderno que tienes que apuntarte para ser atendido por el personal, deben de poner una cartulina, un rótulo, alguien en puerta que avise, la gente no es adivina 🤦🏻‍♂️
traduccion_nueva: Terrible attention from the staff, they don't tell you that you have to sign up in a logbook to be attended to by an executive, what good is their machine at the reception that asks you what type of movement is going to be carried out, if at the end of the day it is For a notebook that you have to sign up to be attended to by the staff, they must put a cardboard, a sign, someone at the door to warn, people are not fortune tellers 🤦🏻‍♂️

Review: Si pudiera dar una opinion negativa lo haría. Te hacen perder el tiempo, definitivamente de los peores servicios de una sucursal que he experimentado.
traduccion_nueva: If I could give a negative opinion I would. They waste your time, definitely one of the worst branch services I have ever experienced.

Review: Mala atención, tardan años en atenderte los ejecutivos. El señor de la entrada con una mala cara y no sabe dar indicaciones. Es mejor si evitas esta sucursal. 1 estrella es mucho.
traduccion_nueva: Bad service, it takes years for the executives to serve you. The man at the entrance has a bad face and doesn't know how to give directions. It is better if you avoid this branch. 1 star is a lot.

Review: Excelente atención desde el momento en que llegué, fue todo muy rápido y en especial la atención de la ejecutiva Verónica Zárate
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service from the moment I arrived, everything was very fast and especially the attention of the executive Verónica Zárate

Review: PESIMO SERVICIO. NO TIENEN PERSONAL SUFICIENTE. TE ATIENDEN CON DESPRECIO. MI PEOR EXPERIENCIA EN UN BANCO
traduccion_nueva: TERRIBLE SERVICE. THEY DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH STAFF. THEY ATTEND YOU WITH CONTEMPT. MY WORST EXPERIENCE IN A BANK

Review: Pésimo servicio ni el gerente ni las ejecutivas del lugar atienden ni siquiera quieren responder cuando uno les habla
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, neither the manager nor the executives of the place answer, nor do they even want to respond when you speak to them.

Review: Muy buena atención en mi visita nos atendieron súper bien y el gerente Dorian rosales dispuesto a apoyar y a resolver dudas
traduccion_nueva: Very good service during my visit, they treated us very well and the manager Dorian Rosales was willing to support and answer questions.

Review: En general la atención de este banco es mala, pero en esta sucursal, parece burla.
traduccion_nueva: In general, the service at this bank is bad, but in this branch, it seems like a joke.

Review: Muy saturado y algo lento el servicio
traduccion_nueva: Very busy and somewhat slow service

Review: excelente servicio el gerente muy amable y puntual con sus asesorias
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service, the manager is very friendly and punctual with his advice.

Review:
Es una perdida de tiempo ir ahí.
Ningún ejecutivo te puede atender y si lo hacen, tardan mucho por persona.
traduccion_nueva: It's a waste of time to go there. No executive can assist you and if they do, it takes a long time per person.

Review: No está abierto los sábados corrijan su horario y no hagan perder el tiempo
traduccion_nueva: It is not open on Saturdays, correct your hours and don't waste your time

Review: El conjunto de personal que labora en esa sucursal son unos ineptos, les molesta en demasía laborar los sábados; desde el pasado 24  de febrero el “asesor” en la recepción solo desea ir sacando gente de la sucursal pidió que le diera seguimiento a mi solicitud vía telefónica y resulta que se necesita validar datos biométricos en sucursal. Hoy 2 de marzo el personal de la sucursal comenta que no tienen hora de apertura por cuestiones de mantenimiento, si les molesta trabajar los sábados que modifiquen sus horarios de atención PÉSIMO SERVICIO Y PÉSIMO BANCO
traduccion_nueva: The group of staff that works in that branch are inept, it bothers them too much to work on Saturdays; Since last February 24, the “advisor” at the reception only wants to get people out of the branch and asked me to follow up on my request by phone and it turns out that biometric data needs to be validated in the branch. Today, March 2, the branch staff comments that they do not have opening hours due to maintenance issues, if it bothers them to work on Saturdays, they should modify their opening hours. TERRIBLE SERVICE AND TERRIBLE BANK

Review: Pésimo servicio me atendió Araceli y me trato muy sangrona no me quizo abrir la cuenta nomina disque por un papel (mentira) para trabajar y me atraso el tramite 1 quincena para iniciar a trabajar fui a otra sucursal y sin problema me atendieron con los mismos documentos
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, Araceli treated me and she treated me very bloody. She didn't want to open my payroll account, so I called for a piece of paper (a lie) to work and the process was delayed for 1 fortnight to start working. I went to another branch and without any problem they helped me with the same documents.

Review: La espera fue súper larga! Hay 2 ejecutivos solamente a 1 sin hacer nada. No pierdan su tiempo ahí.
traduccion_nueva: The wait was super long! There are 2 executives only 1 doing nothing. Don't waste your time there.

Review: No se merece ni siquiera una estrella mala atención salí llorando 😭 del coraje por su mala eficiencia
traduccion_nueva: It doesn't deserve even one star, bad attention, I left crying 😭 out of anger for its poor efficiency

Review: Es un asco de personal, déspotas a más no poder, horrible atención! Si pueden ir a otra sucursal ahórrense el disgusto.
traduccion_nueva: The staff is disgusting, despotic as hell, horrible service! If you can go to another branch, save yourself the trouble.

Review: Excelente servicio muy atentas las ejecutivas y las cajeras amables, empáticas y saben lo que hacen , las felicito no en todas las sucursales te encuentras a personas así .
traduccion_nueva: Excellent service, very attentive executives and cashiers, kind, empathetic and know what they are doing, I congratulate them, not in all branches you find people like that.

Review: Pésimo servicio tardados y no respetan tu turno los ejecutivos
traduccion_nueva: Terrible service, late and the executives do not respect your turn

Review: Tienen un pésimo servicio al cliente, desde la señorita que está en la entrada con una cara de 0 ganas de trabajar hasta los ejecutivos que tiene muy mal trato con sus clientes inventando mil requisitos para abrir una simple cuenta, al final después de hacerme esperar más de 1 hora, decidí irme a otro lugar donde únicamente tarde 30 minutos. NO recomendaría para nada este lugar es HORRIBLE

Review:
20 minutos esperando en la fila de ventanillas y era la única persona!
Sus ejecutivos ocupados sentados adentro, teléfonos sonando todo el tiempo y nadie contestaba. Un agente llegó a la ventanilla donde sólo había un ejecutivo atendiendo (teniendo 5 ventanillas) y le pidió una tarjeta pra el intendente. Donde de volada llenaron formulario y se la entregaron. Leí malas reseñas de esta sucursal, más no pensé que fuera cierto, pésimo servicio, pésima atención, pésimo personal, sólo fui porque me hicieron un pago a través de uno de sus servicios, mi primer experiencia con este banco y espero sea la última!
traduccion_nueva: 20 minutes waiting in line at the windows and I was the only person! Their busy executives sitting inside, phones ringing all the time and no one answering. An agent arrived at the window where there was only one executive serving (having 5 windows) and asked for a card for the mayor. Where they immediately filled out the form and gave it to them. I read bad reviews about this branch, but I didn't think it was true, terrible service, terrible attention, terrible staff, I only went because they made a payment to me through one of their services, my first experience with this bank and I hope it will be the last!

Review: Es increíble que no haya nadie en recepción para orientarte. Pasan los empleados, te ven,  y no tienen la cortesía de preguntarte qué trámite vas hacer. Yo sólo iba a recoger una TC, pero al ver la pésima atención, rápido salí de ahí, y me quedé con banamex. Resulta que te hacen registrarte en una hoja, si, en una simple hoja y con pluma, en pleno auge de la tecnología, no quiero imaginar su app. Desconozco si todas las sucursales se manejan así, pero esa definitivamente es de alarmarse. Perdieron un cliente potencial, y todo por algo tan básico como es la atención al cliente.
traduccion_nueva: It is incredible that there is no one at reception to guide you. The employees pass by, they see you, and they don't have the courtesy to ask you what procedure you are going to do. I was only going to pick up a CT, but seeing the terrible service, I quickly got out of there, and stayed with Banamex. It turns out that they make you register on a sheet of paper, yes, on a simple sheet of paper and with a pen, in the midst of the technology boom, I don't want to imagine their app. I don't know if all branches are managed like this, but that is definitely something to be alarmed about. They lost a potential client, and all because of something as basic as customer service.

Review:
Arrival – Upon arriving in Cancun, Mexico, I was surprised to find that the immigration line was long, even for US passport holders. This was unusual, as in my experience arriving at LAX International in California from Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, the customs line usually moves very quickly. If it’s your first time and you booked a private/shared ride please do not stop at the rep at the beginning of the exit. They will take all your information and try to talk you into timeshares etc…Instead, keep walking till you get to the bus area. Look for the transportation company.. our was Amstar.
Departure - Our flight was scheduled for 12:15 pm with boarding at 11:35 am. We arranged a private ride through Amstar from our hotel at 9:20 am and arrived at Cancun airport with no traffic at 9:45 am. We quickly checked in using a kiosk and proceeded to the security checkpoint.
Unfortunately, they did not allow any liquids, not even ice. After going through security, we walked duty-free, but the prices didn't offer much, except for tax. I wanted to buy the Tom Ford Cherry perfume, which was priced at $250, but the same one at the duty-free store was $395, which wasn't a good price.
Initially, our gate was 67D, which was nice and cool. However, there was a gate change to 60 which was located upstairs, it was quite warm around that terminal. Like all airports, everything was quite expensive, not American prices but clearly tourist prices. For example, a burger and fries cost $20.
While I was at the convenience store waiting to buy water, I watched a girl get charged $20 for Hot Cheetos and Evian water, which seemed quite expensive, lol. Anyways, the airport was sufficient and offered a good selection of souvenir shops

If it's your first time and you booked a private/shared ride please do not stop at the rep at the beginning of the exit. They will take all your information and try to talk you into timeshares etc…Instead, keep walking until you get to the bus area. Look for the transportation company.. our was Amstar. Anyways, the airport was sufficient and offered a good selection of souvenir shops

Review:
This is an extremely busy airport that is literally bursting at the seams. When we landed in Cancun, the exit processing was fairly quick and efficient. Our luggage was there at the carousel almost at the same time we reached. In less than 10 minutes after we disembarked we were set to exit.

That’s when the fun began!

The airport is literally teeming with all kinds of people looking to “help” you. Most of them are cab drivers though there were also several tourist guides, hotel representatives, currency exchangers and many that we could not figure out. They are fairly aggressive and will pursue you relentlessly to get your attention. Since we do not know Spanish we could not understand most the stuff they were trying to sell, but their demeanor was quite intimidating.

We had arranged for a ride to pick us up (highly recommended), but there was confusion in terms of the pick up point. The driver had helpfully sent us a picture of where he was parked outside but that was of little help to us. We tried showing the picture to a few people in the airports but they tried steering us towards their contacts. Finally we sent the driver a picture of where we were waiting and he came by to pick us up. Later we realized why he was being so cautious. While Cancun allows for Uber, the airport taxi drivers have been known to physically attack them. This is why they act so surreptitiously.

Our departure from the airport was a lot smoother. The same Uber driver dropped us at the airport (he made us pay ahead of time to avoid any confusion at the airport). We were flying United and they had setup several self check in kiosks. We were able to complete the check-in and security clearance fairly quickly.

The departure area was literally overflowing with people. There are serval restaurants in the food court but all eating tables were occupied. We had to wait more than 30 minutes to order coffee at the Starbucks.

I hear they are opening a new airport in Tulúm and hopefully that will take away some of the crowds from here. I also hope that they implement some system to control the aggressive solicitation for incoming passengers.

Review:
I read a lot of reviews before coming here, and I was quite skeptical.
I’ve traveled a lot internationally and live in the states. My husband and I came here on a busy Saturday afternoon, expecting chaos.

Before the doors of our taxi closed, there was an airport worker by our side ready to usher us in to our line. He grabbed our bags and lead the way. This was an unexpected and pleasant surprise! We got to the front of the line in a matter of minutes and past security just as quickly! We also did not need to take our shoes off and no workers were yelling directions or treating people rudely, the way they do in the states. What a wonderful change of pace!

People were friendly, polite, professional, and efficient. The airport was also clean, and workers were keeping it maintained from the food court to the bathroom.

The only negative about coming here is the prices are high for Mexico, but this is a fancier part of Mexico so it’s the norm for the entire area.

I will happily fly into this airport anytime!

We also did not need to take our shoes off and no workers were yelling directions or treating people rudely, the way they do in the states. What a wonderful change of peace! The only negative about coming here is the prices are high for Mexico, but this is a fancier part of Mexico so it's the norm for the entire area. I will happily fly into this airport anytime!

Review:
5/20/24 This update went from 3 stars to only 1.
In reference to my previous travel experiences, I have decided to discontinue my travels to Mexico due to safety concerns. The practice of randomly selecting and inspecting carry-on luggage prior to boarding the aircraft raises doubts about the overall security measures in place. This lack of trust in the scanning process and the personnel responsible for operating the X-ray scanners compromises my sense of safety. A similar incident occurred at Queen Alia Airport in Jordan, which prompted me to cease all travel to and from that airport. I would like to provide an overview of what to expect upon arrival at Cancun International Airport. Passengers should be prepared for extensive walking distances between terminals and potentially long queues at immigration. However, if you possess a new passport equipped with a chip, you may utilize the self-service kiosks to expedite the process. After clearing immigration, you will proceed through customs, where you will have the option to self-declare that you are not carrying cigarettes or alcohol (left side) or declare otherwise (right side).As a helpful tip, it is recommended to pay the VISI Tax online prior to your arrival at the airport to save time. Additionally, please note that all transportation companies are not permitted inside the airport and will be waiting outside
I hope this information proves beneficial for your upcoming travels.

However, if you possess a new passport equipped with a chip, you may use the self-service kiosks to expedite the process. After clearing immigration, you will proceed through customs, where you will have the option to self-declare that you are not carrying cigarettes or alcohol (left side) or declare otherwise (right side).As a helpful tip, it is recommended to pay the VISI Tax online prior to your arrival at the airport to save time. Additionally, please note that all transportation companies are not permitted inside the airport and will be waiting outside I hope this information proves beneficial for your upcoming travels.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: I have never been to a more expensive airport than this one. A sandwich can cost about 270 pesos and more. Also, there is no water fountain and the cheapest bottled water is 100 pesos.
traduccion_nueva: I have never been to a more expensive airport than this one. A sandwich can cost about 270 pesos and more. Also, there is no water fountain and the cheapest bottled water is 100 pesos.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review:
We were flying sunwing priority plus, which was well worth it as there was no lineup for the Priority Plus check-in. Ignore the porters who want to take your bags for you, its not too far to go, and all they want is a big tip for carrying them 50ft.
BEWARE: Make sure you lock your check-in bags as my wife's was not locked, and someone went thru it and stole her jewelry!!! - take your jewelry in your carry-on.
Getting through security was quite quick, and they were telling everyone to leave their shoes on, which made it even quicker.
Once inside, we discovered the duty free was really no cheaper than buying at a store on or close to the resort.
There were quite a few places to eat but of course, like many airports, it was quite expensive, i.e., $18 CAD for a sandwich. To board our plane, we had to go outside and get on a bus which drove us to the plane. To make matters worse, it started raining pretty hard. So you're boarding a plane outside in the pouring rain.
But, still not as bad as the Toronto Airport!

To board our plane, we had to go outside and get on a bus which drove us to the plane. To make matters worse, it started raining pretty hard. So you're boarding a plane outside in the pouring rain. But, still not as bad as the Toronto Airport!
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review:
Great little airport. Friendly staff that ensured a smooth check-in process. The line moved quickly as the airline was well staffed.
Security was quick and friendly. No issues.
Duty free had plenty of options - however, the price of liquor seemed expensive, know your prices. The only liquor worth purchasing is tequila not available back home.
Plenty of restaurants and food options. Many souvenir shops that offer a variety of goods. I found the prices in the gift shops were cheaper than those in our hotel shops.

Review:
Cancun Airport offers a unique blend of convenience and charm. While not sprawling in size, its relatively compact layout contributes to a seamless travel experience. Navigating through the airport is a breeze, with well-marked signs and helpful staff ensuring a smooth journey for passengers. The airport strikes a balance by providing essential facilities without overwhelming travelers with an excessive expanse.

Inside, Cancun Airport is adorned with an array of boutiques and restaurants, enhancing the overall travel experience. From duty-free shops offering local crafts to global brands, there's something for every shopper. The selection of restaurants caters to diverse tastes, allowing passengers to savor both local cuisine and international flavors. This culinary variety adds a touch of culinary exploration to the travel experience, making layovers or waiting times more enjoyable.

Moreover, the airport's design and ambiance reflect the vibrant spirit of Cancun itself. Bright and lively, it encapsulates the essence of the destination, offering a warm welcome or a fond farewell to visitors. The strategic layout, combined with the availability of amenities, transforms Cancun Airport into more than just a transit point—it becomes an introduction to the cultural richness and hospitality that awaits travelers in Cancun and the surrounding areas. In essence, Cancun Airport stands as a testament to the region's commitment to providing a pleasant and memorable journey for all.

Review:
Wow. The delta check in was staffed to the hilt!  Got through security in record time on a Wednesday. Yes, we were there during a slower, post spring break time (early May) but that is definitely the time to vacation without crowds at every turn.

Showing our passports 5 times along our journey to the jet way was a little annoying but easily forgiven.

Everything was smooth and relaxed. But I’ve decided that I’m going to sell water in the airport in my next live because someone is getting rich doing that!

Review:
Very long lines. Rude customer service. When entering they threw my daughter’s sandwich, following some illogical rules. It’s fine if they have rules for not allowing food to enter but it makes no sense that they would not allow her to eat it. Then, these custom control ladies tore apart our suitcases for no good reason, misplacing a couple valuable items. It made for a very unpleasant arrival experience.
Upon departure, there were a lot of food choices but everything was extremely overpriced. More expensive than any other airport I’ve flown through. And finally, the restrooms were in a dismal condition… haven’t seen such dirty public restrooms.

Review: The resort it self did not meet our expectations. From the very beginning we had issues. After check-in we went to our assigned rooms only to find that people were already in the room that was given to us. The front desk did not believe us, so they had to send the the bellman to confirm, after confirming it took about another hour to get the room situation under control. Their advertising is also a bit deceiving. Their website promotes beautiful beaches that are not theirs, they are beaches that belong to a neighboring resort which their guest don't have access to. The resort felt really enclosed and trapped unable to go out and explore outside the resort. The prices for the parks, I thought were a bit outrageous, a park hopper at Disneyland would have been more affordable. The best part or highlight is traveling to Isla Mujeres, beautiful catamaran to and from the Island, and the Island in general is gorgeous. Definitely a learning experience and will do our homework before choosing our next trip.

Review:
Got the worst delta interviewer/security lady by terminal 3 gate C7 today around 11am-12pm, 5/23 Tuesday for my flight to New York. She was so rude and difficult to talk to.

When we were told to get some stickers for the back of our passport, she grilled me with questions that was a bit surprising, like how many people’s in my family and was there kids and how old are they, these are very basic and simple questions but what shocked me more was her attitude and tone, we’re all here for vacation and just heading home but being treated like we’re criminals? That felt really odd and my first unpleasant interaction with her.

When they started calling for boarding and people were lining up, she kept telling folks in the front to go to the side and wait by the seats (nice way of saying get out of her way) since they’re not priority. We were all still following instructions and waiting for our turn to board and she kept telling the group in front of me, “you’re last, go to the back and wait on the side” in a very condescending tone. Totally unnecessary, she could have politely directed folks to space out a bit if needed.

The other line to the left had a guy who was so much nicer and people went through without a problem, I think at some point because she was so mean, everyone moved to the other side to go in. I mean if you hate your job so much, don’t make it miserable for other people… it was so unpleasant to have to talk or interact with her.

I felt disrespected and this was probably one the worst boarding / check in process ever. Totally didn’t need that attitude from her for me or my group or anyone nearby trying to get on the plane. I traveled a lot and usually airport staff treats customers politely, so I was still processing the experience when it happened.

I like flying with delta but this experience was awful :( maybe they just have mean security in Cancun?

Everyone else was nice though except her. Almost making me want to put delta to the bottom of the list of airlines I want to fly with going forward… I seriously hope she gets better customer service training.

Thinking back, I wish I wrote down her name so I could report the feedback to delta, it was not the right way to treat customers. She was probably the meanest person we met in Cancun on this entire trip.

Bye bye Mexico!

Review:
Arrival:

The airport is modern, clean and we had a positive experience with all staff we interacted with. The washrooms were clean, lining up at customs was orderly but that's all the positives we experienced with regards to arrivals. Once we were thru customs and arrived at the luggage carousel, we were told the luggage wouldn't arrive for another 45 minutes. Soon the area became filled with hundreds of people and there is no seating so everyone began to stand around watching the luggage carousel like they were waiting for Rock stars to pop out. It was more than an hour before the first suitcase rolled by, and there were big gaps where no new luggage showed up. In total, we waited almost 2 hours from exiting customs until we recovered all of our checked baggage. We also had to wait another hour on the shuttle bus to our resort as we waited for everyone else to finish collecting their luggage. Thankfully, the rest of our vacation was amazing!

Departure:

Nothing out of the ordinary, it was like any other North American airport. Staff helped at check in, check luggage, airport security was orderly and everyone was nice. Food in this airport is more expensive than others but there were a lot of choices.

Overall, if the baggage didn't take as long as it did, I would rate this airport with 5 stars, but that extra 3 hours of waiting killed off 3 stars for me.

Review:
Horrible experience!
When you arrive at the airport and want to leave the premises, you will be guided to the exit. there are two different exits. one for “family and friends” and one for tourists. (Photo attached) But as a tourist you can't just use the exit for „family and friends“ because it's cordoned off and someone is standing in front of it so you can't get through. As a tourist you have to take the other exit, which leads to a large fenced parking lot. There are several taxi companies here that will force you to take a ride for outrageous prices. We paid 85 usD for a 10 min ride ( in comparison Uber costs 10-15 usd for the same distance)
Only once you have bought one can you and the taxi driver get past the barrier for „family and friends“.
Uber is not allowed to operate from the airport. So there is no other option (apart from a public bus?) than taking a taxi for these outrageous prices. But it is possible to take an Uber to the airport.
There are even announcements at the airport confirming that the taxi companies have been approved by the government.
In my opinion it’s a total tourist ripoff that is supported by the government.

Review:
For being a fairly busy airport, it is pretty small. However the layout is very clear and signage is easy to follow.

For arrivals, the baggage claim was extremely slow. The staff we interacted with were nice.

For departures, gates are not assigned until about an hour before departure. Some are announced over speakers before they show on the screen. There is no consistency.
I have required accessibility services and the staff assigned this role are scarce.

Review: The airport is very crowded and confusing, it is hard to distinguish between official staff and conmen. We were advised by a guy wearing a uniform to take a taxi to the hotel zone which is 15 mins away from the airport.  We were told the price would be 30 USD payable by credit card.  We entered our PIN number on the display which read 30 USD but he was reluctant for us to hold the portable device so he was able to see our PIN number.  We were a bit suspicious about this so we checked our bank account when we arrived at the hotel and found a payment of £268 had been taken out.  We immediately stopped our cards, fortunately we are returning to the UK so this wasn’t too inconvenient.  The “taxi” was a red unmarked shown in the photo.  We reported to the police but they weren’t helpful (there was also several police officers in the area when the guy was operating). If you are in this situation only pay CASH to avoid being scammed and exercise caution.  We had left it too late to book a pickup online (you need 24 hours notice) but this would be the best option

Review:
The airport was good, customs was fast, and so were Immigrations. Our bags came fast, but the stroller went through over-sized baggage instead of getting it at the gate. I don't know if this is the airlines fault. Are the airport's because they damaged the side of the car seat. Over-sized baggage also took forever to come. When we got to the ride-shares lobby, this lady was being so pushy for their hotel.

Onto departures, check-in was fast and so easy we dropped our bags with the Swoop agent and handed our stroller over. Security was fast and had a very short line for a busy airport. We got to our gate very quickly and pushed back quick.

Over all 3.5/5

Review: Tried to take my prescription medication from me and it wasn’t even over 3 ounces.  I have to take a prescription in gel form.  I’ll admit that it comes in a deceptively large “bottle” for reasons that aren’t clear to me.  But it is clearly labeled “Prescription Only”.  It also is not even 3 ounces.  There is actually a foil pack in the bottle (picture a Capri Sun pouch) and then a pump, that maintains a vacuum so that each actuation is accurate and so there is very little waste.  I had to end up showing them my personal medical records online to finally get them to let me have it.  As a socially anxious person, this was all somewhat traumatic and very much has me questioning my desire to travel through a Mexico airport again.  I’ve been questioned in US airports too, but they always quickly relent the second they see it says “Prescription only”.  Abraham Gonzalez was the agent.  If an airport official reads this, I encourage you to review any video you have.  Clearly your agents need better training.  I have to wonder if this wasn’t an attempt at outright theft to be honest as the medication certainly has a strong black market attraction.  I will only consider removing this review if I am contacted personally with an apology and a written plan on official letterhead on how you intend to address this with your agents.

Review: This airport is very functional without all the bells and whistles that you see in Vancouver.  They need some moving walkways for sure. Flew in tonight, flight arrived late. Had to wait for a crew to get us the tunnel attached to get off the plane. But, security was so fast coming through,  they have machines now that you scan your passport,  walk through a glass cage, get your picture taken, and it gives you a receipt (KEEP RECEIPT YOU NEED IT TO LEAVE) and poof you're done. The baggage claim however was another story. First we were told the wrong carousel,  then they started coming and stopped,  and started and stopped,  multiple times. Then the passengers could see the bags were stuck in the back and were yelling down to get someone's attention.  All in all, we had a very long day of travel.
traduccion_nueva: This airport is very functional without all the bells and whistles that you see in Vancouver. They need some moving walks for sure. Flew in tonight, flight arrived late. Had to wait for a crew to get us the tunnel attached to get off the plane. But, security was so fast coming through, they have machines now that you scan your passport, walk through a glass cage, get your picture taken, and it gives you a receipt (KEEP RECEIPT YOU NEED IT TO LEAVE) and poof you're donate. The baggage claim however was another story. First we were told the wrong carousel, then they started coming and stopped, and started and stopped, multiple times. Then the passengers could see the bags were stuck in the back and were yelling down to get someone's attention. All in all, we had a very long day of travel.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: Pretty good airport. We got through cyst and ticketing without an issue or hold up. Once past the duty free store the hats are pretty cluttered with shops, making finding a seat at the gate pretty difficult. Upon arrival make sure you arrange transportation through s reputable company. There are lots of people trying to help you outside…. Be vary wary and cautious. They are. Review: International arrival is a hit or miss depending on how many planes arrive at the same time.  Worst times are the afternoon and weekends.    We landed at 2:30 and it took 2.5 hours through immigration with a thousand people in front and back of us packed in to enter one of three entrances that fit 3 people wide.  A nightmare.   Each isle had only 2 immigration officers and isle 1 which had automated passport reading was so inaccurate they did not open it to the public and was used for special clearance of unknown usage.    Recommended you get the earliest flight in as possible.

Each island had only 2 immigration officers and island 1 which had automated passport reading was so inaccurate they did not open it to the public and was used for special clearance of unknown usage. Recommended you get the earliest flight as possible.

В моей сумке была маленькая бутылочка с водой, ее не вытащили, а просто сняли с ленты контейнер с моей сумкой и небрежно поставили на высокую стойку, ничего не объясняя. Контейнер со стойки упал на кафельный пол, а вместе с ним и телефоны - моего мужа и мой. К счастью, ничего не сломалось. Персонал не извинился, ничего. Просто ужас. Review:
Waited in the line for passport control for more than an hour! KIDS WERE CRYING NONSTOP FOR AN HOUR! This situation hasn't changed for years! I remember when our kid was little, and in addition we had to carry him for 1-1,5 hours.
Are you insane? Can't you organize this simple matter by adding more border agents? Our line had only two. If you can't figure out how to do it, maybe fire people in the current management and replace them with more competent and kind. We are not animals to be kept in these conditions, and animals also don't deserve it.

Review:
So many people bombarding you with Taxi services that are extremely expensive between terminals going from $20 to 60 dls (there’s a free shuttle bus to go to other terminals don’t get scammed), washrooms don’t have lock pins and some are dirty.
Do not rent a car from here to any of the cities they will charge at least 30% more than in the city you’re staying, take the ADO (bus service) they have set prices that will take you to the city and then from there you can look at the car rentals.

Review:
Terrible experience flying with BA here.
Flight pushed back 15 hours with less than a days notice.
Then gets pushed back another 4 hours with no reason given. Managed to get other accommodation but have to go through rigmarole of claiming back compensation (which is a nightmare from previous experience).
Airport itself was crazy busy and has very limited seating. Staff were quite helpful and shops were adequate. Good air con which was a plus.
When we eventually got to check in, we were three hours early and there were around 100+ people already waiting. Here’s the best part, there were only TWO PEOPLE checking in everyone. Might be more of a dig at BA than the airport but what a joke. Took 1 hour just to drop luggage off.
Security moved slowly, really could look at making things so much more efficient.  Overall a terrible experiences

Review:
Airport is not bad, but…

Beware (!!!!!) of agents at the airport exit! They introduce themselves as authorized by the airport, but in fact, under the guise of a favorable offer for an active holiday (in our case, dolphins) for a low price (payment right there!) they lure you into a timeshare/membership presentation promising free food and drinks. They say that it will take 1.5 hours, but in reality they keep you for 3-4 hours. If you are with children, this is only to their advantage - children are tired and parents already agree to everything - at least a timeshare, at least a membership for 100 weeks in advance. If you continue to refuse, expect rude communication. Refunds for activities will also take several hours and communication with employees. In our case, it was membership in Moon Palace. Having sensed something was wrong, we did not go anywhere. The agent on the phone tried to entice us in every way. Realizing that there was no result, he simply stopped answering. We managed to get the money back through the bank by disputing the transaction. Be firm and walk past such agents at the airport with a stone face and looking only forward! Don't let them check your passport or start talking to you! Also, take care of a taxi in advance! Outside the airport you will be attacked like a flock of seagulls (very noisy and screaming) they will tell you the price is about $100, in reality it costs $30-40 maximum. Once again - go straight ahead through all these agents without reacting to anything!!

They say that it will take 1.5 hours, but in reality they keep you for 3-4 hours. If you are with children, this is only to their advantage - children are tired and parents already agree to everything - at least a timeshare, at least a membership for 100 weeks in advance. Having sensed something was wrong, we did not go anywhere. The agent on the phone tried to encourage us in every way. Realizing that there was no result, he simply stopped answering. We managed to get the money back through the bank by disputing the transaction. Be firm and walk past such agents at the airport with a stone face and looking only forward! Don't let them check your passport or start talking to you! Also, take care of a taxi in advance! Outside the airport you will be attacked like a flock of seagulls (very noisy and screaming) they will tell you the price is about $100, in reality it costs $30-40 maximum. Once again - go straight ahead through all these agents without reacting to anything!!
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review:
Horrible airport that allows high profile scams of gullible tourists. There is a big, modern looking "Tourist Information" area at the exit. Its only purpose: to sell you timeshares for the Krystal Hotel. (They promise you free breakfast and 50% discount on excursions if you pay a $30 deposit. In the end you fly home with a $20,000 mistake.) DO NOT TALK TO ANYONE at the "tourist information". But I don't think that's even the worst scam going on. Inside the terminals the airport sells a can of coke for $3 (fair ish considering airport prices) but the small bottle of water will set you back $8.50(!!!) at the register.
It's a shame that your holiday starts and ends with an overcrowded tourist trap. Cancun should do better.

Review: Check your bags immediately before leaving the airport. Buyer beware! Frontier is the worst airline I have ever flown. Customer Service is horrible. We flew into Cancun on 5/18/2024 and paid for our luggage to arrive complete. When we arrived it took over an hour to receive our luggage on Carousel #4. Once we arrived at our hotel, we found out why it took so long. Our bags were ransacked and they stole 2 purses and several clothing items. We filed a claim within 4 hours of arriving and it was rejected. No reason was given. But read their baggage policy closely. They do not take responsibility. We filled out a report with the ministry of tourism. No help from the ticket agent at the Cancun Airport either. They just kept on referring me to the website stating there was nothing they could do. Make sure you check your bags once you claim them at the Carousel.

Make sure you check your bags once you claim them at the Carousel.
Bank Name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

Review: El aeropuerto es pequeño, fácil de salir y entrar. Lo malo es que queda apartado y cualquier servicio de trasporte es bastante costoso, aproximadamente 1500 pesos mexicanos por trayecto
